To restore health to their regions, rural Americans must transform their service economies into productive economies. Building the Agricultural City describes the tools that can do this. These tools, which are scattered across the country, can be assembled within various regions to establish self-reliant, sustainable economies. Here are a few:
1.Community development banks, whose mandate is to serve the under-served, would focus on small business start-ups. There are only 66 community development banks in the United States. We need more.
2. What kind of businesses? Ideally, worker-owned cooperatives. The Emilia Romagna region in Italy has thousands and it has the third highest per capita income in Italy.
3. Closed-loop agricultural systems that raised fish and vegetables would provide locally grown, fresh food year round.
4.Municipal owned utilities powered by renewable energy .

THE PROCESS
Rural Americans now understand that they must be self-reliant, that regionalism is the only counter to globalism. By buying, reading. and passing Building the Agricultural City on to others, you will help promote the idea of a decentralized economy.
One hundred copies of the book will be given to community leaders in the Driftless region with the understanding that they provide feedback to those of us working on this project. I will give readings and hold discussions throughout the Driftless region and friends of the project will host events in their homes.

CHALLENGES
Many rural Americans are conservative, distrustful of change. Many cannot see alternatives to the present system, even when they know their towns are dying. Others have a vested interest in keeping things the way they are. Those of us involved in this project have no illusions about winning everyone over, or that building a cooperative regional economy will take a few years. It will be a long, arduous process. But we have no alternative but to try. And there are enough creative people who have pledged to work on the project's behalf that we know we can build successful models that will win more people over.

 


 
Building the Agricultural City focuses on the Driftless region of the Midwest, but its lessons are applicable to all rural areas. Your support will spread our message across America, giving hope to those who feel powerless within the present system. With your help we can begin to transform rural America. If you are unable to support this project financially, please email this link your friends and post on Facebook. You can use the Indiegogo share tools on this page.


WHERE THE MONEY GOES
* Printing (including set-up and proofs).
* Shipping (from printer to Iowa).
* 100 books given away to community leaders.
* The Pitch Video.
* Travel (a 300 mile circuit of readings and discussions.)
*  Marketing (mailing books to journalists and talk show hosts).
*  Postcards (printing).
WHAT IS AN AGRICULTURAL CITY?
Imagine that towns in neighboring rural counties no longer see themselves as distinct entities, but as nodes of population within one city. It is a different kind of city.  Call it an Agricultural City. Imagine that these clusters of towns no longer see themselves as rivals; they understand that only cooperation and coordinated effort will reverse decline and restore prosperity. 
Building the Agricultural City describes a vision of a human-centered regional economy and how we might transform  the vision into reality.

story:
WHO: BadgeofShame

Hi. I make the web series “Joe Goes,” which features visits to cities, countries, conventions, and random crazy events.

Over the past two years, we’ve done a lot of episodes at conventions. But the most popular videos have been visits to other countries, like England, The Netherlands and Japan.

And by far, the most requested episodes are “Joe Goes To FINLAND” and Joe Goes To SWEDEN.” I’ve always wanted to go there, meet the community of BadgeofShame fans, and ask them what is wrong with them. This is the campaign to help get the trip funded, so we can finally make these episodes happen.

WHAT: Joe Goes To FINLAND & Joe Goes To SWEDEN

I want to make two episodes: “Joe Goes To FINLAND” and “Joe Goes To SWEDEN.” In which I interview people, stare at the camera awkwardly, and go ice swimming, because apparently they consider that "fun." (Jesus.)

Each episode will at least three parts, with each part 5-7 minutes long. (It could be more parts. Depends on how much we shoot.)

And the money is going toward the essentials:

- 6 plane flights: LA to Stockholm, Stockholm to Helsinki, and Helsinki to LA...for two people. (Me and my shooter.) (This alone costs $3400.)

- 8 nights in hotels...for two people. So we have three full days of shooting in each city and a half-day to check in. (This alone costs $1000)

- food, shooter's fee & transportation per day (cabs, buses, trains, etc.)

It's not going to gold chains, chimpanzees, jetskis, prostitutes, and season 6 of The Golden Girls on Blu-Ray. And if there is extra money, that means we will spend more days in each country! (Yes, we might take the ferry from Stockholm to Helsinki instead of a plane flight.)

The videos will be shot like the first “Joe Goes” international videos, in London, Amsterdam, Dublin & Glasgow. (They will not be as comprehensive as the “Joe Goes To JAPAN” videos. Those were planned and produced by an ad agency and their client. I'm all alone, guys! I don't have a team.)

For more information, check out UPDATE #1. And UPDATE #2.

WHERE: Finland & Sweden

The plan is to spend 3 1/2 days in Stockholm and 3 1/2 days in Helsinki.

If the funds go well over $7,500*, we will consider expanding the trip.

For example, we could go to Rovaniemi to check out Santa Claus Village, or we could go to Jukkasjärvi to stay in the Ice Hotel, if it's still open. The PEOPLE WHO DONATE will get a vote on where we go, which wiill be done via email. 

Please note that we can't go everywhere. I know a lot of you want us to come to your town, and sleep in your bed, and leave a terrible mess in your toilet. But covering two countries is daunting. Also, making YouTube videos is not my job! I work writing jobs to pay the bills, and I don’t feel comfortable being away for too long. 

*I know in the video I said $7,000. But it turns out there will be $500 in Indiegogo / PayPal fees. So now it is $7,500.

WHEN: APRIL / MAY

I’d like to shoot the videos in April. Unless the weather is shitty. Is the weather going to be shitty? If the weather is shitty, then May.

UPDATE: We will shoot the videos in late May at earliest...so we have the best weather. Meaning you can look forward to their release in June. We'll keep you updated.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?

You get episodes of “Joe Goes” in Finland and Sweden! Without you guys, these episodes would not happen. I can no longer afford to pay for trips outside of LA on my own. My YouTube channel is not popular / profitable enough.

But there are some extra incentives:

Everyone who donates $1 or more gets put on a secret email list. That means if we do a meet-up in Finland and Sweden, we will let you know where and when.

There are also little, terrible prizes for donations of $10, $25, $50, $75, $100, $200, $500 & $1,000, which you can see on the toolbar to the right.

UPDATE: All perks include all previous perks. For example, for $25, you also get the $10 and $1 prizes...etc.

WHY:

So you can stop posting “Go to Finland!” and “Go To Sweden!” in the goddamn comments to every video!

Instead, you can post “Go to Stöðvarfjörður”

story:
What is the COOLPEDS USA CarryOnE?

 

Based on the highly successful Coolpeds briefcase electric scooter 1.0, CarryOnE is the coolest carryon that doubles as the world's lightest electric transporter!

Our patented design packs a powerful 200 watt compact brushless hub motor that moves you at speed up to 12 mph. 

It is the perfect last mile connector. It is virtually a "mini Tesla" at your service all the time!  

Better yet, it meets most airlines' requirements as a standard carryon!  Just fold it up and pull it along like a normal suitcase.  With the USB charging port, you can juice up your phone and iPad on the go, all while cutting back  pollution and congestion in the city!

UP TO 50 % OFF NOW on Indiegogo for a limited time!

 

Top Media Coverage

"...the Briefcase Electric Scooter is actually a working suitcase made for carrying your clothes. However, when the need arises, it folds out to become a motorized scooter capable of reaching speeds of up to 20 km/h (12 mph) and traveling 10 km (6.2 miles) on a single charge."

"...so finally someone has upgraded the suitcase scooter with an electric motor so it's now self-propelled."

 

Detachable and swappable suitcase

You can choose between the eye catching aluminum carryon, a semi-hard shell suitcase, a backpack, or even upgrade to a solar powered backpack!  The advanced flexible thin film solar panels supplies enough power to keep you smartphone charged up. 

Detach the bag & get the Lightest Escooter ever at less than 10lbs!

Double your range by getting an extra battery for only $79 USD!

 

Ways the Coolpeds CarryOnE can help you:

1. Last mile connection to your office, subway and train stations.

2. Speeding across school campuses.

3. Getting to the boarding gates ahead of everyone!

4. Sight seeing when you travel around the world & grab that late night snack near your hotel.

5. And thousands of other ways only limited by your imagination.

 

The following pictures and videos show our highly successful version 1.0 from 2 years ago:

 
Watch these videos with the COOLPEDS briefcase scooter in action!
 

Featured on CBS's Innovation Nation TV show by Ford

 
The scooters are in production at our factory already!
 
 

SPECIFICATIONS for the Coolpeds CarryonE:

 

 

Colors： Aluminum carryon(silver, metallic blue, metallic red, metallic black)

                  Soft backpack style(black)

                  Semi-hard shell suitcase(black and dark blue)

Easy folding system turns it into a compact carryon size in seconds

Speed:  Up to 20 km/hr (about 12 miles per hour)

Range: Up to 10 km (about 6 miles)  per full charge

Motor power: 200 watt

Braking system: Double brakes with electronic regenerative brake and fender brake

Battery: 23 V and about 4 Ah capacity=92watt hours(meet most airlines' carryon requirements)

Double your range by getting an extra battery for only $79 USD!

Weight:  Less than 10 lbs for the scooter (this is the lightest e scooter in its class in the world!) and Fortunately Airlines rarely weigh your carry on

Loading capacity: Up to 100 Kg （about 220 lbs)

Wheels:  Durable polyurethane wheels

High quality Lithium Ion battery: 4.6 Ah and 23 Volt that meets most airlines' carryon regulations!  (similar to batteries in the Tesla)

Charge time: 2-3 hours

Charger: Super lightweight and compact charger, similar to your laptop charger

Cool extra feature: 

USB charging port for your gadgets

Optional upgrade to a solar powered backpack

 

Your contribution will change the world

Coolpeds USA's mission is to provide fun, reliable, and affordable green transportation to everyone around the world.  We came up with revolutionary award winning electric scooters before and we continue to work on innovative products for all of you!

Tony Chan, founder, serial tech entrepuerneurl, graduated from UCLA and worked at Microsoft, Seattle, as a software engineer.  He left Microsoft many years to start his product design and manufacturing company and successfully supplied various cool products to Sears, Walgreens, Lowe's, and many other global companies.  In addition, the Coolpeds team has won many international awards for campaigns in improving the environment and society.

With his passion and experience in car racing and building, as well as his team of world class engineers and designers, lots of advanced technology is integrated in Coolpeds products. 

Tony filming an entrepreneur documentary with Chris Evans (Captain America) 

FAQ

1. Can it charge my mobile or ipad?

Yes, absolutely.  The COOLPED Briefcase has a USB charging port.

2. How long is the warranty?

1 year warranty on the motor, electronic controller, battery, and briefcase.

3. Can I replace the lithium battery set if needed?

Yes, you can buy replacement battery sets from us; it is about $ 99 USD.  The lifespan of the battery set  is about 600-800 charges.

4. Can it pass the security at airports?

We have passed all the security gates so far, because our battery meets the carryon requirements of most airlines and airports. 

5. Is the bag/suitcase removable?

Yes, it features a clever lock mechanism that allows you to detach the bag in less than 5 seconds.

5. I can help with your project or become your dealer, how should I get in touch?

Please email info@coolpeds.com with your details and a description of how you may be able to help. We are very keen to hear from all those interested to help with the campaign. Please bear with us and will be in touch as soon as things calm down a little to discuss / arrange.

 

By Buying this product, the buyer agrees that the manufacturer or reseller is not liable for incidental or consequential loss or damage due directly or indirectly to the use of this product.

Please comply with your local regulations when using this product.  Thank you and safe riding!

story:
The Smart Gent RFID Duffle Bag

After months of design, sourcing, and prototyping, we are ecstatic to offer The Smart Gent Duffle.   Designed with you in mind, The Smart Gent Duffel is everything a great bag should be.  Anything but ordinary, this bag is made from the finest materials and designed to be your companion at the gym, the perfect carry-on for traveling, or your workhorse for everyday use.  Uniquely constructed with RFID material, it provides a level of security that is unmatched by traditional duffel bags.  

Features:

  • Handmade
  • 100% full grain Italian leather
  • Large Interior pocket with RFID protection
  • Interior organization pockets  
  • 1 Outside RFID pocket for added protection for quick access valuables
  • Leather handles 
  • Cross-body adjustable shoulder strap
  • YKK Zippers and chrome hardware
  • 5 Base Studs for added protection

Dimensions
Main Body - 20" Length x 10" Width x 10' Height

 

The Smart Gent Bifold Money Clip

The Smart Gent is proud to release the stylish and functional, Premium Leather RFID bifold/Money clip Wallet.  This wallet is made from the finest materials and designed to add both style and functionality to your life.  Uniquely constructed with RFID material, it provides a level of security that is unmatched by traditional wallets.  Slim in design, but large in functionality and performance.  This is the wallet for any occasion.   

Features:

  • Handmade
  • 100% premium Italian leather
  • RFID protection
  • Slim fit construction
  • 6 slit pockets for cards 
  • 2 inner large pockets 
  • Non-removable stainless steel clip for bills

Dimensions
Main Body - 4.5" Length x 3.5" Width x .25' Height

 

The Smart Gent Passport Wallet

The Smart Gent is proud to release the stylish and functional, Premium Leather RFID Passport Wallet.  This wallet is made from the finest materials and designed to add both style and functionality to your life.  Uniquely constructed with RFID material, it provides a level of security that is unmatched by traditional wallets.  Slim in design, but large in functionality and performance.  This is the wallet for any occasion.   

Features:

  • Handmade
  • 100% premium Italian leather
  • RFID protection
  • 6 slit pockets for cards 
  • Large billfold pocket 
  • Zip pocket for loose change 
  • 2 inner large pockets 
  • Large passport mesh pocket

Dimensions
Main Body - 5.5" Length x 4" Width x .5' Height

story:
Mon projet

Bonjour, je m’appelle Catheryne Langford et je suis originaire des Îles-de-la-Madeleine.

Depuis mes tous premiers voyages, j’ai tout de suite été attirée par la voile et particulièrement par les voiliers, qui représentent pour moi la liberté la plus pure.

Lorsque j'ai entendu parlé de RDV 2017, j’ai tout de suite su que cette expérience était faite pour moi. Représenter les Îles-de-la-Madeleine à cette course d’ampleur internationale est pour moi un honneur. Je veux que les Îles aient leur place dans ce grand événement médiatique et qu’on sache qu’aux Îles, on a le pied marin!

Néanmoins, j’ai besoin de votre aide. La mise en œuvre de ce projet nécessite un financement de plus ou moins 12 000$, représentant pour moi une charge financière très importante. Votre soutient m’aidera à atteindre mon objectif de participer à une grande partie de la course.

 

Partenaire officiel : KJ Productions

Je vous invite à visionner la vidéo promotionnelle de mon projet : https://www.facebook.com/kloejiangzhuproductions/

 

Description des courses

Course 1 : Londres-Sines (Portugal) du 15 au 30 avril (15 jours / 1600$)

Course 2 : Sines-Hamilton (Bermudes) du 30 avril au 4 juin (30 jours / 4 400$)

Course 3 : Hamilton-Boston du 4 juin au 20 juin (15 jours / 2 200$)

Course 4 (cabotage dans les ports canadiens) : du 20 juin au 23 juillet (30 jours / 3 500$), avec un escale aux Îles du 7 au 9 juillet.

 Coûts totaux pour l'inscription du trajet complet: 11 800$

* Les prix sont approximatifs, car ils sont sensibles aux taux de change.

 

Ces coûts ne comprennent pas:

-Mon transport pour me rendre à destination:

-Trajet les Îles-de-la-Madeleine jusqu'à l’aéroport internationale

-Trajet de l'aéroport jusqu'à destination de la course

-Mon alimentation lorsque les bateaux sont accostés aux ports

-Mon assurance voyage

-L'équipement nécessaire pour cette aventure

-Mes dépenses personnelles

 

Pourquoi me soutenir?

En donnant, vous...

-Soutenez un projet original qui sera grandement médiatisé

-Soutenez une madelinienne qui vous représentera à cet événement

-Vous contribuez à montrer que l'argent ne doit pas être un frein pour réaliser nos rêves

-Vous participer à transmettre la navigation à voile aux femmes

-Vous encouragez les jeunes à croire en nos rêves et foncer 

 

Un merci spécial à mes commanditaires officiels:

-Ledésports concessionnaire Honda

-Corporation du Parc de Gros-Cap

 

Merci beaucoup pour votre soutien ! 

Je vous invite à suivre mon groupe facebook: CAP SUR RDV 2017

https://www.facebook.com/groups/1637850739850720/
story_txt: Mon projetBonjour, je m’appelle Catheryne Langford et je suis originaire des Îles-de-la-Madeleine.Depuis mes tous premiers voyages, j’ai tout de suite été attirée par la voile et particulièrement par les voiliers, qui représentent pour moi la liberté la plus pure.Lorsque j'ai entendu parlé de RDV 2017, j’ai tout de suite su que cette expérience était faite pour moi. Représenter les Îles-de-la-Madeleine à cette course d’ampleur internationale est pour moi un honneur. Je veux que les Îles aient leur place dans ce grand événement médiatique et qu’on sache qu’aux Îles, on a le pied marin!Néanmoins, j’ai besoin de votre aide. La mise en œuvre de ce projet nécessite un financement de plus ou moins 12 000$, représentant pour moi une charge financière très importante. Votre soutient m’aidera à atteindre mon objectif de participer à une grande partie de la course. Partenaire officiel : KJ ProductionsJe vous invite à visionner la vidéo promotionnelle de mon projet : https://www.facebook.com/kloejiangzhuproductions/ Description des coursesCourse 1 : Londres-Sines (Portugal) du 15 au 30 avril (15 jours / 1600$)Course 2 : Sines-Hamilton (Bermudes) du 30 avril au 4 juin (30 jours / 4 400$)Course 3 : Hamilton-Boston du 4 juin au 20 juin (15 jours / 2 200$)Course 4 (cabotage dans les ports canadiens) : du 20 juin au 23 juillet (30 jours / 3 500$), avec un escale aux Îles du 7 au 9 juillet. Coûts totaux pour l'inscription du trajet complet: 11 800$* Les prix sont approximatifs, car ils sont sensibles aux taux de change. Ces coûts ne comprennent pas:-Mon transport pour me rendre à destination:-Trajet les Îles-de-la-Madeleine jusqu'à l’aéroport internationale-Trajet de l'aéroport jusqu'à destination de la course-Mon alimentation lorsque les bateaux sont accostés aux ports-Mon assurance voyage-L'équipement nécessaire pour cette aventure-Mes dépenses personnelles Pourquoi me soutenir?En donnant, vous...-Soutenez un projet original qui sera grandement médiatisé-Soutenez une madelinienne qui vous représentera à cet événement-Vous contribuez à montrer que l'argent ne doit pas être un frein pour réaliser nos rêves-Vous participer à transmettre la navigation à voile aux femmes-Vous encouragez les jeunes à croire en nos rêves et foncer  Un merci spécial à mes commanditaires officiels:-Ledésports concessionnaire Honda-Corporation du Parc de Gros-Cap Merci beaucoup pour votre soutien ! Je vous invite à suivre mon groupe facebook: CAP SUR RDV 2017https://www.facebook.com/groups/1637850739850720/

story:
NOW BEING SOLD ON OUR WEBSITE ARDENCOVE.COM

This campaign is now closed. Please visit our website to order these bags! We have more styles of anti-theft and waterproof bags and accessories, and new ones are available for pre-order.

 

 

Arden Cove is a line of stylish travel bags that allow you to travel with confidence. While our bags may seen like normal purses, they’re actually jam packed with features to make your life easy on the road. No longer do you have to worry about your items getting water damage, or becoming a victim of pickpockets, purse theft, or identity theft.

You don’t have to pick between a functional but drab bag, or a cute but impractical purse. Our bags provide both practicality and good looks without compromise.

We’ve already made crossbodies that we funded on Indiegogo last year. We’ve shipped them out to customers who carry them around the world everyday and LOVE their bags. We’re so excited to expand our line and present the Marina Convertible Wallet, Midi Surie Satchel, and Grande Surie Satchel, 

We’ve designed these bags with the feedback of you guys - our customers! With surveys, emails, phone calls and chats with people who use our bags everyday, we wanted to know what we what more we could bring to the table. The result: meticulously designed styles with features that take care of everything!

Dimensions of Marina: 8 x 4.5 x 1.5 in

Midi 11 x 7 x6 in (widest at base) 

Grande 13.5 x 8.5 x 7 in (widest at base) 

From the airplane, to the office, to the gym, to a night out on the town, Arden Cove bags keep your belongings secure no matter where you find yourself or what you put it through.

That means you can travel confidently, knowing that our bags keep theft at bay and your belongings dry in the rain.

Last year, we released our original Anti-theft Waterproof Crossbodies. It was a big success. We hit our goal in just 6 days, and ended up shipping our bags out to over 20 different countries! Women around the world told us how much they loved their Arden Cove bags. 

What our customers are saying about our original bags

"I have never been so happy with a "travel" cross body bag. Most travel bags are functional and carry all that you need. However, they are not "stylish" nor are they something that you would want to carry on a nice dinner out while traveling. The Arden Cove bag(s) defy the typical travel bag mold and give you a bag you can use during the day AND at night. Talk about cutting down on what you need to pack!"

 - Amy

"I love all the safety features and I was so excited to find a safe travel bag that didn't look touristy! The bag looks exactly like the pictures, but I was pleasantly surprised that it was a bit bigger than I thought, It fits a small camera, phone, 600ml water bottle in the main compartment with plenty of room to spare. I'm actually going to use it as my carry on because it fits everything!"

- Hannah 

"I found the Arden Cove site online after being disappointed with the travel safe bags I could buy locally. (They did the job but were not stylish-even for an older traveller like me!) I am really happy with the quality of the bag...The full-size bag is perfect to hold my iPhone, iPad, sunglasses and even a small water bottle -as well as makeup tissues etc that always inhabit my bag. I can't wait to use my bag while traveling through Europe later in the year. I think I will have to buy a bag for each of my daughters who also plan to travel OS in the near future. So cute!"

- Bernardine

"I like all of the pocket and slot options, but I also like that the interior of the bag doesn't feel micro-managed. There's plenty of open space for me to figure out my own organization strategy."

- Kat

"Every detail was thought out, from the matching inconspicuous zipper closures to the beautiful lavender color interior and interior French seam detailing. Also, like a luxury boutique the fabric samples of the bags color were included. Brilliant! The outer fabric quality is excellent, not flimsy and I like the bags structure and its substantial feel. I am very happy with the lobster claw clasp security feature, it is easy to use and it blends in so well with the gold chain detail that you cannot even tell if it is locked. The bag has a very minimalist look to it and I like that very much."

- Rochelle

Arden Cove was founded by two sisters in San Francisco, who were searching for the perfect travel bag. One that was anti-theft, waterproof, and had pockets that actually made sense. When we wouldn’t find it, we made one. Since 2016, we’ve been shipping these bags out, and are so happy to create more designs and expand our line in hopes that any woman who loves our values will be able to find a bag that suits their lifestyle and tastes.

It all started on Carmen's honeymoon amid the lush open rice paddies in the town of Ubud in Bali, Indonesia. She was caught in a sudden rainstorm and her generic anti-theft crossbody  became thoroughly soaked in the rain. Everything, including her rupiahs, passport, and phone, were dripping wet or non-functional.

Karin also traveled with the same crossbodies on study abroad trips to France. While she remained safe as her classmates were being pick-pocketed left and right, her bag started falling apart at the seams. We were tired of the unfashionable and cheaply made anti-theft crossbodies out there.

Why crowdfunding with Indiegogo?

We launched our crossbody bags with Indiegogo last year to raise the capital needed to fund the initial order of bags. It can cost a lot to order all the materials and produce the bags, and there’s a minimum number of bags we need to order at once - so that can be a pretty big price tag for our young company. It's literally just the two of us, so it’s pretty amazing to use crowdfunding to connect personally with an awesome community and people like you who can help support us and spread the word! We’re in it for the long run, so your feedback as early supporter matter to us so much. We hope you’ll join us in this journey. We need you to make this happen!

Q: Do you ship internationally?

A: Yes! We ship to anywhere in the world. Shipping is free for U.S., and discounted for international orders. Please be aware of the specific import taxes and tariffs of the country you live in.

Q: When will I receive the bag I purchased?

A: We will fulfill the bags in March 2018. Barring any issues with production and shipping. 

Q: Why is fulfillment so far away? Can I get them sooner?

Because this is a crowdfunded project, you cannot receive the bags earlier - they aren’t made yet! If you’ve never crowdfunded a project, don’t worry. Here’s how it works:

When you back a project it raises the amount funded for that specific campaign. Once the campaign reaches it’s goal, it is successful! You’re guaranteed to get the product. Some projects will cancel if the goal isn’t met and they will not charge you. We are not one of them and will definitely fulfill your orders.

From there, the funds raised can increase with more contributions and break “reach goals”. This will unlock perks that were previously unavailable. For example, our $20,000 reach goal is adding another color option. It’s basically a reward for raising more money than needed for our minimum needs, allowing us to have more monetary flexibility. If there’s a stretch goal you want, be sure to share our campaign with friends and family to help us reach that goal!

Each campaign has a number of days that they are running. We are running for 25 days. Once those 25 days are over, the campaign ends (Dec 22). We send you an email with a survey where you can tell us what color you would like your bags in. 

This is when we start producing the products with the funds raised through the campaign. Once they are made and in our possession, we will ship them out! Our perk fulfillment will be in March 2018. You will receive an email with a tracking code and we will post updates on Indiegogo so you can know when to expect a package at your door.

story:
With flying in mind and water at hand, the Aquajet Dive H2 gives its users the independence in the water you desire with balance, stability and operability. 

 

 

Multiple ways to use: both on surface and underwater.

 

 

Aquajet Dive H2 combines modern technology with intelligent design to create a diving experience unheard of before in the world of DPV’s. The Aquajet Dive H2 features revolutionary wings modeled after the wings found on the most hydrodynamic planes to allow the Aquajet Dive H2 to fly through the water with ease.

We also developed a smart internal motor to drive the Aquajet Dive H2 with variable speeds and advanced safety controls.

All of these unique features were developed by an experienced team with precision and careful attention to detail to ensure that the Aquajet Dive H2 provides not only a fun diving experience, but is incredibly safe for everyone with a minimal learning curve.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Exhibitions & Awards

 

 

 

 

 

 

The King of The Speed

The Aquajet Dive H2 's smart motor has three variable speeds for users to control via the right wing with the top speed maxing out at 9km/h (5.6 mph). With high speed, you can freely enjoy flying on the surface and at depth.

 

 

 Explore The Impossibility

The Aquajet Dive H2 's components are all waterproof. Science has shown that the vast majority of marine species live at depths less than 60 feet (18 m). The Aquajet Dive H2 is excellent for free diving applications with a measured depth of 18 meters. Explore the magical world underneath the surface with greater flexibility and a higher range of travel. 

 

 

Surf Freely Like A Dolphin

The Aquajet Dive H2 's motor is more powerful than any other underwater scooter, making it strong enough to carry four people at once.  The motor is powerful enough to ride along the ocean (something other DPV’s can’t do).

 

 

Free Diving With More Possibilities

Aquajet Dive H2 is a new agile way to explore the underwater world for beginners and advanced divers alike with easy controls and high-performance features. Aircraft-style wings give the Aquajet Dive H2 a sleek appearance while reducing water resistance to fly through currents and waves.

 

Fly Beyond Limits

The world’s first underwater scooter with wings.  Human and machine are in perfect balance with the wing design. The Aquajet Dive H2 ’s wings were based on the wings on the most powerful planes in the world for a streamlined diving experience with reduced resistance and minimal fatigue for divers.To offset the torque generated from the rotation of the motor and propeller, the tail’s bottom grille board features an arch shape design which provides maximum horizontal stability and a smooth control experience for the diver. 

 

 

An Underwater Scooter for Everyone

Not a professional diver? Not a problem. You can easily learn to use the Aquajet Dive H2 in 10 minutes. The wings make controlling the Aquajet Dive H2 effortless and users can control the ride via the two magnetic buttons on either wing. Simply slip your arms through the straps, grab a hold of the wings, outstretch your arms and power on the device.

 

 

The left-hand powers the device, the right-hand controls the speed. Once you have control of the speed, subtle tilts of the wings are all that's necessary to adjust the direction of the Aquajet Dive H2. Tilt the device downwards to enter diving mode and point it up to jet to the surface.

 

Designed to mimic the dynamic control of the wings on an airplane, the Aquajet Dive H2's wings give you precise control over the vehicle as you quickly glide through the water. All of the motor controls are installed in the wings with straps to lock the riders in, so you will never lose track of the Aquajet Dive H2 or stray from your chosen path.

 

Five Safety Protections

We always put your safety first. The Intelligent-controlled motor provides five safety protections. With an alarm light, it will keep you informed of any system alerts including low battery or motor problems.

 

 

Use It as A Rescue Tool

The Aquajet Dive H2 has been used to rescue someone in conjunction with a stranded victim. It is a perfect tool for rescue. By trained rescuers,  Aquajet Dive H2 can be used in a professional capacity.

 

What's More

The Aquajet Dive H2 features many built-in safety and comfort features to make the dive seamless and enjoyable for all swimmers, regardless of skill level. These extra safety precautions protect not only the diver, but also the Aquajet Dive H2 ’s essential components to provide a safe, reliable and enjoyable diving experience. 

 

 

 

Extra-long Battery Life

Aquajet Dive H2 delivers with extra-long battery life. The built-in battery has a long charge life of over 100 minutes between charges allowing for more underwater and ocean surfing fun without the need to find a power source. 

 

 

GoPro Mount Compatible

Aquajet Dive H2 allows you to capture various angles above and under the ocean. With Aquajet Dive H2 's GoPro mount, you can not only film the marine life underwater, but also capture your surfing experience and your fun time with friends when kayaking.

 

 

Extremely Quiet

Since the propeller is directly driven by the H2 motor, it avoids gear noise. Aquajet Dive H2 is powerful with low noise, providing a peaceful and serene underwater experience that doesn’t disrupt any surrounding ocean life.

 

Bring the AquaJet on your next adventure anywhere with the carry-on bag for easy transport.

We include all the tools you need to make some minor adjustments, such as Allen wrenches, chargers and extra seal rings, and we even added a better dive experience with a weight and swim cap to adjust the buoyancy so that you walk under the surface.

Include: Aquajet Dive H2 ×(1) Portable Bag×(1) Inflator Pump×(1) Battery×(1) Charger×(1) Extra Sealing Ring×(2) Allen Wrench×(1) Swimming Cap×(1) Clump Weight×(1) 

 

Made with highly durable materials, Aquajet Dive H2 can be dropped, thrown into the water and more without having to worry about impacting its performance. No matter the difference in temperature from 5 to 60°C (41-140°F), corrosive offshore environment, or long-term sunlight, Aquajet Dive H2 will always be kept in perfect condition.

Long maintenance periods of 12 months , so you can keep the diving fun going!

 

 

Maximum Speed: Up to 3.6 km/h over water; Up to 9 km/h under water

Three Speed Levels: 4 km/h; 6km/h; 9 km/h

Maximum Thrust: 18kg, 40lbs   

Battery: 400Wh, 15Ah lithium battery

Operating Time: 50-100 min

Maximum Test Depth: 20m

Safe Diving Depth For Beginner: 5m

Standard Charging: Approx 4-5 hours

Quick Charging: Approx 2-3 hours

Maximum Power: 800W

Voltage: DC 23-29.4V

Cruising Range: 6km

Size: 106*68*29cm, 42*27*11 inch

Weight (Battery included): 14kg

Gross Weight (Package And Accessories Included): 20kg

Input: 100V-240V AC

 

 

 

We did a lot of research on 20 underwater propellers and found out that the products which are under $1,000 are not suitable for recreational use in the ocean. The products that are over $1,000 are designed for professionals, which are too difficult for normal users. So, we designed H2, the only affordable, easy-to-operate, safe and powerful sea scooter for your recreational use.

 

Most importantly, flying in the ocean is incredibly irresistible.

 

 

 

The wing design provides an easy experience The biggest challenge faced by flat wings is the fact that they are affected by water pressure. In view of this, we not only used strong and powerful ABS materials on this product, but also spent nearly two years on designing and developing this product and finally solved this difficult problem, allowing flat thrusts to dive 20 meters deep. 

 

 

 

AquaJet H2 has been all over the world, from Bohol island in the Philippines to Bali in Indonesia. After over ten test sessions  in swimming pool and the ocean internationally, we got valuable feedback from 70 professional divers and 200 normal users.

Professional test drive team with Julia Mouse Dominguez

 

Luckily, we receive many positive comments from our testers and most of them expressed their desire to see that the AquaJet H2 could be manufactured as soon as possible.

 

How to install the AquaJet H2?

 

Dive into 30ft depth at USAT Liberty Wreck in Tulamben Bay
 
Swim in the pool
 

Turn sideways

Explore the cave

Dive elegance

 

Last year, we also took our product and went to DEMA(Diving Equipment and Marketing Association) exhibition in the US and the International Recreational Fishery & Aquarium Expo in Xiamen, China. This year, we also went to CES 2018 in Vegas and received many compliments.

 

 

 

Why are we so confident? Because we have already finished a small batch of production! Our team has an experienced manager who used to work in the supply chain industry for 17 years at Philips, PowerOne, T-Mobile and Whirlpool. Our team also has professional divers, employees from international IT/ICT firms and an aerospace lab and institution. We are confident that our team will make sure every single H2 will be strictly tested and produced successfully.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The soul of the company is innovation. We have obtained more than 30 patents, including seven invention patents. Our team has created products, and in the future we will create more innovative products.

 

 

 

 

1. Which age group is the Aquajet Dive H2 for?

Suggested age range: 16-60.

 

2. How to ensure the safety of shipping?

We use multiple layers of card stock and premium pearl cotton to protect the internals of the Aquajet Dive H2 , making the scooter shock-proof and drop-proof so it is robust enough to be handled even on your toughest adventures.

 

3. What is the shipping policy?

Delivery: July 2018

The weight including battery is 14kg. The gross weight including accessories is 20kg.

Free shipping to USA, Canada, EU and UK.

$100 to rest of the world.

Since the battery is included, the cost of shipping is very high to rest of the world. That is the reason why we charge $100 for countries other than USA, Canada, EU and UK. We are trying our best to save our backers money. Starting up with this new product, we are offering highly discounted price on Kickstarter. So we are not able to cover the extra shipping fee.

 

4. What is the maintenance policy?

We provide 1 year maintenance for Aquajet Dive H2. Aquajet Dive H2 is an international company based in USA and China. If you have any questions related to the maintenance and products, you can always contact service@hoverstar.net

 

Risks and challenges

There are always risks to every kickstarter project, but we are confident to ensure our backers to receive H2 Aqua Jet Dive on time. 
The material and technology itself have already been created and tested. Currently we are done with molding and mass production will start upon the success of the campaign. 
We are confident to foresee and de-risk most of the difficulties faced in production. However, if anything beyond expectation happens, we will still make sure that the design and functionality of this product will never be compromised. If there is any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimate delivery date.

The Aquajet Dive H2 ’s wings were based on the wings on the most powerful planes in the world for a streamlined diving experience with reduced resistance and minimal fatigue for divers.To offset the torque generated from the rotation of the motor and propeller, the tail’s bottom grille board features an arch shape design which provides maximum horizontal stability and a smooth control experience for the diver.   An Underwater Scooter for EveryoneNot a professional diver? Not a problem. You can easily learn to use the Aquajet Dive H2 in 10 minutes. The wings make controlling the Aquajet Dive H2 effortless and users can control the ride via the two magnetic buttons on either wing. Simply slip your arms through the straps, grab a hold of the wings, outstretch your arms and power on the device.  The left-hand powers the device, the right-hand controls the speed. Once you have control of the speed, subtle tilts of the wings are all that's necessary to adjust the direction of the Aquajet Dive H2. Tilt the device downwards to enter diving mode and point it up to jet to the surface. Designed to mimic the dynamic control of the wings on an airplane, the Aquajet Dive H2's wings give you precise control over the vehicle as you quickly glide through the water. All of the motor controls are installed in the wings with straps to lock the riders in, so you will never lose track of the Aquajet Dive H2 or stray from your chosen path. Five Safety ProtectionsWe always put your safety first. The Intelligent-controlled motor provides five safety protections. With an alarm light, it will keep you informed of any system alerts including low battery or motor problems.  Use It as A Rescue ToolThe Aquajet Dive H2 has been used to rescue someone in conjunction with a stranded victim. It is a perfect tool for rescue. By trained rescuers,  Aquajet Dive H2 can be used in a professional capacity. What's MoreThe Aquajet Dive H2 features many built-in safety and comfort features to make the dive seamless and enjoyable for all swimmers, regardless of skill level. These extra safety precautions protect not only the diver, but also the Aquajet Dive H2 ’s essential components to provide a safe, reliable and enjoyable diving experience.    Extra-long Battery LifeAquajet Dive H2 delivers with extra-long battery life. The built-in battery has a long charge life of over 100 minutes between charges allowing for more underwater and ocean surfing fun without the need to find a power source.   GoPro Mount CompatibleAquajet Dive H2 allows you to capture various angles above and under the ocean. With Aquajet Dive H2 's GoPro mount, you can not only film the marine life underwater, but also capture your surfing experience and your fun time with friends when kayaking.  Extremely QuietSince the propeller is directly driven by the H2 motor, it avoids gear noise. Aquajet Dive H2 is powerful with low noise, providing a peaceful and serene underwater experience that doesn’t disrupt any surrounding ocean life. Bring the AquaJet on your next adventure anywhere with the carry-on bag for easy transport.We include all the tools you need to make some minor adjustments, such as Allen wrenches, chargers and extra seal rings, and we even added a better dive experience with a weight and swim cap to adjust the buoyancy so that you walk under the surface.Include: Aquajet Dive H2 ×(1) Portable Bag×(1) Inflator Pump×(1) Battery×(1) Charger×(1) Extra Sealing Ring×(2) Allen Wrench×(1) Swimming Cap×(1) Clump Weight×(1)  Made with highly durable materials, Aquajet Dive H2 can be dropped, thrown into the water and more without having to worry about impacting its performance. No matter the difference in temperature from 5 to 60°C (41-140°F), corrosive offshore environment, or long-term sunlight, Aquajet Dive H2 will always be kept in perfect condition.Long maintenance periods of 12 months , so you can keep the diving fun going!  Maximum Speed: Up to 3.6 km/h over water; Up to 9 km/h under waterThree Speed Levels: 4 km/h; 6km/h; 9 km/hMaximum Thrust: 18kg, 40lbs   Battery: 400Wh, 15Ah lithium batteryOperating Time: 50-100 minMaximum Test Depth: 20mSafe Diving Depth For Beginner: 5mStandard Charging: Approx 4-5 hoursQuick Charging: Approx 2-3 hoursMaximum Power: 800WVoltage: DC 23-29.4VCruising Range: 6kmSize: 106*68*29cm, 42*27*11 inchWeight (Battery included): 14kgGross Weight (Package And Accessories Included): 20kgInput: 100V-240V AC   We did a lot of research on 20 underwater propellers and found out that the products which are under $1,000 are not suitable for recreational use in the ocean. The products that are over $1,000 are designed for professionals, which are too difficult for normal users. So, we designed H2, the only affordable, easy-to-operate, safe and powerful sea scooter for your recreational use. Most importantly, flying in the ocean is incredibly irresistible.   The wing design provides an easy experience The biggest challenge faced by flat wings is the fact that they are affected by water pressure. In view of this, we not only used strong and powerful ABS materials on this product, but also spent nearly two years on designing and developing this product and finally solved this difficult problem, allowing flat thrusts to dive 20 meters deep.    AquaJet H2 has been all over the world, from Bohol island in the Philippines to Bali in Indonesia. After over ten test sessions  in swimming pool and the ocean internationally, we got valuable feedback from 70 professional divers and 200 normal users.Professional test drive team with Julia Mouse Dominguez Luckily, we receive many positive comments from our testers and most of them expressed their desire to see that the AquaJet H2 could be manufactured as soon as possible. How to install the AquaJet H2? Dive into 30ft depth at USAT Liberty Wreck in Tulamben Bay Swim in the pool Turn sideways

Explore the cave



Dive elegance
 

Last year, we also took our product and went to DEMA(Diving Equipment and Marketing Association) exhibition in the US and the International Recreational Fishery & Aquarium Expo in Xiamen, China. This year, we also went to CES 2018 in Vegas and received many compliments.

 
 

 Why are we so confident? Because we have already finished a small batch of production! Our team has an experienced manager who used to work in the supply chain industry for 17 years at Philips, PowerOne, T-Mobile and Whirlpool. Our team also has professional divers, employees from international IT/ICT firms and an aerospace lab and institution. We are confident that our team will make sure every single H2 will be strictly tested and produced successfully.            The soul of the company is innovation. We have obtained more than 30 patents, including seven invention patents. Our team has created products, and in the future we will create more innovative products.    1. Which age group is the Aquajet Dive H2 for?Suggested age range: 16-60. 2. How to ensure the safety of shipping?We use multiple layers of card stock and premium pearl cotton to protect the internals of the Aquajet Dive H2 , making the scooter shock-proof and drop-proof so it is robust enough to be handled even on your toughest adventures. 3. What is the shipping policy?Delivery: July 2018The weight including battery is 14kg. The gross weight including accessories is 20kg.Free shipping to USA, Canada, EU and UK.$100 to rest of the world.Since the battery is included, the cost of shipping is very high to rest of the world. That is the reason why we charge $100 for countries other than USA, Canada, EU and UK. We are trying our best to save our backers money. Starting up with this new product, we are offering highly discounted price on Kickstarter. So we are not able to cover the extra shipping fee. 4. What is the maintenance policy?We provide 1 year maintenance for Aquajet Dive H2. Aquajet Dive H2 is an international company based in USA and China. If you have any questions related to the maintenance and products, you can always contact service@hoverstar.net Risks and challengesThere are always risks to every kickstarter project, but we are confident to ensure our backers to receive H2 Aqua Jet Dive on time. The material and technology itself have already been created and tested. Currently we are done with molding and mass production will start upon the success of the campaign. We are confident to foresee and de-risk most of the difficulties faced in production. However, if anything beyond expectation happens, we will still make sure that the design and functionality of this product will never be compromised. If there is any unexpected delays, we will notify backers and provide an estimate delivery date.

story:
SEATZAC™️ is the leading brand in Europe when it comes down to air loungers. Most people loved our product but the feedback we got of our SEATZAC™️ and traditional air loungers in general, is that people are not able to fill it very easy.           

With this feedback from our customers, we developed the MR EZY-The patented and integrated air pump that can help you quickly inflate our SEATZAC™️ products within 60 seconds.

 

The patented MR EZY will fill the SEATZAC™️ within one minute for you, and you don’t need a lot of space and wind anymore. For this reason, the SEATZAC™️ is no longer only an outdoor product for the summer, but also a great product to use indoor all year round.

 

Once your SEATZAC™️ is fully inflated the MR EZY is even capable to charge your mobile phone or other devices because of the internal power bank.

  

 

With our ergonomic curve design, the SeatZac is giving you great support to your back and neck when you sit down. It is very stable and not easy to roll over

 

SEATZAC™️ insists on using high-quality materials. The MR EZY is made of very strong ABS plastic. SEATZAC™️ is made of durable and tear-resistant 210T light weight polyester and is easy to clean with just water and soap.

 

With the SEATZAC™️  you are able to create your chill spot whenever and wherever you are. The weight is just 920g so you can take it everywhere with you.

 

The MR.EZY holds a 2600 mAh lithium powerbank. The powerbank can support the MR EZY to inflate our SEATZAC™️ products 20-25 times. Like any other powerbank it is also able to charge your phone.

 

 

   

We are an established company located in the Netherlands, and we have a mission; with our products, we want to enable everyone to create their own place for chilling wherever they like. Whether you are with friends at a festival, with family on your roof terrace, or with your lover in the park, with SEATZAC you can turn any place into your livingroom.

BECOME A RESELLER?
If you are a wholesaler/buyer or shop and are interested in selling our fully patented SeatZac products, please don’t hestitate to contact us on the following email adress: 
info@seatzac.com

YOU WANT TO BE OUR EXCLUSIVE PARTNER/DISTRUBITOR?
We are looking for exclusive distrubitors worldwide. Are you a wholesaler with a massive network towards the retail chains in your country? Then you might be our new exclusive partner in your territory. For more details please email us: reind@seatzac.com

story:
About the project

A friend of mine is currently living in Nicaragua for a three-years-long volunteer project, her work concerns microcredit for women's development. So I decided to go there for a month (maybe February, 2012) and doing a reportage about women and theirs projects.


The goal of my project is to print a book and to organize an exhibition, maybe in collaboration with the NGO for a fund raising.


Important: this indiegogo's funding it's about my project (travel, book, exhibition) and isn't related to any NGO.


Updates

September 6th, 2011

Today I met with the swiss NGO "InterAgire" (that coordinates the volunteers, as my friends, in Nicaragua and other countries) to discuss the cooperation between us and they accepted to help me logistically and maybe (to be confirmed next year) financially. In change I'll give them some photos to be used in their websites, brochures, etc and we'll organize a fund raising for the NGO during the exhibition.

They will also ask cooperation to other NGOs that operate in other parts of Nicaragua.

Some days ago I also wrote an email to the director of the communication of the international NGO that manage the microcredit to ask they support / collaboration too.


About me

My name is Marco, I'm 30 years old, from Lugano (south of Switzerland).

I'm working as web designer, but I plan to switch to photojournalism (this project will help me to have a good portfolio too).
You can check my photos on http://www.marcocortesiphotography.com and http://www.shinecapture.com


The Impact

With the book and the photo exhibition I want to show how much the microcredit helps people to change their lives and the importance of empowering women.


How I'll use your money

Mainly the money I need is to buy flight tickets to Nicaragua (1500/2000$), cover the expenses there like a bed where to sleep, food, transportation, ... (I think that will be the cheapest part of the project), create and print the book (maybe with Blurb or maybe with other self publisher), print the photos for the exhibition and cover the exhibition's cost (place, invitations, vernissage, ...).

If I don't reach the amount I'll go there anyway using my savings, but I'll need to find some other sponsors (and isn't so easy...) to print the book and organizing the exhibition.

If fortunately I reach (or even exceed) the goal and I still have money after covering all costs, I'll use this amount for similar project (maybe in other Latin America's countries) and/or to show the exhibition somewhere else (maybe in Nicaragua too).

If all costs are covered I could sell the book underpriced (so it's easier to distribue more books) and give the money collected to an NGO. 


How to follow the project

I'll create a website / blog where I'll write everything about the project, post some photos (not the best one, that I'll use for the book/exhibition), etc.

story:
The coolest way to break the ice.

 

The concept is simple: You +  = Connections Made Easy 

 

 
(v) - French - To talk; converse.
 
 _

Ever wish you had a guardian (dating) angel?  

Sort of like a mini wing-woman sitting on your shoulder - whispering words of encouragement in your ear when you're out there navigating the dating scene?  

Gently nudging you to make the approach when that hot woman walks by?  You know, that hot woman that literally paralyzes you out of a potential connection?

Well, wish no longer.

_

WHAT IN THE WORLD IS ?

The PARLEZ™ mobile app is an innovative approach to helping lesbian, bisexual, and bi-curious women make new connections. This app uses geo-location data from Facebook, Twitter, and Foursquare and pings you when other users are near.  PARLEZ™ then gives you tips on how to make a proper approach, suggestions on different ways to approach, and rewards you for getting out there!

It’s modern technology meets old-school face-to-face encounters. In a nutshell, PARLEZ™ provides a cool alternative to making new friends – and potentially – new romantic connections.

 

WHAT'S THE STORY?

If you’re like most people, the idea of approaching a woman that caught your eye makes you incredibly uncomfortable. That’s exactly why we’re looking to create PARLEZ™.

PARLEZ™ will help to address the following problems:

• Approach anxiety is very, very real.  This isn't just a man's problem.  Women have a hard time approaching other women too!

• We don’t always know when a woman is into women. This can be very, very tricky.

• The world is so caught up in modern technology that we’re losing touch with the value in personal interactions.

• The dating scene can be a bit …boring these days.  We're ready to shake things up.

 

 

WHY SHOULD I EVEN CARE ABOUT THIS APP?

Because you're on the Internet right now instead of being out there; socializing with new women. :) 

Not reason enough? Well, here are a few more… 

• You can make new friends – and if you’re brazen – a romantic connection or two. 

• You’ll get tips on how to make the proper approach. We won't tell you exactly what to say, but we'll help you get your foot in the door.  We just want to increase your chances of success here. 

• Discover opportunities to meet other women via fun events in your city. 

• Stay easily connected with the new people you meet. 

• Our "PARLEZ™ Club" will give you access to awesome perks at our events.  Sort of like our own little VIP Club.  Nice, right?

 

BUT WHY DO I NEED  FOR THAT?

The purpose of the app is to encourage more frequent interactions with the women in our community, in more cities, and around the world. So far, we’ve been doing a lot to connect the women in our community, but to date, these efforts have been limited to New York City. We see PARLEZ™ as an opportunity to scale our efforts and bring more women together – everywhere. 

The app is meant to make the process of meeting new women really easy. We think this will give women more of what they want, as well as introduce the concept to a much wider audience. 

 

BUT THERE ARE ALREADY PLENTY OF WOMEN AROUND!

The reality is – there is currently no centralized place to meet new women and get tips on the process at the same time.  There are plenty of women around, but are you really interacting with them?

 

 

WILL YOU GIVE US COOL GIFTS FOR SUPPORTING?

We hope you will want to contribute because you like the concept and are as excited about the possibilities as we are. Our mobile app will allow for more woman-to-woman connections to be made in more cities, while creating more opportunities for awesome events to take place. We want to use as much of our fundraising money as possible to move towards that goal. 

But of course, as a token of gratitude for your support, we've created some fun gifts. They're not much, but it's our way of saying "Thanks" while using as much of your contribution as possible to accomplish the goals we've outlined.

 

     

    Note Pads                              Bic Pens

 

 

                          

    Stickers                                            Gum Packs 

 

 

        
 
    T-Shirts  
 
 
 
                  
 
   iPhone Cases             Limited Prints                       
 
 

JOIN THE  REVOLUTION!

Everyone involved in creating this app is a true advocate for the lesbian, bisexual, and bi-curious community.  We just want all of you out there to get as excited as we are about this!

As we grow, we really need the support of folks like you who see the potential in this concept and who would like to see PARLEZ™ expand to women all around the world.

 

PRIVACY - YES, THIS IS IMPORTANT TO US

The safety of our users is our priority. We're aware of the potential risks associated with developing an app such as this one, but we will do everything possible to make sure that PARLEZ™ creates not only a fun experience for all – but a safe and private one as well.

 

  THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

We want to use as much of our fundraising money as possible to move towards that goal. 
But of course, as a token of gratitude for your support, we've created some fun gifts. They're not much, but it's our way of saying "Thanks" while using as much of your contribution as possible to accomplish the goals we've outlined.
 
     
    Note Pads                              Bic Pens
 
 
                          
    Stickers                                            Gum Packs 
 
 
        

 
    T-Shirts  
 
 
 
                  

 
   iPhone Cases             Limited Prints                       
 
 

JOIN THE  REVOLUTION!
Everyone involved in creating this app is a true advocate for the lesbian, bisexual, and bi-curious community.  We just want all of you out there to get as excited as we are about this!
As we grow, we really need the support of folks like you who see the potential in this concept and who would like to see PARLEZ™ expand to women all around the world.
 



PRIVACY - YES, THIS IS IMPORTANT TO US

The safety of our users is our priority. We're aware of the potential risks associated with developing an app such as this one, but we will do everything possible to make sure that PARLEZ™ creates not only a fun experience for all – but a safe and private one as well.
 
  THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

story:
Get it Now!


Thank you for supporting us!

 

Media Mentions:

  • PR Web: Saagara Launches Crowdfunding Campaign to “Unite World in Meditation”
  • Daily Cup of Yoga: Crowdfunding Meditation Across the World: See & Do Together Could Use a Little Spare Change
  • Concentrate Media: Saagara launches community meditation software platform
  • Do You Yoga? A Crowdfunding Project For 1 Million Meditators
  • Vibrant Wellness Journal: Bring the World Together with Meditation
  • Planet Save: Global Meditation (Crowdfund It?)

Questions? Contact us at info@saagara.com

 

Help us get 1 million people chanting together in unison


We are creating See & Do Together – a platform through which people can meditate in unison with any number of users around the world.

See & Do Together aims to enhance the power of group meditation through the use of technology. These groups would no longer be limited to a person’s physical presence.

We want to make joining See & Do Together events free and without ads.  However, there will be a paid version where you can create events for others to join. This will enable millions of people all over the world to use it together with no distractions. By helping us fund this project, we'll be able to create a platform which anyone can use to organize or teach meditation, thus raising the consciousness globally.

  

With See & Do Together You Can...

  • create both public and private events that others can then join 
  • access group meditation from many devices: iPhone/iPad, Android phones and tablets, PC and Mac
  • see the location of people all over the world meditating in sync with you!

 

Support us now and...

  • You will help to speed up the project, enabling global meditation events to take place as early as early September.
  • You will get early access to See & Do Together, plus get a discount on a subscription to Useful Health Tools
  • All of the rewards are substantially discounted for the campaign.

 

Who can benefit? (hint:You!)

  • Absolute beginners at meditation can start with the guided meditation courses that will be included in the Universal Meditation app. Suggested reward: FRIENDSHIP PACKAGE.
  • Novice meditators can start by joining meditation sessions. Suggested reward: GET CONNECTED PACKAGE.
  • Advanced meditators can jump in and create their own meditation sessions or join others’ sessions. Suggested reward: PROFESSIONAL PACKAGE.
  • Teachers of meditation can create private meditation sessions and invite all of their students. Suggested reward: FRIENDS AND FAMILY PACKAGE.
  • Organizations can create large public meditation sessions where they aim to get thousands, if not millions to join. Use See & Do Together as a teaching tool for members of your organization and get many licenses. Suggested reward: ORGANIZATION PACKAGE.

 

 

"How will this make a difference to me? 

Chanting

Chanting increases immune function, blocks the release of stress hormones and enhancing mood and overall well-being. It’s no accident that mantra meditation was used for centuries in Eastern traditions to achieve various goals such as healing or increasing empathy.

Japa Meditation specifically, creates positive structural changes in your brain, improving brain plasticity and increasing general sense of well-being.

 

Together 

No one exists outside of their relationship to others. Oftentimes when in pursuit of improving the self, we forget that we are part of the collective consciousness of the planet. Group meditation can help this common human problem. While meditating alone is a fantastic way to become more aware of your mind, body and the world immediately around you, group meditation yields the extra benefit of MASS CONSCIOUSNESS.

In other words, rather than just becoming aware of the connectedness of one's own mind and body, one can become aware of the connectedness of mankind and nature as a whole. Group meditation has been shown to yield remarkable effects on one-one-one relationships, communities, and our relationship with our environment.

 

In Unison 

The effects of synchronized group chanting, naturally, increase exponentially depending on the number of participants. The most novice meditators will experience higher levels of vibrations, while more experienced practitioners fulfill their duty to help others.

The more people who partake in the synchronized meditation, the more everyone will benefit. It is said that regular group meditation will benefit you in ways that solo meditation simply cannot, even after months or years of diligent practice.

 

See & Do Together 

This is why See & Do Together was created. It's impractical, if not impossible, to gather one million people together in a room for group meditation; with See & Do Together, groups this big or larger will be able to easily convene together and meditate in unison on a daily basis, using the convenience and ready availability of modern internet and mobile technology.

 

Who are we?

We are Saagara.

Our mission is to improve health and raise consciousness.

We are a mobile app development company from Ann Arbor, Michigan. Over six billion people on the planet have access to mobile phones. Through the development of mobile applications we realized we could easily reach the global population and provide the resources to maintain a healthy lifestyle.

Over the past four and a half years, we have been building and learning. We're best known for our flagship breathing app - Pranayama - that launched in 2008, and since then we've made quite a few other apps to improve health. We strive to be accessible to everyone, so we develop for multiple platforms, including iPhone, Android, PC and Mac.

 

Where will this take place?

Anywhere you have access to Internet. It will run on most mobile devices, tablets and computers. We believe people will use this to connect to each other, from all over the world.

 

When will it be available?

If we meet our funding goal, See & Do Together will be released in early September. Everyone who contributed at least $5 will get early access to our platform via a unique login. Later in 2013 it will be available for sign-up to the general public. If we do not reach our funding goal, we will still create See & Do Together, but there will obviously be a delay.

 

How we will develop this platform

We are in the final development stages of Universal Meditation, our upcoming meditation app. The next phase involves the seamless integration of the See & Do Together component into the Universal Meditation app and extensive server side testing.

 

Breakdown of costs

The funds we get through Indiegogo will go toward the following:

  • Finish development of Universal Meditation
  • Finish development and design of See & Do Together 
  • Integrating See & Do Together into Universal Meditation
  • App testing and additional modifications across all platforms
  • Ongoing server and support costs
  • Technical & customer support throughout the year

 

 

Rewards

 

See & Do Basic: 

You’ll get early access to See & Do Together, available in the free app Universal Meditation. Join an unlimited number of events each month.

 

See & Do Premium Subscription: 

In addition to early access, and the ability to join an unlimited number of events each month, you’ll also be able to create up to 30 events each month inside See & Do Together.  

 

See & Do Pro Subscription: 

Early access to See & Do Together, the ability to join an unlimited number of events each month, PLUS create up to 100 events per month.

Useful Health Tools:

 One Year Subscription to Saagara's New Suite of Enterprise Apps. These are available on iOS, Google Play, B&N Nook, Amazon Kindle, Mac, and PC. You will also automatically have access to any new apps or platforms that are added during your subscription.

AR Cards: 

One package of 7 Augmented Reality Wallet Cards.

AR Set: 

Get two packages, one of 7 AR Wallet Cards, and one of 7 AR Posters. Most of the rewards are combinations of these packages.

See how the Cards and Posters work by clicking here

Featured Events:

This will allow you to feature one of your events, so that they appear on the See & Do Together home screen. Everyone logging onto See & Do Together will see your event, giving you the opportunity to get millions of people meditating with you. 

 

We need you!

We are the most qualified to bring to life this global experience. We have a history of multi-platform app development for health apps. We have the team to build and support this platform, through their skill set, as well as their keen interest in meditation and raising consciousness. Over one million people world wide have downloaded our existing apps.  

With your support and our experience we can make See & Do Together a reality, helping us achieve the goal of improving health and raising consciousness globally.

 

Thank You!
story_txt:
Get it Now!Thank you for supporting us!
 
Media Mentions:

PR Web: Saagara Launches Crowdfunding Campaign to “Unite World in Meditation”

Daily Cup of Yoga: Crowdfunding Meditation Across the World: See & Do Together Could Use a Little Spare Change

Concentrate Media: Saagara launches community meditation software platform

Do You Yoga? A Crowdfunding Project For 1 Million Meditators

Vibrant Wellness Journal: Bring the World Together with Meditation

Planet Save: Global Meditation (Crowdfund It?)

Questions? Contact us at info@saagara.com
 
Help us get 1 million people chanting together in unison


We are creating See & Do Together – a platform through which people can meditate in unison with any number of users around the world.

See & Do Together aims to enhance the power of group meditation through the use of technology. These groups would no longer be limited to a person’s physical presence.

story:
USB CHARGING + REMOVABLE BATTERY (CARRY-ON ONLY)

BUILT-IN DIGITAL SCALE

COMPLETE CONTROL HANDLE

LOCATION TRACKING ENABLED


ADDITIONAL FEATURES

  • Simple, lightweight construction - premium construction means a stronger, lighter case, made from 100% virgin, scratch / impact-resistant polypropylene.
  • Integrated organization - a stealth sleeve allows for an enhanced packing experience and seamless storage for travel essentials.
  • All-terrain wheels - rubberized, omni-directional wheels that glide smoothly and silently over any surface.

  • Side handle - alternate, low-profile handle for versatile and more comfortable handling.

  • TSA-lock compatible - minimalist, secure locking mechanism, compatible with most TSA-approved locks.

  • Hand-crafted textiles - specially designed liner that doesn't get in the way.

CARRY-ON 

  • Weight: 7.9 lbs
  • Dimensions: 22" x 14" x 9"
  • Capacity: 43 L 

CHECKED

  • Weight: 9.9 lbs
  • Dimensions: 28" x 19" x 11"
  • Capacity: 86 L 

BATTERY 

  • Charging Capacity: 10400 mAh 
  • Charging Output: 3 Amps

EXPLORE 3D MODEL


Conceptualized during our travels from the uncharted wilderness of remote African islands to the fabled streets of Havana, Trunkster is the realization of the luggage we always wished we had. An effortlessly simple and beautiful bag, we're confident that Trunkster represents the evolution of luggage and the promise of an optimized travel experience. We hope you agree and couldn’t be more grateful for your support! If you have any questions or comments, please drop us a line at team@trunkster.co and we'll get back to you ASAP.
story_txt:
To order visit www.trunkster.co.
--


In an industry defined by the same old zipper and flap luggage, Trunkster's sexy silhouette, impeccable construction, and intelligent features define a new standard for the discerning traveler, bidding farewell to the brittle zippers, cumbersome flaps, flimsy handles, and unreliable wheels we've been forced to accept as the norm. Rugged yet refined, Trunkster’s singular design is the ultimate blend of form and function. Rather than just adding smart features to existing luggage, we aspired to introduce a game-changing design with our evolutionary sliding door. The last major update to the core design of luggage was wheels. And while many cool new features have been introduced since then, most have failed to improve the actual experience of using luggage. As avid travelers, we realized there's a fine line between useful features and superfluous gimmicks. For example, we realized most travelers never use the laptop compartment on carry-ons, opting instead to use a backpack or handbag. With that in mind, every inch of Trunkster has been thoughtfully considered to bring you a well-crafted suitcase that prioritizes utility and versatility in a minimalist style. Above all, Trunkster was designed for true wanderlusters seeking the most streamlined travel experience.

*To order multiple Trunksters, simply multiply the price (including shipping) at the respective reward level.





ZIPPERLESS ENTRY


We're all too familiar with that frustrating moment when you realize you quickly need something out of your bag. With Trunkster’s revolutionary sliding door, you no longer have to unzip your entire bag and flap it open. The rolltop door lets you instantly access your belongings in one swift motion. The door is not only practical, but engineered to withstand the perils of baggage handling. In addition, the door provides an enhanced level of theft protection, unlike vulnerable zippers.


USB CHARGING + REMOVABLE BATTERY (CARRY-ON ONLY)




No longer will you be one of those desperate people huddled around the only plug in the airport. Trunkster’s power bank is removable and can be used independently of Trunkster to charge your devices anywhere you go. If you need more power, simply upgrade with any USB compatible power bank (carry-on only).
BUILT-IN DIGITAL SCALE


Is there anything worse than being told your bag is overweight after you’ve already packed and have an angry mob waiting in line behind you? Say goodbye to the days of standing on your bathroom scale while holding your luggage. Our built-in digital scale works by simply lifting your bag, and can be switched between lbs and kgs.
COMPLETE CONTROL HANDLE


We can think of few worse elements of luggage than flimsy telescopic handles. They break, get in the way of packing, and are nearly useless when moving heavy bags. Trunkster features a robust, side-to-side handle that gives you absolute control and enhanced balance through many grip positions. Plus, the handle's special design allows for an uninterrupted cargo space for optimum packing capacity.
LOCATION TRACKING ENABLED

Now you don't have to worry about losing your bag, whether it's unexpectedly gate checked, or you're checking for a long journey. Using patented technology that complies with worldwide airline regulations, Trunkster can be tracked anywhere in the world with GSM coverage, no subscription necessary. Best of all, the device is removable so you can share with friends and family, or leave behind when not needed. This feature is available as an upgrade, sold separately (+ $60).

ADDITIONAL FEATURES



Simple, lightweight construction - premium construction means a stronger, lighter case, made from 100% virgin, scratch / impact-resistant polypropylene.

Integrated organization - a stealth sleeve allows for an enhanced packing experience and seamless storage for travel essentials.

All-terrain wheels - rubberized, omni-directional wheels that glide smoothly and silently over any surface.


Side handle - alternate, low-profile handle for versatile and more comfortable handling.
TSA-lock compatible - minimalist, secure locking mechanism, compatible with most TSA-approved locks.

Hand-crafted textiles - specially designed liner that doesn't get in the way.




CARRY-ON 

Weight: 7.9 lbs
Dimensions: 22" x 14" x 9"
Capacity: 43 L 

CHECKED

Weight: 9.9 lbs
Dimensions: 28" x 19" x 11"
Capacity: 86 L 



BATTERY 

Charging Capacity: 10400 mAh 
Charging Output: 3 Amps



EXPLORE 3D MODEL




As lifelong globetrotters and partners in crime, we've traveled together extensively. Always complaining that there was no great option for luggage that matched our lifestyles, we finally decided to take matters into our own hands. What began with the bold step of napkin sketching, transformed into an undertaking more exciting and immense than we ever imagined. 


Conceptualized during our travels from the uncharted wilderness of remote African islands to the fabled streets of Havana, Trunkster is the realization of the luggage we always wished we had. An effortlessly simple and beautiful bag, we're confident that Trunkster represents the evolution of luggage and the promise of an optimized travel experience. We hope you agree and couldn’t be more grateful for your support! If you have any questions or comments, please drop us a line at team@trunkster.co and we'll get back to you ASAP.

story:
The MagTap provides revolutionary bottle cap opening technology. The MagTap is for all you people longing for a beer keg in your refrigerator and the people who wish they could take their kegerator with them, say to the tailgate.

The MagTap is a cheap, simple and fun solution to your problem.

1. You can fake that you have a beer tap in your home. Attach it to the front of your refrigerator or any metal surface and the MagTap looks just like a regular beer tap. The magnets on the back provide staying power.

2. Impress others at the local Tailgate.  Attach MagTap to the side of your car or truck at the local game. Passer-bys will be amazed and impressed with the guy that installed a beer tap in the side of their car or truck. Powered by magnets, the MagTap allows for quick removal when you are ready to leave.

3. Its a bottle Opener!   The best part of the MagTap is that it is also a bottle opener. So when the gig is up, you can grab a bottled beer for your buds and open it with the clever bottle opener. So now you look really cool for having this fake beer tap that still helps your beer drinking problem.

Praise to the MagTap and BEER, BEER, BEER!!!

 

Risks and Obstacles

We have overcome many of the obstacles to getting a project like this successfully to market. Creation of the prototype was key to validating and testing the idea. Our next challenge is finding an injection molding outsourcing company, printing labels and designing packaging. Preferably all of this will be done here in the US. But, as is often the case with manufacturing it can be cheaper to go over seas. We will need to complete the patent process, but this is minor but important step.

We are confident that we can get the mold and other production done here in the US for a reasonable price. The final challenge is finding retailers that believe in the product. This is where you come in. By supporting the MAGTAP you validate the product and give us real world marketing data to present to retailers.

Thanks for your support and helping us to bring our product successfully to market.
