Excess baggage fees cost travelers billions of dollars each year
24 million pieces of luggage are lost or mishandled annually

Here at E-CASE, most of us have personally experienced these problems. We have channeled our frustration and inconvenience into action, creating the best smart bag on the planet.

Team experience:

20+ years manufacturing luggage for Samsonite, Titan, Delsey, Swiss Gear, etc.
Engineering for Motorola, Qualcomm and Huawei
Designing, manufacturing, and shipping product worldwide

E-CASE is manufactured in a factory that Lawrence, CEO and E-CASE co-founder, has owned and operated for over a decade.
 
We have all personally experienced the nightmares of bad travel experiences, lost luggage, overage fees, etc. Now we're on a mission to restore some of the fun back into travel... one smart bag at a time.
 
Our goal for E-CASE was to build the best smart luggage on the planet. We wanted our smart cases to be easy to use, affordable, and impossible to lose. We have been working on E-CASE since 2012. Now, with your help, E-CASE is finally ready for manufacturing.

[Not pictured] Sonoda, the designer, and our engineering team: Mathew, Eric, and Alan.


 
 
 
 
                     

Is E-CASE patented?
Yes, the luggage weighing and tracking system was patented early in 2012 in the US, Europe, and Australia. The publication number in the US is US2015/0160069A1.
 
 
I’m traveling overseas with E-CASE, is there anything special I need to do to it?
No, E-CASE includes a global GSM SIM card that features automatic roaming and auto-connect to any local network provider when it is traveling overseas.
 
 
I’m traveling a road trip with E-CASE, not an air travel, can I track it?

Yes, unlike many other smart luggage that can only tell the bag location as a name of the airport, E-CASE has real GPS that can pinpoint your bag anywhere on a map.  Does E-CASE use rechargeable batteries?Yes, the well protected removable battery is rechargeable and absolutely compliant with all flight authorities.
 
 
How long does the E-CASE’s battery last?
The built-in-case lithium polymer battery can power the full functionality of E-CASE, including location, proximity sensor, digital lock (Bluetooth & fingerprint), digital scale etc. for about 240 hours. All E-CASE components are low power consumption.
 
 
How do I know when the battery needs recharging?There is a battery level indicator visible on your E-CASE mobile app. It is recommended that the batteries should be fully recharged before you start the trip.  Does E-CASE comply with TSA, FAA, UN and IATA requirements?Yes, all sizes of E-CASE luggage are designed fully compliant with Transportation Security Administration (TSA), Federal Aviation Administration (FAA), United Nations (UN), and International Air Transportation Association (IATA) guidelines. Power Bank: Only the E-CASE Carry-on comes with a power bank which both its design and size comply with IATA’s Regulations and it is removable.Built-in-case Battery: E-CASE adopts a built-in-case lithium polymer battery with well protected against short circuits that is compliant with UN 3481, Packing Instruction 966 and 967.Electronic Module: We use algorithms to suspend GSM signal during the flight by analyzing vibration and light intensity in order to comply with certain safety requirements. Therefore E-CASE knows itself is checked in and going to fly, it suspends the telecom signal automatically and turns back on while it realizes itself landed.  Can E-CASE go through the security check at the airport?Yes, no matter you are checking in your E-CASE to the airline or going through the security check with E-CASE at the airport, you should not have any problem with security issue relative to E-CASE. Because we optimized the electronic module and the built-in battery with well protected against short circuits, they are absolutely compliant with IATA’s UN 3481, Packing Instruction 966 and 967.We have tested E-CASE by checking in on airlines and carrying through the security check during trips with local and international flights to destinations include San Francisco, Los Angeles, Sweden, Hong Kong, Taiwan and Shanghai. We did not get rejected and even a single question asked by any airline and Customs officers. But we did get pinpoint and footprint accuracy in every destination to complete the round-world test for E-CASE.  Does E-CASE come with a built-in TSA accepted lock?Yes, it does.  Is there any activation or annual service fee?E-CASE includes two (2) years FREE annual service fee comes with every E-CASE purchased on IndieGoGo.After two years, the annual service fee is only $9.99 USD for IndieGoGo backers.  What is the Warranty?E-CASE is made with durable technologies and durable materials. We provide a five (5) year warranty for the E-CASE suitcase, and one (1) year warranty for the E-CASE electronic modules. Simply send your E-CASE or just the defective part back to us and we will provide a free replacement.

story:
Short Summary

For 13 years we have perfected our unique Prague ghost tours, and have expanded our services to offer historical walks and accommodation in Prague city centre. We’re one of the highest-rated walking tours in Prague on TripAdvisor.

However, the current situation with coronavirus has put an end to tourism in the space of a day. The borders are closed, travel is prohibited, so we have been forced to close the entire company. Our professional, passionate tour guides and the other employees are forced to stay home, and we are extremely concerned for the future of the company.

The Czech government has no relief plan in place for small businesses, and we still have to pay our rent, utility bills, bills for pre-arranged services and, most importantly, we want to continue to pay our staff’s wages, now that they find themselves suddenly out of work.

We are asking for help to make sure our tours do not simply disappear forever. Any donations will go towards running costs of the company, and above all, towards staff wages.

We cannot survive without your help.

What We Need & What You Get

Our target is 20,000 Euros. This amount will cover employees' wages as a priority and then the survival costs of the business and necessary expenses. We fully intend to re-open the establishment as soon as the travel ban is lifted.

The situation has slowly been improving so you can start planning your future holidays. We have prepared perks in the form of vouchers for the accommodation in the city center 5 min. away from the Old Town Square in the 14th century UNESCO building. You may also buy tickets for our favorite tour, as a donation or as a future travel plan. Be it a Ghosts and Legends tour, Prague Castle after Dark or the World War 2 tour.

Vouchers will be valid until December 2021. 

The Impact

The impact of the coronavirus pandemic on tourism has been catastrophic. With travel restrictions preventing foreign visitors from coming to the Czech Republic and self-isolation rules keeping locals at home, our trade has ground to a halt. Moreover, many of our partners in the industry are also suffering, which has a knock-on effect to our business.

We are doing our utmost to keep the company running throughout this unprecedented situation, and can only hope that at the end of this pandemic, we will have a chance to take a breath and get as close to normal as possible. But we know it will not be easy.

Risks & Challenges

Our plan is to reopen as soon as possible once restrictions are lifted, but we recognize that this will not be an easy task. Even when the borders re-open, we understand that visitors will be cautious about traveling, so it may take some time for visitor numbers to recover and reach the level we saw prior to the Covid-19 outbreak.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone needs help right now, but if you choose to support us, you will be helping not just our company but tourism in general. We want to be able to offer these services to visitors in the future. We want to welcome people back to Prague as soon as it is safe to do so. Besides donation, you can also help by sharing this campaign and spreading the word.
You can find us on Facebook, Instagram, Trip Advisor, please follow us and spread the love. We are truly grateful for all support we receive.

story:
This is our dream home and guest house project: it's almost finished, but now we need your investment. 

And it close to these amazing beaches:

Orosei , Sardinia. 

Legend has it that God created this island with the "leftovers" of all the natural beauties of the world. We - Elia (36)  & Barbara (35), fell in love with it and are especially fond of a buzzy little town on the east coast.

This 1200 years old picturesque village with deep Spaniard influences captured our eyes and hearts for its wild nature and uniquely beautiful coves as well as for their  ancient culture. ￼
People from all over the world arrive here to spend their holidays, but the villagers are often forced to emigrate abroad in search of better working options. 

However, we want to build our better future here. So, we have chosen to leave the noisy and chaotic City of Rome (Italy), to slow down, invest here and see this place flourish. We found an old tiny house on top of an ancient hill, with a view on both the crystalline sea and a serpentine river.


This is the place we chose to raise our four children - Victoria (8 yo) , Deborah( 6 yo), Matthias (3 yo) and Meira (1 yo)- in close contact with nature, deep into the mysterious and still very wild land , inhabited by unique and intriguing people. Here Elia - who has his roots here in Sardinia but was born and raised in Venezuela - works for years in the tourism field, and I am a stay-at-home mom, and a reporter for a local newspaper. 

Hospitality is written here with a capital "H", so in our project we thought of allocating two portions of our house for the many friends and family and as well as those who want to be more than tourists, guests of our family, getting to know a precious land from within.

The one floor almost 100 years old building we bought in 2017 had been left abandoned and dilapidated for a long time. We hoped to be able to save the foundations, to expand it and renovate it, but we ended up investing all our savings to demolish almost everything (while still saving most of the ancient hand-carved stone wall ) and even rebuild the foundations and pull everything up from scratch. To support these expenses, we went over our initial budget.
 At the moment, the construction is at 70%: lack of installations, finishings and furnishings.￼ ￼ ￼


Elia on carpenter mode, coordinating the demolitions (doing his best to save those single-stone lintels).

Now, the mortgage approval would take up to two years (sigh!). So, to get out of this impasse we got an idea: to those who will help us out, financing the last works to ultimate the house, we will offer rewards in terms of hospitality as soon as the house is finished. You can be the first ones spend a holiday in a fabulous seaside home, staying in an annex of our house complete with kitchen and independent, 3 km by walk to the beach, in an area a stone's throw away from Orosei's  town center, preserved as a jewel which has both sea and a history with a millenary tradition.


What We Need & What You Get

The money collected during the campaign will be used to carry out the following works (some of which are already partially funded):

- Installations (electric and hydraulic): 15,000 € (Depending on donations we could also install a solar panel for + 7,000 € )
- Internal and external whitening and finishing: 20,000 €
- Doors and Windows: 6,000 €
- Furniture: 10,000 € 

For a total of 51,000 €.

If we succeed in getting the budget planned by the end of 2019, we will be able to start rewarding our friends for the next summer season.

Each offer we will receive WILL BE REWARDED as follows: 

*  50 €:  guided walking tour in the old town Orosei with aperitif / wine tasting.

*  100 €:  typical dinner for 2 people in a romantic location with a view on the sea.

* 200 €: Weekend stay for 2 people at our home (typical breakfast included).

* 300 €: Weekend stay for 2 people at our home (typical breakfast included) + typical dinner with a view/guided walking tour in the old town / guided walking tour in one of the suggestive archaeological sites of the surroundings.

* 500 €: ONE WEEK stay for 2 people at our home (typical breakfast included).

* 700 €: ONE WEEK stay for 2 people at our home (typical breakfast included) +  typical dinner in a romantic location with a view on the sea.

* 1000 €  and above: complete "HOSPITALITY PACKAGE" including ONE WEEK stay for 2 people at our home (typical breakfast included) + typical dinner in a romantic location with a view on the sea +  historical & archaeological & food and wine guided tour.
 

The Philosophy behid

If you are interested in experiential tourism, immersion travel, if you don't want to just lay down at the beach but experiencing this magic Island by engaging with its history, people, culture, food and environment, this is your chance! Be our guests! We will lead you through the excellent local food and wine and we will introduce you to this precious land which we are learning to know and love.

We want to be very personal and honest with you: this will be a family run business. Our goal is to provide you the tools to feel homey during your vacation. Our experience in tourism and our understanding of the culture od the Island, combined with the fact that we come from abroad provide us the possibility bridge you into this Island. So don't expect huge and luxury  accomodation, but a brand new guest house, excellent food and wine, travel tips, good company, a nice seafood/meat bbq dinner... 

 

Thank you for reading us…don't forget to get the word out and make some noise about " Build your vacation"!

story:
The Radiant Urban Sling Pack is the perfect solution for stylishly carrying your daily essentials. It offers more coverage for your items than a tote, yet is less bulky than a backpack.

Human & society are envolving, gadgets are changing & upgrades are happening constantly. Your carry bag should envolve too.

You never know where the day (or night) might lead, so it’s good to have a bag that can keep up. Get more out of your gear by opting for a bag with the aesthetics and feature set to adapt to changing needs and environments, such as pivoting from work or school settings into outdoor, sport or short travel scenarios.

 

  • Size: 15 cm x 22 cm x 32 cm
  • Dedicated compartment for iPad: maximum 12'' iPad Pro adaptable

  •  Up to approx 6L storage
  • Expand horizontally to fit in SLR, drone, switch, GoPro etc.
  •  Expand vertically to fit in 12'' iPad Pro 

 

  • Quick and easy access to the main compartment
  • Only one hand operation needed

 

  • Quick-access external storage from both sides of the bag
  • Perfect for temporary storage for water bottle and umbrella
  •  Can be also used as a tech pouch for your portable battery and to charge your gadgets when they are low on juice. 

 

Your item is safe with semi-open storage

Avoid unnecessary strain by choosing a bag that’s comfortable for the commute to work or school. Features such as suitable padding, rapid-retract shoulder strap and sufficient ventilation all play their part in keeping you comfy on the go.​

 

User-friendly design

  • YKK strap stopper
  • Adaptable for right or left-handed users
  • Adjust the length to suit your needs

 

  • Expand the strap quickly to fetch your camera 
  • Quick retract to load on when active, secure when running or riding a bike 

 Interior

Belt Length And Capability 

 Who Are We?

—— URBANATURE ——

My name is Cass Choi, founder of URBANATURE, architect designer and a backpack enthusiast. For the past two years, I've been exploring the viable solutions to create the ultimate everyday carry packs using my knowledge about art and science of space.

Collaborating with NIID, we successfully created our first line of products and launched on Kickstarter in 2018 to experiment further with our theories. We can't thank you enough for helping us to bring them to life and feeding us with more awesome ideas to make them even better.This year, we came back with an upgraded version, the Radiant Daysling, an ultimate portable carry solution that takes us to the next level of simplicity and elegance.

story:
Have you ever realized that a modern flashlight is always a compromise? Between the compact size of a pocket flashlight and the power of a search and rescue one. Between an easy-to-wear headlamp and a tactical far distance one. Between the battery capacity of a hiking lantern and the functionality of bike lights. 

Tronex is a combo of everything we need. Its light embraces the widest area possible. Nevertheless, it leaves your hands free. It can produce phenomenal 4500 lumens in the turbo mode or work up to 24 hours with lower power consumption. Tronex will charge your smartphone on a picnic or will light up your way while cycling or skateboarding.  

 

 

 

We took an elegant design and combined it with aircraft-grade matte aluminum that is perfect for everyday use. The minimalistic design and streamlined shape of the flashlight make it functional and easy to carry.  

The cosmic shape of Tronex can compete only with its cosmic power. An astounding 4900 lumens produced in turbo mode make it one of the top search and rescue flashlights of today.

 

Tronex offers a wide spectrum of possibilities. You can utilize its power by either focusing its light in a narrow beam or lessening the focus of its lens to achieve maximum coverage. In the first case, you will get a long distance beam, in the second one – a wide angle of the lighted area. Each lens is adjusted individually so you can match the light to your needs.

 

 

 

 

 

You can turn on two lenses at the same time as well as utilize each of them individually. In case you use only one lens, the flashlight run time doubles. 

Apart from the focusing lens, Tronex features several modes of work:

 

 

 

We would like to mention the LED energy saving mode, too. We take special pride in it. 

This mode involves special LED circles. They are rather simplistic but at the same time, owing to a wide diode area, they produce high light density. As a result, you get soft unfocused light. 

 

 

What is the main thing about a flashlight that leaves your hands free? Its reliable fixation! 

 

Tronex has a polymeric belt capable of dealing with rupture load up to 200 kg. The belt retracts automatically to the flashlight body and hides under a soft fabric pad.

 

 

Because of the retractable mechanism, there is no need to adjust the belt, and the flashlight will always require minimum space among your belongings. The flashlight is fixed by means of a reliable and sturdy fastex clasp.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

When needed, Tronex can serve as a power bank as it is equipped with a USB port. Its total battery capacity of 13.600 mAh is enough to charge multiple smartphones, a laptop, or even a drone.  

Tronex has elegant, flexible, but sturdy cables with powerful lenses and a reliable waterproof body. High functionality and unsurpassed style are its main characteristics. This is the business card of the Tronex flashlight. 

 

The battery is developed especially for high-performance devices. It is safe and ecological. It is perfect for gadgets with high energy consumption.  

 

 

We are not empty-handed. We have an idea and a working prototype. It is our desire to help everyone who failed to find a comfortable and multifunctional flashlight to enjoy the reliability and style of Tronex. Support the project now – and enjoy all the Tronex advantages together with us!   

 

 

 

 

 

Tronex has modern electronic features and patented technology for its self-retracting belts. The flashlight includes a mechanism to protect the optical components from overheating and to tackle issues with battery over-drain or overcharging. There is also a driver to stabilize brightness and keep it at a constant level.  

 

 

 

Modern devices should always meet the demands of the third millennium. Demands like simple form, minimalistic design, rounded shapes, and natural functionality. 

This is the only way to create a universal flashlight to suit everyone, no matter what hobbies, activities, or lifestyle they have. 

 

 

 

 

At first, we thought it would be impossible to create something new. But day by day, night by night, we worked to solve this issue – at least for ourselves. Nothing and nobody could stop us. Thus, the idea occurred to us followed by numerous new issues that we had to solve to revel in the moment when our vision finally emerged. With tireless effort, strict devotion to the goal, and an unending desire to achieve this dream, we are now ready to introduce you to Tronex. 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

This is our first campaign on Indiegogo and we feel much appreciation for the support you give us in order to bring Tronex to life.

We realize that there are certain natural risks and problems with project development and production. Yet, we are confident in our abilities to produce it and we have taken all the necessary measures. We fully expect Tronex to be delivered on time, with all features ready to work.

We are doing our best to test and produce Tronex and that makes all stages of the process perfect. We immediately report to all sponsors on any timeline changes and unexpected circumstances providing detailed explanations to keep you informed on the project. 
If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact the Tronex team.

An astounding 4900 lumens produced in turbo mode make it one of the top search and rescue flashlights of today. Tronex offers a wide spectrum of possibilities. You can utilize its power by either focusing its light in a narrow beam or lessening the focus of its lens to achieve maximum coverage. In the first case, you will get a long distance beam, in the second one – a wide angle of the lighted area. Each lens is adjusted individually so you can match the light to your needs.     You can turn on two lenses at the same time as well as utilize each of them individually. In case you use only one lens, the flashlight run time doubles. Apart from the focusing lens, Tronex features several modes of work:   We would like to mention the LED energy saving mode, too. We take special pride in it. This mode involves special LED circles. They are rather simplistic but at the same time, owing to a wide diode area, they produce high light density. As a result, you get soft unfocused light.   What is the main thing about a flashlight that leaves your hands free? Its reliable fixation!  Tronex has a polymeric belt capable of dealing with rupture load up to 200 kg. The belt retracts automatically to the flashlight body and hides under a soft fabric pad.  Because of the retractable mechanism, there is no need to adjust the belt, and the flashlight will always require minimum space among your belongings. The flashlight is fixed by means of a reliable and sturdy fastex clasp.         When needed, Tronex can serve as a power bank as it is equipped with a USB port. Its total battery capacity of 13.600 mAh is enough to charge multiple smartphones, a laptop, or even a drone.  Tronex has elegant, flexible, but sturdy cables with powerful lenses and a reliable waterproof body. High functionality and unsurpassed style are its main characteristics. This is the business card of the Tronex flashlight.  The battery is developed especially for high-performance devices. It is safe and ecological. It is perfect for gadgets with high energy consumption.    We are not empty-handed. We have an idea and a working prototype. It is our desire to help everyone who failed to find a comfortable and multifunctional flashlight to enjoy the reliability and style of Tronex. Support the project now – and enjoy all the Tronex advantages together with us!        Tronex has modern electronic features and patented technology for its self-retracting belts. The flashlight includes a mechanism to protect the optical components from overheating and to tackle issues with battery over-drain or overcharging. There is also a driver to stabilize brightness and keep it at a constant level.     Modern devices should always meet the demands of the third millennium. Demands like simple form, minimalistic design, rounded shapes, and natural functionality. This is the only way to create a universal flashlight to suit everyone, no matter what hobbies, activities, or lifestyle they have.     At first, we thought it would be impossible to create something new. But day by day, night by night, we worked to solve this issue – at least for ourselves. Nothing and nobody could stop us. Thus, the idea occurred to us followed by numerous new issues that we had to solve to revel in the moment when our vision finally emerged. With tireless effort, strict devotion to the goal, and an unending desire to achieve this dream, we are now ready to introduce you to Tronex.    Risks and challengesThis is our first campaign on Indiegogo and we feel much appreciation for the support you give us in order to bring Tronex to life.We realize that there are certain natural risks and problems with project development and production. Yet, we are confident in our abilities to produce it and we have taken all the necessary measures. We fully expect Tronex to be delivered on time, with all features ready to work.We are doing our best to test and produce Tronex and that makes all stages of the process perfect. We immediately report to all sponsors on any timeline changes and unexpected circumstances providing detailed explanations to keep you informed on the project. If you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to contact the Tronex team.

story:
Pump it up

Since the 2014 opening of the Trinity Skyline Trail, bicyclists are crossing Dallas’ Trinity River and using West Dallas and Oak Cliff thoroughfares like never before.

You can encourage even more bicycle travel in and through West Dallas and Oak Cliff by contributing to the installation of bike repair stations.

We have so far raised the funds for THREE bike stations.  One will be placed on the West Dallas Gateway Plaza at the west end of the Continental Bridge. Another is targeted for the trailhead at the Trinity River Overlook near the  Commerce Street Bridge. Another will be placed at the trailhead at the east end of the Commerce Street Bridge.

One more remains for a West Dallas location near the Fort Worth Avenue bike lanes.  THIS campaign is to raise the money for that location. 

Each Dero Fixit station costs $1,600 and will:

  • provide all of the tools needed for basic bike repairs and maintenance.
  • feature the “built-like-a-tank” Air Kit 3 bike pump with pressure gauge.
  • include a pump stop that holds bikes upright while tires are filled with air.

Your tax-deductible contribution to the West Dallas Foundation will help pay for these bike repair stations to be installed in West Dallas.

Please look at our perks ... and support our campaign for a fourth bike station.  Thank you.

story:
The LOCTOTE Cinch Pack seemed like an obvious name to us for a backpack that is literally a “cinch” to use, and is used by "cinching" it. The Cinch Pack by the LOCTOTE INDUSTRIAL BAG CO. is a tough, practical, daily carry backpack, that's built with the worry-free security features you come to expect from LOCTOTE. It was designed to accommodate the lifestyles of people who travel in high-crime environments, or anybody on the go who has important or valuable things with them (like passports, electronics, wallets, keys, etc.), but does not want to be constantly worrying about, clutching or staring at them, and does not want to look like they are carrying a secure anti-theft bag. 

This is the bag that everybody, at some point in their life, wishes they had. Elegant in its simplicity and unapologetic in its brutal effectiveness. Sometimes you just need a safe place to put your personal items and valuables while you focus on something else. 

Like a trusted friend, you’ll want to take the Cinch Pack everywhere you go. It's lightweight, comfortable to carry, durable, hand-washable, UV resistant, latex and gluten free, low-calorie, low-carb, gender neutral, environmentally friendly, and politically correct (apologies vegans -- there is leather). Whether you’re dressed for the office, the gym, the beach, or a night out — LOCTOTE™ bags are a soft reliable friend that will protect your stuff from thieves, and you from bland accessories.

1) Cinch the backpack shut by pulling on the straps
2) Take the lock (or the carabiner clip) off the O-ring and wrap the strap around any fixed object 
3) Go about your business & do what you have to do without worrying about your stuff getting stolen . 

 

 

The patent-pending UHMWPE (Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene) locking strap enables you to lock your bag shut, and to a fixed object. It's reinforced and grommeted with stainless steel, and assembled with solid brass components and hand-set rivets, making it really difficult to cut, break or tear without extreme force or heavy tools. At one end is a heavy-duty solid brass lock for high security, and at the other end is a solid brass carabiner clip for quick fastening.

Crafted from a woven layer of ultra high molecular weight polyethylene (UHMWPE) and other state-of-the-art fibers, this makes our lockable bag truly secure.

What does Level 4 Cut Protection Mean?

Cut level 4 is a designation given to products that achieve a certain level of cut resistance on a standardized test. Level 4 textiles are recommended for use in industry for protecting against High Cut Hazards such as sheet metal, glass handling, anytime sharp knives are used, and anytime there is a risk of human or animal bites. 

Does this mean 100% Cut-Proof?

Nothing is cut-proof. With the right tool, you can cut through anything. We didn’t perform a miracle, we just created a really high cut-level woven fabric, and then created a really well-thought-out bag completely surrounded with it (even under the cotton canvas) that would require a lot of time or effort to get into. In most cases, thieves will just move on. Our bags will keep your stuff safe, except under the most hostile circumstances.

Our 1.25" wide UHMWPE locking straps reinforced with a steel-reinforced inner core doubles as the backpack straps, making the backpack impossible to slash & grab yet still surprisingly comfortable.

The LOCTOTE Cinch Pack includes a large water-resistant fleece-lined internal pocket that is also lined with a tested RFID blocking material to shield credit cards & passports from electronic pick-pocketing.

Rain, spills, splashes, puddles, high-tide, and general carelessness are the enemy of your small electronic devices and leather goods. Each LOCTOTE® bag is treated with an industrial water and stain repellant coating, and comes equipped with YKK Aquaguard zippers to keep your stuff as dry as possible.

Cheap hardware, cheap leather, or "pleather" will ultimately look ugly and fail. We use stainless steel and brass exclusively for its strength, quality, and ability to keep looking good for years to come. We hand select all of our leather for its quality, feel, and thickness. Every detail has been thought through. We use heavy gauge UHMWPE thread (stronger than Kevlar) for its strength and cut resistance. Then we bind all of the seams internally using UHMWPE binding tape in order to make them stab-proof. Nobody else does these things. It's expensive and time consuming, and many people just don't care. We do, and we're not going to sell a product until we believe that it's the best it can be.

 

We owe all of our success to our loyal crowdfunding community and we will forever be grateful to you. You've got first dibs to get the LOCTOTE Cinch Pack at a really discounted price - and the first units to ever ship. First time backing on Indiegogo? Check out this quick demo to learn how it works. 

 

We're Don and Adam. No special roles or fancy titles here. In a company this small we all do everything from the highest level strategy and media planning, to cleaning up poop from Gizmo the 3lb micro-dog. Most importantly, we both personally take 100% responsibility for ensuring that our backers' products are fulfilled and their expectations are exceeded.

We invite you to spend some time reading our campaign. We are passionate about our products and our customers. Everything we make, we use and abuse until we get it just right. Then we abuse it more, just because it's what we do for fun. After having my stuff stolen on vacation, I became obsessed with creating super-secure ultra-tough products for travelers. I didn't want to see another vacation ruined. This bag is a game changer. Please join us. We love to see the things we create benefit others.

We are a small employee-owned company located in the heartland of America. We started LOCTOTE because we felt that there was a void in the market for theft resistant bags that really worked. Nobody was innovating designs and features, using top of the line materials, or paying attention to the construction details necessary to make theft resistant products truly theft resistant. We design all our bags, and then scour the globe to find the absolute best and most technologically advanced materials and manufacturers available. We compromise on nothing when it comes to quality and authenticity, and cut no corners in crafting goods built to outlive their owners. There’s nothing fancy and no secret formula to what we do. We’re just hands-on hard-working folks providing customers handcrafted hard-wearing products at a fair price. It’s really quite simple.

–Don Halpern 
Founder & CEO, LOCTOTE INDUSTRIAL BAG COMPANY

 

The idea behind LOCTOTE came as a result of a family vacation in St. Croix. My wife and kids had all gone back to the room for the day, and I decided to stay out on the beach and do some snorkeling. Before heading out into the water, I put my phone, earbuds, and cash in my shoe, which I covered with a towel and left on a beach chair. I swam out about 100 yards, and when I looked back to shore, I saw an individual shuffling through my stuff on the beach, and then walk away with something in his hand. I yelled to him, and swam back to shore as fast as I could, but by the time I got there, both he and my stuff were gone. This was a real downer for the vacation, and I decided that I needed a solution to prevent something like this from ever happening again. 

That night I got on my laptop (because that’s what I do on vacation), and I began my search for a solution to the problem. To me, the problem was more complex than just a way to prevent my personal items from being stolen when I was at the beach. I had a whole list of requirements for this product I was seeking. First and foremost, I wanted a way to carry my personal items that would enable me to securely fasten them to a stationary object so they couldn’t be tampered with or stolen. In my mind, this would require a locking mechanism that couldn’t be broken, cut, or torn, and the container itself also needed to be made of something that was resistant to cutting or tearing. I basically wanted a product that would be impenetrable to thieves of all kinds, including protecting my credit cards and passports that contained RFID chips from unauthorized scanning (digital pickpocketing). Conversely, I wanted something stylish, attractive, and functional — something that would seamlessly fit into my everyday life, that I would enjoy using and be proud to be seen using. More and more, this was sounding to me like some kind of a bag. 

That’s what I needed — an everyday “go to” bag that would meet all my technical requirements, and still be soft, foldable/packable, comfortable, highly functional, attractive and fashionable, and durable. That shouldn’t be hard to find, I thought. Well, it was. In fact there was no product on the market that was even remotely close to what I was looking for. After exhausting my search, I began the process of creating the bag I was seeking. It took hundreds of hours of research, and countless prototypes and failed attempts. In the end, we created a product that blew people’s minds. 

We launched our first product on Kickstarter in 2016, and we became, at that time, the highest grossing backpack ever in the history of Kickstarter, and we still are the highest grossing Kickstarter campaign ever in the State of Ohio. From there we got invited onto ABC’s Shark Tank, where we made a deal with Robert Herjavec.

It’s been a long journey since our last crowdfunding campaign. There have been great highs — like watching our campaign go viral, and appearing on ABC’s Shark Tank. There have also been challenging lows — like fighting (and beating) cancer, and seeing our product knocked-off all over the internet by some low-end overseas garbage. Through it all, we’ve kept our focus, and our commitment to innovation and quality. We don’t just roll out new products every few months. Rather, we strive for real innovation, and then we pain over all the details until it’s just right. Now we’re ready. The Cinch Pack is the culmination of all our work and experience. We’re very proud of it, and we’re confident you will appreciate every aspect of this new bag. Please join us and back us today, so that we can continue to innovate and create great products for you.

We can't thank our previous backers & customers enough for the support! We will continue to create products that enable you to #LIVEMOREWORRYLESS. 

If this looks ridiculously simple, well it's because it is. This isn't our first rodeo and this time around we have made sure to assure all bags will be delivered on time. The bags are currently sitting in our warehouse ready to ship. 

 

www.loctote.com/cinch-pack-press-page

 

Mentioned by: 

 

Over the years we have accumulated deep and broad business experience. This provides us the foresight and insight to be able to identify and minimize the most likely risks and challenges before they occur. We never let these out of our sight. All businesses face risks and challenges, and any business owner who believes they do not, is simply fooling his or her self, or is too naïve to recognize them. Risks must be actively managed, and "hope" is not a risk management technique. In order to better manage our risks and challenges, we approach them in 7 broad categories.

• Internal 
• Product 
• Supply Chain 
• Marketplace 
• Litigation 
• Force Majeure 
• Unforeseen

Internal: Internal risk refers to our ability to perform our work and deliver on our promises. These typically refer to labor issues, skill-set shortages, lack of capabilities, and management problems. We are a small company and we’re all owners. We have deep hands-on business management and operations experience, and a large rolodex of industry contacts. LOCTOTE is our dream, and we are 100% committed to making it a success. We maintain a very supportive and collaborative culture, and there is no amount of coffee we won’t consume and hours we won’t work in order to deliver on our commitments to our Backers. That said, we already have the products for this campaign in our warehouse, so our internal risk here is near zero.

Product: Product Risk refers to the risk of the end product not living up to expectations. This could be with regards to quality, performance, or any other product attributes represented to potential customers and Backers. We have minimized this risk by ensuring that we have real working versions of our products to wear-test before sharing them with the Indiegogo Community. We're not a new company, and this isn't our first rodeo. In addition, our ongoing continuous-improvement process ensures that every bit of feedback we get, both positive and negative, gets reviewed, discussed, and appropriately incorporated into our products. We will redesign parts, throw away materials and product, and remake products as many times as is necessary in order to ensure that the products our customers and Backers receive are great.

Supply Chain: Supply chain risk refers to not being able to source the raw materials and labor necessary to produce products. Supply chain risk is real for every company that produces something. We address this risk in several ways. First, we source as much as we can from small privately-owned businesses. These are small companies run by real people with whom we have developed close personal relationships. These aren’t the kinds of businesses that just lock their doors, shutter their windows, and disappear overnight. In addition, we are continuously talking to new suppliers to make sure we are getting the best value, and that we have alternatives in case one of our existing suppliers fails to deliver. Finally, we intentionally design our products using very simple components. To the extent possible, our raw materials are standard industrial materials capable of being spec’d out and sourced from numerous suppliers. To even further minimize this risk to our Indiegogo Backers, we have invested our own money and taken on personal debt to manufacture these bags and get them to our warehouse in Ohio. This ensures you that if you back our campaign, you WILL get your product in a timely fashion. We believe in our product and are all-in. We know you will love it too. 

Marketplace: It’s possible that nobody will like our products. Frequently, great products are created to solve problems that nobody really cares about. We’ve also seen products that don’t solve the real problems they were created to solve. Our products are born out of real need, and they work. They make lives better, and do it in a better way than anything else available. We do everything within our control to produce the absolute best highest-quality products we can – from design and prototyping, through real-life testing, to production. We skimp on nothing. We believe that we have done everything we can to give you the kind of products you will value, use regularly, and be proud to own. 

Litigation: This is the nightmare and back-of-the-mind fear of every business owner. Litigation can come from anywhere, and it can be crippling to a business both financially and in terms of time and resource demands. We have done everything we can to minimize this. We have a patent filed on our design. We have researched existing patents extensively to make sure that we’re not infringing on someone else’s work. We have permission from Henkel Corporation (the large multi-national corporation that owns the LOCTITE brand) to use the LOCTOTE name. We have trademarks filed, domain names purchased, trade names filed, and exclusive license agreements signed. We pay our bills, pay our taxes, don’t make claims and promises we cannot keep, eat our vegetables, and are kind to children and small animals. We have done everything ethical and prudent to ensure that the litigation boogeyman stays away from us.

Force Majeure: Force Majeure is a legal term that refers to extraordinary events or circumstances beyond our control such as a war, strike, riot, crime, terrorism, or acts of God (e.g. hurricane, flooding, earthquake, volcanic eruption, etc.). We believe that we have done all that we can to minimize this risk. We live and operate in Columbus, Ohio. Not being near a coastline or a major city, we are unlikely to be a major target in war or terrorism. Our weather is not extreme, and we have little to no seismic or volcanic activity. Crime is low and political and social unrest is minimal here. It’s actually quite boring. In the extremely unlikely occurrence of a Force Majeure event, we promise that we, or our surviving loved ones, will refund 100% of our Backers’ money if they cannot deliver on our commitments.

Unforeseen: Unforeseen risks and challenges are, by definition, infinite. In business, as in life, stuff happens and you need to be prepared to deal with it. When I first talked about unforeseen risks and challenges during our first crowdfunding campaign, I thought to myself, what could happen? We have anticipated and planned for everything. Three months later I was diagnosed with cancer. Okay, didn't see that one coming. I got through it, and we delivered on our promises. Not that getting cancer was a good thing, but having to face the real possibility of my early demise certainly helped me to recalibrate my life priorities. That said, we have, and will continue to, work through any and all challenges that come our way in order to uphold our commitments to ourselves and our Backers.

We will continue to create products that enable you to #LIVEMOREWORRYLESS. If this looks ridiculously simple, well it's because it is. This isn't our first rodeo and this time around we have made sure to assure all bags will be delivered on time. The bags are currently sitting in our warehouse ready to ship.  www.loctote.com/cinch-pack-press-page Mentioned by:  Over the years we have accumulated deep and broad business experience. This provides us the foresight and insight to be able to identify and minimize the most likely risks and challenges before they occur. We never let these out of our sight. All businesses face risks and challenges, and any business owner who believes they do not, is simply fooling his or her self, or is too naïve to recognize them. Risks must be actively managed, and "hope" is not a risk management technique. In order to better manage our risks and challenges, we approach them in 7 broad categories.• Internal • Product • Supply Chain • Marketplace • Litigation • Force Majeure • UnforeseenInternal: Internal risk refers to our ability to perform our work and deliver on our promises. These typically refer to labor issues, skill-set shortages, lack of capabilities, and management problems. We are a small company and we’re all owners. We have deep hands-on business management and operations experience, and a large rolodex of industry contacts. LOCTOTE is our dream, and we are 100% committed to making it a success. We maintain a very supportive and collaborative culture, and there is no amount of coffee we won’t consume and hours we won’t work in order to deliver on our commitments to our Backers. That said, we already have the products for this campaign in our warehouse, so our internal risk here is near zero.Product: Product Risk refers to the risk of the end product not living up to expectations. This could be with regards to quality, performance, or any other product attributes represented to potential customers and Backers. We have minimized this risk by ensuring that we have real working versions of our products to wear-test before sharing them with the Indiegogo Community. We're not a new company, and this isn't our first rodeo. In addition, our ongoing continuous-improvement process ensures that every bit of feedback we get, both positive and negative, gets reviewed, discussed, and appropriately incorporated into our products. We will redesign parts, throw away materials and product, and remake products as many times as is necessary in order to ensure that the products our customers and Backers receive are great.Supply Chain: Supply chain risk refers to not being able to source the raw materials and labor necessary to produce products. Supply chain risk is real for every company that produces something. We address this risk in several ways. First, we source as much as we can from small privately-owned businesses. These are small companies run by real people with whom we have developed close personal relationships. These aren’t the kinds of businesses that just lock their doors, shutter their windows, and disappear overnight. In addition, we are continuously talking to new suppliers to make sure we are getting the best value, and that we have alternatives in case one of our existing suppliers fails to deliver. Finally, we intentionally design our products using very simple components. To the extent possible, our raw materials are standard industrial materials capable of being spec’d out and sourced from numerous suppliers. To even further minimize this risk to our Indiegogo Backers, we have invested our own money and taken on personal debt to manufacture these bags and get them to our warehouse in Ohio. This ensures you that if you back our campaign, you WILL get your product in a timely fashion. We believe in our product and are all-in. We know you will love it too. Marketplace: It’s possible that nobody will like our products. Frequently, great products are created to solve problems that nobody really cares about. We’ve also seen products that don’t solve the real problems they were created to solve. Our products are born out of real need, and they work. They make lives better, and do it in a better way than anything else available. We do everything within our control to produce the absolute best highest-quality products we can – from design and prototyping, through real-life testing, to production. We skimp on nothing. We believe that we have done everything we can to give you the kind of products you will value, use regularly, and be proud to own. Litigation: This is the nightmare and back-of-the-mind fear of every business owner. Litigation can come from anywhere, and it can be crippling to a business both financially and in terms of time and resource demands. We have done everything we can to minimize this. We have a patent filed on our design. We have researched existing patents extensively to make sure that we’re not infringing on someone else’s work. We have permission from Henkel Corporation (the large multi-national corporation that owns the LOCTITE brand) to use the LOCTOTE name. We have trademarks filed, domain names purchased, trade names filed, and exclusive license agreements signed. We pay our bills, pay our taxes, don’t make claims and promises we cannot keep, eat our vegetables, and are kind to children and small animals. We have done everything ethical and prudent to ensure that the litigation boogeyman stays away from us.Force Majeure: Force Majeure is a legal term that refers to extraordinary events or circumstances beyond our control such as a war, strike, riot, crime, terrorism, or acts of God (e.g. hurricane, flooding, earthquake, volcanic eruption, etc.). We believe that we have done all that we can to minimize this risk. We live and operate in Columbus, Ohio. Not being near a coastline or a major city, we are unlikely to be a major target in war or terrorism. Our weather is not extreme, and we have little to no seismic or volcanic activity. Crime is low and political and social unrest is minimal here. It’s actually quite boring. In the extremely unlikely occurrence of a Force Majeure event, we promise that we, or our surviving loved ones, will refund 100% of our Backers’ money if they cannot deliver on our commitments.Unforeseen: Unforeseen risks and challenges are, by definition, infinite. In business, as in life, stuff happens and you need to be prepared to deal with it. When I first talked about unforeseen risks and challenges during our first crowdfunding campaign, I thought to myself, what could happen? We have anticipated and planned for everything. Three months later I was diagnosed with cancer. Okay, didn't see that one coming. I got through it, and we delivered on our promises. Not that getting cancer was a good thing, but having to face the real possibility of my early demise certainly helped me to recalibrate my life priorities. That said, we have, and will continue to, work through any and all challenges that come our way in order to uphold our commitments to ourselves and our Backers.

story:
Hi All! Meet "Urbanoider" knife! 

A sophisticated technological and mechanic device in two versions, and friction. 

Created specifically for urban residents and travelers. 

1size, 2 basic version: Stainless Steel and Damask Steel. 

+1 Friction version (new): Damask Friction.

+1 Friction version (super new): Copper Friction Folder.

Aesthetics of Exploitation from the Guru of Knife Crafting. 

It is made of 14 metal elements. A lot of trendy stuff. As a workers, we know the value of such a device when it is necessary to carry with it its large knife with minimal time for its extraction and application. 
   Friction version draws legality. Although this gizmo generally difficult to identify due to its super compact size.

 

Super compact and forged. 

We did it because no one had done this before!

The body of (CHROME VERSION) 420 steel . 

The body of (DAMASCUS VERSION) Damask steel.

Its feature is that it is forged, also it almost does not scratch. 

  •  

 Ultra stable cutting edge. 

We want you to sharpen only with our knife. Can be used like a second or third knife in gear, depends on your attachment to knives. Or as a keychain for any resident of the urban and traveler.   

Wearable device. 

Patriotism presupposes pride in the achievements and culture of its homeland, the desire to preserve its character and cultural characteristics and identify itself. 

Characteristics of the blade.

Everyone who does not recognize cheap knives knows about the steel of D2 - we use it exactly. 
 For the blade, this steel is ideal, has excellent cutting properties, resistant to corrosion. This brand was created especially for cold weapons 100 years ago. One of the oldest steels.  

The garment body is assembled manually.

The garment body is assembled manually. Due to this, dust and dirt are minimally contaminated by the mechanism.

By the way, the entire internal mechanism is made of stainless steel - which ensures its durability.
 The knife is disassembled with a screwdriver. Any mechanism, in case of failure, can be replaced by yourself.

Strategy. 

To participate in the discussion, clarify details and generally communicate with other backers of the project, visit and place on our page https://www.facebook.com/urbanoider 

Follow URBANOIDER...


The problem of unreliability is determined by manual adjustment of the mechanism, individually to each unit. This will be the only manual process, since the error of the previous Urban Kukri project was taken into account - it's completely manual, it's beautiful, but fraught with postponements for a couple of months. 
The purpose of the project for the alliance ManualCraft is the purchase of several automatic machines to create more complex forms at a price affordable for a wide range of users.

story:
Campaign

As a new startup, we have listened to you the diver and we have gone back to what we are about -the Protection, the Education and the Sustainability for all, of the marine environment.

Support us to help remote communities help their environment!

We want Manta Rays to be around for generations to come!

 

Who is Pelagic Dive Travel?

My name is Terry Smith and I am the founder of Pelagic Dive Travel.

Pelagic Dive Travel was born out of my frustration. I have been diving for over 17 years & 14 of those as a Dive Instructor. I couldn't match what I wanted to see, which was a Whaleshark, with my dates of travel. After hours of research, I finally found a liveaboard only to discover it was fully booked.

With my travel background and my diving knowledge, I have created a platform with an ease of search and booking so you don't need to spend hours searching. We are live at Pelagic Dive Travel.

 

Our ask

We are looking for $5000AUD all or nothing campaign.

This campaign is about our core value - the marine environment -  its protection, sustainability & education. 

Starting close to home, the Great Barrier Reef, Cairns, Queensland, Australia, we will work with the Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef and Reef Teach. 

Everyone has heard and is concerned about the Great Barrier Reef. Working with the Citizens - who are about the circular economy - recycle, cutting waste & how overall your footprint effects the world; and Reef Teach - education about the marine environment and how we affect it directly; we see what we can do, about helping the Great Barrier Reef. Then as we go we look at the plastic issue around Indonesia.

The funds will be used to source local dive operators in the remote regions, look at ways we can help the local communities with education, sustainability and the protection of the marine environments. We will have people visit & then create dive charters into these areas, offer new dive locations, exploration, but more importantly, it's about visiting local communities and connecting divers to them. The local communities in these remote regions are the key to the survival of our marine species.

Help us start this quest for a cleaner & healthy marine world! 

 

Our Perks

  • $30 AUD - Great Barrier Reef Pack - everyone should visit the Great Barrier Reef! You receive two Fish ID slates - used underwater, 101 Great Barrier Reef animals booklet + a night at Reef Teach - learn about the marine world from qualified biologist + have access to the biologist for Life! RRP value $49

  • $49 AUD - T-shirt  - get a licensed t-shirt featuring an artwork by renowned Cairns-based Indigenous artist Brian Robinson - T-shirt is 100% eco cotton. RRP $69

  • $100 AUD - Savings - get a licensed t-shirt featuring an artwork, & you receive a $75 savings voucher off your next booking. RRP $169

  • $300 AUD - HUGE savings - get a licensed t-shirt featuring an artwork and $600 USD off a Siren Fleet Liveaboard. RRP +$600

Who is Brian Robinson?

"The spirit and natural world are so intertwined that one influences the other, and is essential to the everyday existence of the Torres Strait Island people, their culture, and their beliefs." 

Read his bio here.

Robinson's work has contributed significantly to the environs of Cairns, Australia through a number of major public art installations, including the signature five stainless steel woven fish sculptures and fountain installed on the Cairns Esplanade in 2003. And more recently the Citizens Gateway to the Great Barrier Reef public sculpture from which the Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef logo is derived.

To support the Pelagic Dive Travel campaign, Brian Robinson is licensing his original artwork for reproduction on a limited number of t-shirts.

Image credit - on t-shirts

Brian Robinson, Waru l (2010)
linocut printed in black ink from one block, 40 x 57.5cm

© Brian Robinson/Copyright Agency, 2018.

Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef?

Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef is a new type of organization. They are the world’s first collaborative movement for the Reef – a #CoMo not a #NoCo. 

They take a unique, data-driven approach to reef conservation that’s powered by you. From citizen science to sustainable fashion to ditching single-use plastics – everyone has a part to play.

Their connected platform brings together people, projects, and organizations from across the Reef and around the world. United they will inspire participation, collaboration and collective impact on a global scale.

 

What is Reef Teach?

Reef Teach is Cairn’s unique education center for The Great Barrier Reef. They believe that “with learning comes appreciation” and the knowledge you gain from Reef Teach will help you to better understand and enjoy your visit to The Great Barrier Reef.

The presentation is given by qualified marine biologists (all have PhD’s or MSc degrees), who aim to educate, inspire and enthuse visitors to the Great Barrier Reef about this unique and incredible place.

A must see before going out to the reef ( Tripadvisor agrees)

Why contribute you may ask?

You are supporting local communities and local dive operators who all have a common goal - support the marine world.

Our perks are based on this. Every t-shirt contribution has a portion going to Brian Robinson, the artist, and to the Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef. The Great Barrier Reef pack supports Reef Teach as the Fish ID cards are their design/ copyright.

We source quality, safe dive operators/ providers in remote areas where their source of income is based on the marine life they see and care for each day. As divers, we want to protect remote areas and the marine life in them.

This sourcing will lead to increased sustainable tourism for the communities to help further protect their livelihoods.

The company

Pelagic Dive Travel has been through a successful start-up Horizons Accelerator program and has backers behind us. We need your support to become the leading independent dive travel provider & an advocate for the marine world!

As proud supporters of the Citizens of the Great Barrier Reef, we offer a 10% savings on all bookings for each citizen, and, 2% of the total booking will be donated to the organization if traveling to the Great Barrier Reef in any part of their trip.

Everyone booked and traveling through Cairns receives a complementary Reef Teach presentation before departing to the reef!

Action

Support us get the word out & we will become the Leading Independent Dive Travel

We support local communities & the environment.

Grab a Perk & share on social media!

We hope to see you on your next Dive Discovery!

Video Overlay with Manta & Plastic - Credits to:

TheJetlagged_ThePatternsOfTheOcean_Still_15_Manta_Swimming_Through_Plastic_Photographer_SteveWoods

story:
TALK TO THE MICRO BLUETOOTH IN YOUR HELMET AND HOP ! IT'S EASY 
 
EASY ALSO IN YOUR CAR 

  FOUR YOUR BIKE ,FOR YOUR CAR, FOR YOUR SAFETY

 

Traduction en Français sous l'Anglais .

IN ENGLISH:

    ​Vidéo en Français ci dessous 

 

 

                   MotoChat will allow you to thank, interact, inform and say many things you could not do before. MotoChat vous permettra de remercier, d'interagir, d'informer et de dire beaucoup de choses que vous ne pouviez pas faire auparavant.

 

      Be more visible and understood when you retrograd or brake. Soyez plus visible et mieux compris quand vous rétrogradez ou freinez .      

 

                                                                                         

   We will protect your arrears in case of emergency braking. Nous allons protéger vos arrières en cas de freinage d'urgence.

 

                                                           Communicate

 

In the event of a fall, if the gyroscope detects an angle greater than 67 degrees of inclination of the motorcycle, the system sends a warning message without subscription to a prerecorded number. Your GPRS location is transmitted to locate you.                                                                            En cas de chute, si le gyroscope détecte un angle supérieur à 67 degrés d'inclinaison de la moto, le système envoie un message d'avertissement sans abonnement à un numéro préenregistré. Votre emplacement GPRS est transmis pour vous localiser.

 

 

 

 
The European Union imposes from April 1 to manufacturers to equip their new cars with the ECALL 112 system. Emergency call alert system and GPS tracking in case of major accident. Carchat can equip your vehicle. L'union Européenne impose à partir du 1 er Avril aux constructeurs d'équiper leurs voitures neuves du système ECALL 112 . Systeme d'alerte automatique d'appel des secours et de localisation GPS en cas d'accident majeur . Carchat peut équiper votre véhicule .  
 
 

In case of accident, MotoChat sends an SMS to a chosen number of your phonebook with your GPS position. En cas d'accident, MotoChat envoie un SMS à un numéro choisi de votre répertoire avec votre position GPS.
 
 

A 3-axis gyroscope accelerometer measures your speed and angle. A GPRS Tracker locates you. Un accéléromètre gyroscope à 3 axes mesure votre vitesse et votre angle. Un Tracker GPRS vous localise.

 

The system is plug and play, without connection and synchronized by Bluetooth with your smartphone and microphone.Le système est plug and play, sans connexion et synchronisé par Bluetooth avec votre smartphone et votre micro.

 

 

Motochat and Carchat, the future friends on the road. Les futurs amis sur la route .

 

With our Hydro Transfer, we can create almost all your desires.Avec notre Hydro transfert, nous pouvons créer presque toutes vos envies

 

 

IN THE COLOR OF YOUR BIKE

 

                                              MotoChat All around the world 

OURS PARTNERS

AUDIOVISUAL PRODUCTION COMPANY       www.wdroneproduction.com

 

ELECTRONICS MANUFACTURING SERVICES

 

WEBMASTER/SEO

 

GRAPHIST DESIGNER

 

3D PRINTING

 

TOUR OPERATOR / FRENCH 2CV RENTAL

 

HYDRO TRANSFERT PRINTING

 

I'm a biker forever and the rest of the team too and we all have this biker spirit. We are part of a community with that passion and freedom that are our . We will do our best to satisfy you and ensure your safety on the road is better. 
The development of an innovation is always a risk and problems can arise but we have been working for several years and the MotoChat has become real and functional and we master the challenge. 
We will come back with you in the production phase, we have thought of everything but maybe you will have suggestions and we will take the time to study them to improve. MotoChat and Carchat will make a revolution in our biker community and in traffic in general . 
We will communicate daily so that you can follow MotoChat production and meet all your expectations. 
​WHY DO I NEED YOU ? 
Because you are going to need us! 
We believe very strongly in our biker community and the desire of ALL to ride safer and we need you to finalize this innovation that will change the way we live on the road and protect ourselves.

Have a good trip and be careful ! 

Je suis motard depuis toujours et le reste de l'équipe aussi . Nous faisons partie d'une communauté avec cette passion et cette liberté que nous défendons . Nous ferons de notre mieux pour vous satisfaire et assurer votre sécurité sur la route. 
Le développement d'une innovation est toujours un risque et des problèmes peuvent survenir mais nous travaillons depuis plusieurs années et MotoChat est devenu réel et fonctionnel. 
Nous allons rentrer avec vous dans la phase de production, vous aurez sûrement des suggestions et nous les examinerons au cas par cas . MotoChat va transformer notre façon de circuler , nous l'espérons fortement . 
Nous communiquerons avec vous autant que nécessaire sur l'évolution de la production de Motochat et Carchat et répondrons à toutes vos questions. 
POURQUOI AVONS NOUS BESOIN DE VOUS? 
Parce que vous allez avoir besoin de nous! 
Nous croyons très fortement en notre communauté de motards et le désir de tous de rouler plus en sécurité et nous devons finaliser cette innovation qui va changer notre façon de vivre sur la route et nous protéger.Faire de la route un plaisir 

Bonne route et soyez prudent .

 

F.A.Q

The CARCHAT system does not have ignition on braking, nor the warning of Warning like the MOTOCHAT, it possesses a fixing system for the rear shelf, the rest is similar.

What's for the O.S ? MotoChat is compatible with the majority of O.S, IOS , ANDROID 

And with an Intercom? MotoChat does not create conflicts with Intercoms because it uses its own frequency.

And with an Intercom on appeal ? In case of a call or a conversation on an Intercom, you can switch off Motochat from a simple voice command "Stop"

MotoChat is it waterproof, resistant to shocks, vibrations? We did a lot of road tests, in all seasons, on dirt road , Karsher sessions and we do not deplore any failure

MotoChat is visible how far and how fast? We did tests in full sun and at speeds above the authorized speeds and MotoChat remains visible until at least 19 meters away.

How fast is the microphone active? The microphone and voice recognition works smoothly at normal open visor speeds, well beyond that we advise you to close your visor and articulate well

How does MotoChat recharge and how long? The charging time varies depending on the use you make during your trip but our tests have given us up to 7:30 in intensive use. For charging, just open the mounting plate, out MotoChat module and plug it into AC power or a PC, the recharge time is usually less than an hour.

Can I fix the MotoChat support plate myself on my bike? For fixing your turntable it takes 5 minutes. It is without difficulty, you must dismount your current license plate, insert the MotoChat turntable underneath, drill in the same places and reassemble all together with the rivets we provide you or your current system. A professional can do this in less than 5 minutes

Can I choose the display mode? You have the ability to choose the fixed or dropdown mode for your written message. You can adjust the display and playback speed and you can adjust the intensity of the brightness. You will find all our help on the user manual.

OF COURSE YOU 'LL HAVE MORE QUESTIONS BUT WE'LL BE THERE TO ANSWER YOU 

 

 Le systeme CARCHAT ne possède pas l'allumage au freinage , ni l'alerte de Warning comme le MOTOCHAT , il possède un système de fixation pour la plage arrière , le reste est similaire 

Et la compatibilité avec mon Smartphone ? MotoChat est compatible avec la plupart des systèmes d'exploitation O.S. IOS et ANDROID

Et avec un Intercom ? MotoChat ne crée pas de conflit avec les interphones car il utilise sa propre fréquence.

Et avec un Intercom en appel? En cas d'appel ou de conversation sur un Intercom, vous pouvez désactiver Motochat à partir d'une simple commande vocale "Stop".

MotoChat est-il étanche , résistant aux chocs, aux vibrations? Nous avons fait beaucoup de tests sur route, en toutes saisons, dans les chemins , les sessions de Karsher et nous n'avons constaté aucune défaillance .

Quelle est la visibilité de MotoChat et jusqu'à quelle vitesse? Nous avons testé en plein soleil et à des vitesses supérieures aux vitesses légales et MotoChat reste visible jusqu'à au moins 19 mètres.

Jusqu'à quelle vitesse le microphone est-il actif? Le microphone et la reconnaissance vocale fonctionnent sans soucis à des vitesses légales , bien au-delà mais après nous vous conseillons de fermer votre visière et bien articuler.

L'application de localisation nécessite t'elle un abonnement ? Non , Motochat fonctionne avec une carte Sim de n'importe quel opérateur en Edge , GPRS

Comment se charge le MotoChat et en combien de temps? Le temps de charge varie en fonction de l'utilisation que vous en faites pendant votre voyage mais nos tests nous ont permis d'utiliser jusqu'à 7h30 en utilisation intensive. Pour charger, il suffit d'ouvrir la platine de fixation , de retirer le module MotoChat et de le brancher sur le secteur ou sur un PC, le temps de charge est généralement inférieur à une heure .

Puis-je fixer la plaque de support MotoChat moi-même sur ma moto ? Pour la fixation de votre platine il faut 5 minutes. C'est facile, vous devez démonter votre plaque d'immatriculation actuelle, insérer la platine MotoChat en dessous, percer dans les mêmes endroits et ré-assembler tout ensemble avec les rivets que nous vous fournissons ou votre système actuel. Un professionnel peut le faire en moins de 5 minutes.

Puis je chosir le mode d'affichage ? Vous avez la capacité de choisir le mode fixe ou déroulant pour votre message écrit . Vous pouvez régler la vitesse d'affichage et de déroulement et vous pouvez régler l'intensité de la luminosité . Vous retrouverez toutes nos aides sur le mode d'emploi.

Bien sûr, vous aurez d'autres questions mais nous serons là pour vous répondre
story_txt:
TALK TO THE MICRO BLUETOOTH IN YOUR HELMET AND HOP ! IT'S EASY  
EASY ALSO IN YOUR CAR 

  FOUR YOUR BIKE ,FOR YOUR CAR, FOR YOUR SAFETY Traduction en Français sous l'Anglais .IN ENGLISH:    ​Vidéo en Français ci dessous                      MotoChat will allow you to thank, interact, inform and say many things you could not do before. MotoChat vous permettra de remercier, d'interagir, d'informer et de dire beaucoup de choses que vous ne pouviez pas faire auparavant.       Be more visible and understood when you retrograd or brake. Soyez plus visible et mieux compris quand vous rétrogradez ou freinez .                                                                                                   We will protect your arrears in case of emergency braking. Nous allons protéger vos arrières en cas de freinage d'urgence.                                                            Communicate In the event of a fall, if the gyroscope detects an angle greater than 67 degrees of inclination of the motorcycle, the system sends a warning message without subscription to a prerecorded number. Your GPRS location is transmitted to locate you.                                                                            En cas de chute, si le gyroscope détecte un angle supérieur à 67 degrés d'inclinaison de la moto, le système envoie un message d'avertissement sans abonnement à un numéro préenregistré. Votre emplacement GPRS est transmis pour vous localiser.    The European Union imposes from April 1 to manufacturers to equip their new cars with the ECALL 112 system. Emergency call alert system and GPS tracking in case of major accident. Carchat can equip your vehicle. L'union Européenne impose à partir du 1 er Avril aux constructeurs d'équiper leurs voitures neuves du système ECALL 112 . Systeme d'alerte automatique d'appel des secours et de localisation GPS en cas d'accident majeur . Carchat peut équiper votre véhicule .    In case of accident, MotoChat sends an SMS to a chosen number of your phonebook with your GPS position. En cas d'accident, MotoChat envoie un SMS à un numéro choisi de votre répertoire avec votre position GPS.  A 3-axis gyroscope accelerometer measures your speed and angle. A GPRS Tracker locates you. Un accéléromètre gyroscope à 3 axes mesure votre vitesse et votre angle. Un Tracker GPRS vous localise. The system is plug and play, without connection and synchronized by Bluetooth with your smartphone and microphone.Le système est plug and play, sans connexion et synchronisé par Bluetooth avec votre smartphone et votre micro.  Motochat and Carchat, the future friends on the road. Les futurs amis sur la route . With our Hydro Transfer, we can create almost all your desires.Avec notre Hydro transfert, nous pouvons créer presque toutes vos envies  IN THE COLOR OF YOUR BIKE                                               MotoChat All around the world OURS PARTNERSAUDIOVISUAL PRODUCTION COMPANY       www.wdroneproduction.com ELECTRONICS MANUFACTURING SERVICES WEBMASTER/SEO GRAPHIST DESIGNER 3D PRINTING TOUR OPERATOR / FRENCH 2CV RENTAL HYDRO TRANSFERT PRINTING I'm a biker forever and the rest of the team too and we all have this biker spirit. We are part of a community with that passion and freedom that are our . We will do our best to satisfy you and ensure your safety on the road is better. The development of an innovation is always a risk and problems can arise but we have been working for several years and the MotoChat has become real and functional and we master the challenge. We will come back with you in the production phase, we have thought of everything but maybe you will have suggestions and we will take the time to study them to improve. MotoChat and Carchat will make a revolution in our biker community and in traffic in general . We will communicate daily so that you can follow MotoChat production and meet all your expectations. ​WHY DO I NEED YOU ? Because you are going to need us! We believe very strongly in our biker community and the desire of ALL to ride safer and we need you to finalize this innovation that will change the way we live on the road and protect ourselves.Have a good trip and be careful ! Je suis motard depuis toujours et le reste de l'équipe aussi . Nous faisons partie d'une communauté avec cette passion et cette liberté que nous défendons . Nous ferons de notre mieux pour vous satisfaire et assurer votre sécurité sur la route. Le développement d'une innovation est toujours un risque et des problèmes peuvent survenir mais nous travaillons depuis plusieurs années et MotoChat est devenu réel et fonctionnel. Nous allons rentrer avec vous dans la phase de production, vous aurez sûrement des suggestions et nous les examinerons au cas par cas . MotoChat va transformer notre façon de circuler , nous l'espérons fortement . Nous communiquerons avec vous autant que nécessaire sur l'évolution de la production de Motochat et Carchat et répondrons à toutes vos questions. POURQUOI AVONS NOUS BESOIN DE VOUS? Parce que vous allez avoir besoin de nous! Nous croyons très fortement en notre communauté de motards et le désir de tous de rouler plus en sécurité et nous devons finaliser cette innovation qui va changer notre façon de vivre sur la route et nous protéger.Faire de la route un plaisir Bonne route et soyez prudent . F.A.QThe CARCHAT system does not have ignition on braking, nor the warning of Warning like the MOTOCHAT, it possesses a fixing system for the rear shelf, the rest is similar.What's for the O.S ? MotoChat is compatible with the majority of O.S, IOS , ANDROID And with an Intercom? MotoChat does not create conflicts with Intercoms because it uses its own frequency.And with an Intercom on appeal ? In case of a call or a conversation on an Intercom, you can switch off Motochat from a simple voice command "Stop"MotoChat is it waterproof, resistant to shocks, vibrations? We did a lot of road tests, in all seasons, on dirt road , Karsher sessions and we do not deplore any failureMotoChat is visible how far and how fast? We did tests in full sun and at speeds above the authorized speeds and MotoChat remains visible until at least 19 meters away.How fast is the microphone active? The microphone and voice recognition works smoothly at normal open visor speeds, well beyond that we advise you to close your visor and articulate wellHow does MotoChat recharge and how long? The charging time varies depending on the use you make during your trip but our tests have given us up to 7:30 in intensive use. A professional can do this in less than 5 minutesCan I choose the display mode? You have the ability to choose the fixed or dropdown mode for your written message.
