story:
Follow our progress at:

TheMagnetStrap.com

 

The Magnet Strap

 

Where Have We Been All Your Life?

Introducing the world's first ratchet strap tie-down with a patented magnetic hook and proprietary quick release ratchet for fast loading and easy unloading.

  • Single-handedly secure cargo and equipment for transport with a hook that stays exactly where you put it while you go around the load to operate the ratchet.
  • A quick tug on the Quick Release Ratchet with Easy Pull Lanyard™ releases the tension upon arrival without busting your knuckles.

No matter what you're hauling, experience Loading Joy with the Magnet Strap.

 

The Ratchet Strap Dance

We’ve all experienced the unique frustration of being invited to this dance before:

Hook goes on, now throw strap over. Hook falls off; let's start over.

Hook goes on, head 'round the trailer, grab thrown end, oops - hook's a bailer.

Swing back 'round and put hook on. Hook falls off; feeling conned.

Swing back 'round, to start the ratchet, only to learn, the hook didn't catch it.

Around your partner, do-si-do; around your partner, here we go.

No one knows when this waltz will end. All I know is: I need a friend!

 

A Better Way: The Magnet Strap

 

It's All In The Hook

We think Morpheus said it best: “What you know you can't explain, but you feel it. You've felt it your entire life, that there's something wrong with the world. You don't know what it is, but it's there, like a splinter in your mind, driving you mad.”

What if I told you there is a better way? Seems like such an obvious solution, I wonder why we didn’t collectively think of it sooner: A magnetic hook! *smacks forehead*

Imagine a world where a ratchet strap’s hook stays EXACTLY where you put it when you toss the strap over AND it is still there when you get to the other side! Feed it through the ratchet and start tightening - IT’S STILL THERE! What a world we could be living in!

 

A Better Ratchet

Releasing traditional ratchets can be a real knuckle busting experience that showcases your capacity as a finger contortionist - or lack thereof.  Especially in cold weather, when you have to take off your gloves to slip what have apparently become very fat fingers into the tiny underbelly of a ratchet smaller than the palm of your hand. Once you are in that awkward space, you have only the wiggle in the tips of your fingers to tug on a metal clip that seems to be bound up - yet again. What are we, elves with slender fingers and legendary dexterity?!?

The proprietary Quick Release Ratchet with Easy Pull Lanyard™ on the Magnet Strap makes it a breeze to release the ratchet with just 1 or 2 fingers. Simply hold down the top button and pull on the Lanyard - you don't even have to open the ratchet - and it will provide even tension across the brake to ensure it will not bind.

 

Get a Grip on Non-Ferrous

We’re also going to have a stainless steel O-ring installed on every Magnet Strap to facilitate a good grip on non-ferrous trucks and trailers. A quick loop around an edge, put the hook through the ring, and you’ll hear that satiating SNAP as the hook grabs on to the ring. It will be held in place while you start tightening the ratchet, at which point the O-Ring settles in the crook of the hook to avoid uneven pressure on the magnet.

A handy feature, the steel O-ring gives the Magnet Strap unparalleled versatility:

  • Use the O-Ring for elegant bundling of loose but long cargo, such as lumber and pipes, in a way that won't budge an inch until released.
  • Use the O-Rings on multiple Magnet Straps to create a telescoping cargo net of ANY size!
  • Securely load odds and ends with the confidence of geometry.

 

 

Campaign Perks

 

Arrives By Christmas:

1" Magnet Straps with S-Hooks (~800 Pound Load Strength)

Production components assembled in New Mexico. Each 1" Magnet Strap with S-Hooks includes a Magnetic S-Hook, Quick Release Ratchet with Easy Pull Lanyard and Steel S-Hook, Steel O-Ring, and 15' of heavy duty 1" polyester strap. Available in:

  • 2 Pack in Plastic Bag - $40
  • 3 Pack in Plastic Case - $55
  • 3 Pack in Ammo Box - $55
  • 4 Pack in Plastic Bag - $75
  • 6 Pack in Ammo Can - $110
  • 2 Pack of Just Quick Release Ratchets - $20

 

Arrives Early 2020:

1 to 4" Magnet Straps with Double J and Flat Hooks (> 1,000 Pound Load Strength) 

Pre-order from our first factory produced Magnet Straps. Each 1 and 2" Magnet Strap includes a Magnetic J or Flat Hook, Quick Release Ratchet with Easy Pull Lanyard and Steel Hook, Steel O-Ring, and 15' of heavy duty 2" polyester strap. The 4" Magnetic Flat Strap is designed for use with flat bed semi trailer winch systems and each strap includes a Magnetic Flat Hook, Steel O-Ring, and 30' of heavy duty 4" polyester strap.

  • 1" Strap with 3/4" Flat Hooks - 2 @ $50, 4 @ $95 (~1,000 Pound Load Strength)
  • 2" Strap with 2" Flat Hooks - 2 @ $60, 4 @ $115 (~3,000 Pound Load Strength)
  • 2" Strap with 2" Double J-Hooks - 2 @ $60, 4 @ $115 (~3,000 Pound Load Strength)
  • 4" Strap with 4" Flat Hooks - 4 @ $80, 8 @ $155 (>5,000 Pound Load Strength)

 

Custom Perks

Indiegogo allows us to add perks throughout the campaign and make what they call "hidden" perks. Reach out to us (contact@theMagnetStrap.com or 575.208.4558) if you want to customize your order or to arrange shipping outside of the States. 

 

The Process: Introducing Innovation

 

More Than an Idea

Functionally, the Magnet Strap is production-ready.

  • Designed - The basic working concept is complete
  • Patented - Patent protection has been awarded for the Magnet Strap
  • Prototyped - Several prototypes have been built to prove the concept's effectiveness
  • Sourced - Due diligence including factory visits has been completed and competent, flexible manufacturing partners have been selected
  • Small Batches Manufactured - Using production quality components, we have begun the process of testing our claims

 

Project Milestones

Phase  Description S-Hook Straps Double J-Hook Straps Flat Hook Straps
1

Prototype Models

  • Handcrafted models built to prove the concept and act as a visual and mechanical aid in the design process
  • Samples built with production level components for real world testing
 ☑ ☑ ☑
2

Identify Suppliers

  • Identify multiple factories. Meet with them and tour their facilities
  • Select factory that meets our needs and obtain factory production quality samples
 ☑ ☑ ☑
3

Testing & Re-Design

  • Identify testing facilities with experience and equipment for testing our product's limits
  • Test factory production quality samples and modify the design as needed to exceed target claims
 ☑ In Progress In Progress
4

Fund Raising

  • Start crowdfunding campaign, reach out to personal networks and engage with newcomers for feedback and pre-orders
  • Contact relevant media outlets and other influencers to help spread the word
 In Progress In Progress In Progress
5

Place Opening Order

  • Place crowdfunded opening order with factory

  • Visit facility to oversee production startup and approve first offs

 NOV 19 DEC 19 DEC 19
6

Distributing Perks

  • Arrange for receiving, storage, and distribution of the first Magnet Straps to our magnanimous supporters
  • Arrange meetings with key retailers to show factory produced product samples
 FEB 20 MAR 20 MAR 20
7

Retail Ready & Long-Term Logistics

  • Establish supply chain and marketing infrastructure to support retail launches
  • Initial SKUs determined; model numbers and UPCs assigned
  • Packaging developed, samples approved
 MAY 20 JUN 20 JUN 20


 

What We Need: The "Crowdlaunch"

 

Maintaining Momentum

We've come a long way, yet we still have a long way to go.

Our goals with this IndieGoGo campaign are threefold:

  • We need to develop a commercially viable product program
  • We need to gain your insights and feedback
  • We need you to pre-order your Magnet Strap today to help fund our first factory production run and retail launch

 

Commercially Viable Product Program

Take a look around and you’ll see dozens of cargo securing solutions on the market today. Endless variations can be made with minor changes to hooks, straps, or ratchets in different colors, materials, lengths, widths, etc. If we pursued every iteration that struck our fancy, we’d have an impossible number of SKUs that would bog down our production startup.

We also understand retail merchants are biased against adding a single product from a brand-new vendor to their permanent in-store selection. Instead of taking on a small mountain of paperwork, they’ll offer one-off promotional opportunities, or stick us in a regional test where we are required to significantly outperform multinational incumbents – just to get an invitation to compete for shelf space.

To avoid the fate of flash-in-the-pan products that were good for a quick buck, we need to be ready for fickle retailers that don’t have our best interests in mind. We can’t go into production with just the 1” S-Hook style strap and ask them to give it a shot. Instead, we need to bring them a comprehensive, commercially viable product program that appeals to key constituents across multiple demographics.

Most importantly, we need to give our early retailers a choice beyond yes or no. We need to show them a range of retail-ready solutions for them to consider, giving them some control over how they will compete in the open market.

The initial Magnet Strap Family of Products (Prototypes Shown)

 

 

Your Insights & Feedback

We have a pretty cool idea, but we are NOT all knowing. PLEASE engage with us here, on social media, or send us an email at contact@theMagnetStrap.com to let us know what you think. What are we doing wrong? What are we doing right? What haven't we considered? Which feature do you love the most?

There are a number of ways to secure funding for a startup business like ours. But, we're a small team and we know that nothing will help guide us better than an actively engaged group of potential end users. If adjustments are needed, now is the time to make them, because we want you to be thrilled to buy a pack when you see them in stores.

While we hope you'll support this campaign by purchasing your favorite perk listed to the right, we also hope you'll follow us, tag us, and share our story with your friends. The more people hear about us, the more feedback we'll get before we're officially in the market.

 

Funding

Trust is earned over time. Unfortunately, we don't have that luxury in our relationship with you. It is important to remember that we're not asking for long term investments in our success. We're simply asking you to believe we're up to the task of picking out a capable manufacturer, finding a reliable production facility and placing an order with both. We've already proven the design with incredibly durable working prototypes and we are confident in this product's potential commercial success. All combined, our team has well over 40 years of experience in bringing hundreds of products from concept to retail markets around the world.

With the proceeds of this campaign, we will be funding these key objectives:

  • Product Testing & Design
  • Packaging Development & Sampling
  • Production Startup
  • Transit & Distribution Expense
  • Inventory for Retail Samples/Testing and eCommerce Sales

 

 

Who We Are: Dank Art Enterprises

 

This is Me, Ron Dankert

I’m just a regular guy who has grown weary with everyday frustrations and a lack of what I see as easy solutions that will make life easier… better. Just because we've always done it this way, doesn't mean there isn't a better way to get it done.

I feel like I have a million ideas in my head that would surely make my life an easier place to be, so I decided to get started on the Magnet Strap in my "spare" time and established Dank Art Enterprises. With the help and support of my amazing wife, my wonderful children, and some great friends, I'm thrilled to be making one of my ideas come to life!

It will be a dream come true when I can go into a store where most of us currently get our ratchet straps without a second thought and see the Magnet Strap alongside the products produced by industry giants. We all deserve a choice between the ho hum and something better. 

 

Our Mission

Our promise to you is simple: We will always strive to Build Better Gear. Our team's goal is to create excellence in innovation for safer, smarter, better and easier-to-use tools. We take pride in our products and we want to provide you with the best tools to accomplish the task at hand.

 

In Our Corner

Sandia National Laboratories

  • Just last month, we were awarded a grant by Sandia National Laboratories, which is a HUGE win for us. To make sure our design is impeccable and that everything is being manufactured to perfection, we were facing a lot of resources being devoted to testing facilities.
  • We’re told this sort of work is right up their alley and that we have a home state advantage. With scientists assigned to a project they are experienced with and are also likely to consider us as a pet project they're rooting for, we're sure to develop an impossibly robust and well-thought-out ratchet strap.

Patent Protection

  • That’s right. We’re the only ones doing this.

Simple Concept Utilizing Existing Technologies

  • We didn’t invent hooks, straps, ratchets, or magnets. Each of these components are being manufactured the world over and in some cases for hundreds of years. This isn’t a complex project fraught with potential technical difficulties.

The Centipede Guys

  • 6 years and a couple months ago, Ed Adkins and Keith Fyhr started right here on IndieGoGo to launch Ed’s invention – the Centipede Sawhorse. Exactly 2 years later, their innovation was launched at thousands of stores nationwide, including at big box behemoths Home Depot and Lowes. Their product can now be found at around 5,000 locations in at least 24 countries across the globe.
  • As a fellow resident of Truth or Consequences in New Mexico, I’ve had the privilege of meeting Ed, and he loves the Magnet Strap. He’s bought in at a hands-on level and has been lending the full weight of his design and sourcing expertise.
  • Ed introduced me to Keith, who has also fallen in love with the concept. His product management skills and experience in all things digital are a huge weight off my shoulders.

 

Ready or Not, Here we Come!

I've been engineering and re-engineering this concept for 5 years now. In it for the long haul, I am thrilled to see things really coming together - and picking up steam! With a small team in place dedicated to helping me build momentum, the inevitability of our launch has become palpable. You will be seeing the Magnet Strap in stores. The only question is, will you be a part of what made that possible?

 

Please. Lend a Hand.

  1. Pre-order your Magnet Straps today by selecting a perk to the right. Even if think you're good on straps for now, we all know one can never really have enough, and who doesn't love giving gifts?
  2. Show our campaign to the folks in your life who you know are going to love it.
  3. Share our campaign to your online networks and discover who else loves it as much as you do.
  4. Engage with us. Follow our accounts, leave comments, and share our posts. Know that each time you do, you'll have made someone's day with a couple clicks of your mouse.

Check us Out:

O-Ring = Cargo Net Versatility:

4" Strap with 4" Flat Hooks - 4 @ $80, 8 @ $155 (>5,000 Pound Load Strength)
 Custom PerksIndiegogo allows us to add perks throughout the campaign and make what they call "hidden" perks. Reach out to us (contact@theMagnetStrap.com or 575.208.4558) if you want to customize your order or to arrange shipping outside of the States.  The Process: Introducing Innovation More Than an IdeaFunctionally, the Magnet Strap is production-ready.

Designed - The basic working concept is complete

Patented - Patent protection has been awarded for the Magnet Strap

Prototyped - Several prototypes have been built to prove the concept's effectiveness

Sourced - Due diligence including factory visits has been completed and competent, flexible manufacturing partners have been selected

Small Batches Manufactured - Using production quality components, we have begun the process of testing our claims
 Project Milestones

Phase
 Description
S-Hook Straps
Double J-Hook Straps
Flat Hook Straps

Prototype Models

Handcrafted models built to prove the concept and act as a visual and mechanical aid in the design process

Select factory that meets our needs and obtain factory production quality samples

Test factory production quality samples and modify the design as needed to exceed target claims

Contact relevant media outlets and other influencers to help spread the word

Visit facility to oversee production startup and approve first offs

Distributing Perks

Arrange for receiving, storage, and distribution of the first Magnet Straps to our magnanimous supporters
Arrange meetings with key retailers to show factory produced product samples


FEB 20

7

Retail Ready & Long-Term Logistics

Establish supply chain and marketing infrastructure to support retail launches
Initial SKUs determined; model numbers and UPCs assigned

MAY 20

JUN 20



 What We Need: The "Crowdlaunch" Maintaining MomentumWe've come a long way, yet we still have a long way to go.Our goals with this IndieGoGo campaign are threefold:
We need to develop a commercially viable product program
We need to gain your insights and feedback
We need you to pre-order your Magnet Strap today to help fund our first factory production run and retail launch
 Commercially Viable Product ProgramTake a look around and you’ll see dozens of cargo securing solutions on the market today. Endless variations can be made with minor changes to hooks, straps, or ratchets in different colors, materials, lengths, widths, etc. If we pursued every iteration that struck our fancy, we’d have an impossible number of SKUs that would bog down our production startup.We also understand retail merchants are biased against adding a single product from a brand-new vendor to their permanent in-store selection. Instead of taking on a small mountain of paperwork, they’ll offer one-off promotional opportunities, or stick us in a regional test where we are required to significantly outperform multinational incumbents – just to get an invitation to compete for shelf space.To avoid the fate of flash-in-the-pan products that were good for a quick buck, we need to be ready for fickle retailers that don’t have our best interests in mind. We can’t go into production with just the 1” S-Hook style strap and ask them to give it a shot. Instead, we need to bring them a comprehensive, commercially viable product program that appeals to key constituents across multiple demographics.Most importantly, we need to give our early retailers a choice beyond yes or no. We need to show them a range of retail-ready solutions for them to consider, giving them some control over how they will compete in the open market.The initial Magnet Strap Family of Products (Prototypes Shown)  Your Insights & FeedbackWe have a pretty cool idea, but we are NOT all knowing. PLEASE engage with us here, on social media, or send us an email at contact@theMagnetStrap.com to let us know what you think. What are we doing wrong? What are we doing right? What haven't we considered? Which feature do you love the most?There are a number of ways to secure funding for a startup business like ours. But, we're a small team and we know that nothing will help guide us better than an actively engaged group of potential end users. If adjustments are needed, now is the time to make them, because we want you to be thrilled to buy a pack when you see them in stores.While we hope you'll support this campaign by purchasing your favorite perk listed to the right, we also hope you'll follow us, tag us, and share our story with your friends. The more people hear about us, the more feedback we'll get before we're officially in the market. FundingTrust is earned over time. Unfortunately, we don't have that luxury in our relationship with you. It is important to remember that we're not asking for long term investments in our success. We're simply asking you to believe we're up to the task of picking out a capable manufacturer, finding a reliable production facility and placing an order with both. We've already proven the design with incredibly durable working prototypes and we are confident in this product's potential commercial success. All combined, our team has well over 40 years of experience in bringing hundreds of products from concept to retail markets around the world.With the proceeds of this campaign, we will be funding these key objectives:
Product Testing & Design
Packaging Development & Sampling
Production Startup
Transit & Distribution Expense
Inventory for Retail Samples/Testing and eCommerce Sales
  Who We Are: Dank Art Enterprises 
This is Me, Ron Dankert
I’m just a regular guy who has grown weary with everyday frustrations and a lack of what I see as easy solutions that will make life easier… better. Just because we've always done it this way, doesn't mean there isn't a better way to get it done.I feel like I have a million ideas in my head that would surely make my life an easier place to be, so I decided to get started on the Magnet Strap in my "spare" time and established Dank Art Enterprises. With the help and support of my amazing wife, my wonderful children, and some great friends, I'm thrilled to be making one of my ideas come to life!It will be a dream come true when I can go into a store where most of us currently get our ratchet straps without a second thought and see the Magnet Strap alongside the products produced by industry giants. We all deserve a choice between the ho hum and something better.  Our MissionOur promise to you is simple: We will always strive to Build Better Gear. Our team's goal is to create excellence in innovation for safer, smarter, better and easier-to-use tools. We take pride in our products and we want to provide you with the best tools to accomplish the task at hand. In Our CornerSandia National Laboratories
Just last month, we were awarded a grant by Sandia National Laboratories, which is a HUGE win for us. To make sure our design is impeccable and that everything is being manufactured to perfection, we were facing a lot of resources being devoted to testing facilities.
We’re told this sort of work is right up their alley and that we have a home state advantage. With scientists assigned to a project they are experienced with and are also likely to consider us as a pet project they're rooting for, we're sure to develop an impossibly robust and well-thought-out ratchet strap.
Patent ProtectionThat’s right. We’re the only ones doing this.Simple Concept Utilizing Existing TechnologiesWe didn’t invent hooks, straps, ratchets, or magnets. Each of these components are being manufactured the world over and in some cases for hundreds of years. This isn’t a complex project fraught with potential technical difficulties.The Centipede Guys
6 years and a couple months ago, Ed Adkins and Keith Fyhr started right here on IndieGoGo to launch Ed’s invention – the Centipede Sawhorse. Exactly 2 years later, their innovation was launched at thousands of stores nationwide, including at big box behemoths Home Depot and Lowes. Their product can now be found at around 5,000 locations in at least 24 countries across the globe.
As a fellow resident of Truth or Consequences in New Mexico, I’ve had the privilege of meeting Ed, and he loves the Magnet Strap. He’s bought in at a hands-on level and has been lending the full weight of his design and sourcing expertise.
Ed introduced me to Keith, who has also fallen in love with the concept. His product management skills and experience in all things digital are a huge weight off my shoulders.
 Ready or Not, Here we Come!I've been engineering and re-engineering this concept for 5 years now. In it for the long haul, I am thrilled to see things really coming together - and picking up steam! With a small team in place dedicated to helping me build momentum, the inevitability of our launch has become palpable. You will be seeing the Magnet Strap in stores. The only question is, will you be a part of what made that possible? Please. Lend a Hand.
Pre-order your Magnet Straps today by selecting a perk to the right. Even if think you're good on straps for now, we all know one can never really have enough, and who doesn't love giving gifts?
Show our campaign to the folks in your life who you know are going to love it.
Share our campaign to your online networks and discover who else loves it as much as you do.
Engage with us. Follow our accounts, leave comments, and share our posts. Know that each time you do, you'll have made someone's day with a couple clicks of your mouse.
Check us Out:O-Ring = Cargo Net Versatility:

story:
Introducing Daypack - The Upcycled Backpack by Solgaard.

 We're back: this is our fourth Kickstarter campaign, this time we are revolutionizing how our backpacks are made. Introducing Daypack: an everyday backpack that's ready for all of your tech essentials, and before it gets to you you've pulled 5lbs of trash from the ocean.

We're upcycling the oceans: for each bag made, we pull up 5lbs of ocean trash.

We will work with local partners for collecting plastic from coastlines and beaches. 

Our first collection point is in the Maldives. We have lined up working relationships as well with a group in the Philippines. We will document the process of your bag, and each bag will come with a certificate of origin: where the plastic was collected for it to be made.

On top of eliminating virgin plastic from our supply chain: we're eliminating single use plastics from our packaging: We’ve developed and tested a revolutionary shipping packaging solution; using no single use plastic. The shipping container your bag is delivered in is a water resistant and reversible tote bag.

The shipping bag is a reversible tote bag that comes with a zipper that's secured with a biodegradable zip tie, so it can't be tampered with during shipping.

We owe all of our success to passionate backers like you, that believe in our products as much as we do. By backing this project - you not only support cleaning of the oceans, but you also receive an incredible bag. 

Help us bring these amazing products to reality by backing us with one of the pledges below. All bags include a free stainless steel straw. 

5 Year Guarantee 

Your Daypack is fully protected by our five year product guarantee. Any manufacturing faults found in this timeframe will be eligible for replacement. No questions asked.

Our funding goal is $25,000 - this is the minimum needed to get the process rolling. Once we exceed our goal, we will set certain targets at which point we will unlock these special items:

Stretch goal #1  - Atlantic Blue colorway unlocked! (Navy blue with black front pocket)

Stretch goal #2 - Documentary film showing the entire process of your bag, with monthly video segments posted as you await your shipment.

Stretch goal #3 - Additional 3x colorways announced (Backers vote for top choices) 

Stretch goal #4 - To be announced....

FAQs

Water resistance: what does it mean? We design our bags so that you can be caught out in the rain and not worry about your laptop inside. However, if it's a monsoon, you will want to seek cover for many reasons, including avoiding rain not getting in through your zippers.

Laptop size: Daypack has been designed to fit laptops up to a 15" size. A lot of us use 15" Macbook Pros and we are very happy with it. Also some people on our team use 13" Macbook Airs and are also happy with the size. Daniel the Intern uses a Lenovo Yoga something or other and that's great too - if you're into having a touchscreen on your laptop that is. The maximum area of the laptop 15 Inches high, 10 inches wide. (38cm X 25cm)

Where is the material collected from: The first batch will be collected within 5kms of the coastlines of the Maldives, and the second batch will be collected from the Philippines. Your bag will come with information about where the plastic came from that made your bag.

What does the material feel like? It's surprisingly soft to the touch, yet durable.

How much stuff can I fit in it? It's a similar size to many everyday backpacks: a laptop, a textbook or two, a sweater, powerbank, some cables, and a charger for your laptop will fit no problem. Then there's space on the side for your water bottle on one side, and umbrella on the other.

What is Kickstarter? Kickstarter is not a store. Kickstarter is a way to fund projects with big goals. We are funding this through Kickstarter because we believe there is a huge community around the world that wants to see the oceans healthier. The way it works is this: if you are interested in the campaign, you mark down your pledge today, along with your credit card. You are not charged today. Your credit card is only charged if the campaign is successful, at which point you will be charged by Kickstarter on November 29th.

How do I know I will receive my product? This is our 4th Kickstarter campaign, and reputation is very important to us. We have thousands of backers from all over the world that have believed in us, and we have delivered the products to them. In some instances, goods can't be shipped to certain countries, at which point we will refund any amount paid by you. We're so dedicated to our backers, that last year, our founder Adrian wore leopard print pants every day to prove to our backers that he was doing everything he could to get products to everyone, and he wore them until all bags were received! It took 9 months for all the final bags to be shipped - and he held to his word!

Daypack Deep Dive

Shipment Information:

Once the campaign has ended, you will be emailed a survey to select your color of choice along with the options to include any add ons. We plan on getting you your rewards by the end of May 2019. Shipping is included for the U.S. and Canada. Hong Kong and Singapore have reduced shipping rates due to our popularity in HK + SG. All duties for shipments to the U.S. are covered by us. Some countries may face additional local duties by the customs agent in that country - this will not be covered and may come at an additional cost to you.

Team:

Adrian Solgaard: Founder and CEO | Chris Cavill: Head of Design | Stan Liu: Head of Operations | Kaveh Kiani: International Sales | Estefania Leon: Controller of Chaos| Cassia Patel: Environmental Engineer | Libby Vilner: Head of Social |Taylor King: Photo & Video | Jenina Julian: Customer Service | Daniel Bacher Ringe: The Intern | Agency Partner: Enventys Partners

About us:

We believe that being a global citizen is about being a good steward to the earth while enjoying everything that it has to offer. Our goal is to undo the damage humans have caused to the planet, beginning with ocean plastics. That’s why everything we make is created with a belief in building sustainability for tomorrow. We strive to give more back to the planet than we take.

We’re obsessed with solving problems for our fellow global citizens. We create smart and sustainable everyday items at the intersection of fashion and technology. We make awesome products that are available to you at a price that’s reasonable, because we believe you should spend your money on experiences, not things.

Team:
Adrian Solgaard: Founder and CEO | Chris Cavill: Head of Design | Stan Liu: Head of Operations | Kaveh Kiani: International Sales | Estefania Leon: Controller of Chaos| Cassia Patel: Environmental Engineer | Libby Vilner: Head of Social |Taylor King: Photo & Video | Jenina Julian: Customer Service | Daniel Bacher Ringe: The Intern | Agency Partner: Enventys Partners

story:
Hello! My name is Ellie, I'm 14 and I'm from the UK. I signed up to work with the charity Africa's Gift (http://africasgift.org/)  in July of this year after working with them two years ago  in South Africa through my secondary school.

Africa’s Gift helps schools get students engaged through activity and involvement with community projects. Through the links they form with local people, schools, and with overseas communities, the charity aims to enrich the experiences of young people in the UK and South Africa whilst building community projects to help develop the local area. For this year's trip, we have a fundraising goal of £2400 each, this will take us Cluster school in South Africa to build a sustainable food garden and pipe clean running water which will be accessible to the whole community. 

One of the fundraising attempts I am undertaking is cycling the British coast-to-coast along the transpennine trail - a total of 220 miles - over 5 days, along with my dad. I hope to raise at least £500 pounds in sponsorship donations which will go toward the £2400 goal to fund the trip with Africa's Gift. Even if the goal isn't met, all of the money raised will go directly toward the fundraising total. Our group is extremely grateful for all donations, however big or small - it all helps us toward our total!

story:
The PRAETOR POCKETBLADE is the result of combining the adaptability and convenience of a utility blade with the rugged durability and strength of a fixed blade knife.  The blade housing is precision milled from a solid block of carbon fiber composite giving the Praetor unparalleled strength and lightness for the most demanding and precise daily tasks.  Light as a feather and strong as titanium, we designed the Praetor to strike a perfect balance between ergonomics, durability and strength.  

Download Hi-Res Image Set

Instagram

 

 

 

Featured By

 

A Rugged & Dependable Fixed Blade

The Praetor is compact and powerful cutting tool, designed with aggressive ergonomics around the ubiquitous utility blade for precision cutting and hard use.  The vast majority of blade holders are made from cheap, low quality, mass produced plastics and aluminum, loosely securing the blade itself which leads to unsafe slippage and rattling.  

In contrast, the Praetor design tightly compresses the blade into a solid carbon fiber frame, locking it into place.  No more cheap rattling.  

We designed the Praetor to be the highest quality, most advanced utility knife on the market  using the most premium composite materials in the world.  

 

 

How Does it Work?

The Praetor magnetically locks itself into place without the need to fumble with any latches, straps, buttons or slides.  The fixed blade...evolved for the 21st century.  

 

A Unique Magnetic Mechanism

Simply twist to disengage magnetic lock

Countersunk high-grade neodymium magnets embedded in the composite frame ensure the knife cannot slip out by accident.

Automatically re-engages lock if knife is not removed

With no moving parts and the use of magnets the Praetor sheath system is able to strike a perfect balance between ease-of-access and robust security.

Free your pockets

The sheath design provides the flexibility to clip securely to either your inner belt for ultimate security or to the inside of a pocket, whichever is preferred.

Carbon Fiber Suspension Clip

Bonus with Tier II & III Reward Levels

Prevent your keys and EDC from bunching uncomfortably at the bottom of your pocket. 

A suspension clip is a a low-profile and lightweight way to carry your basic daily gear.  Being made from carbon fiber, these clips are the absolute lightest and strongest clips you'll find anywhere.

The inspiration for these clips came during the manufacturing process of the Praetor blade frames.  We realized we could be more efficient with material by milling these carbon fiber clips in the excess material along side the blade frames.

CHOOSE from SIX Tier III Knife Color Styles

  • Carbon Fiber
  • "Venom" Green
  • "Ronin" Orange
  • Olive Drab
  • Matte Black
  • Coyote Brown

 

Horizontal Carry Kit Included

The Praetor magnetic sheath system is designed to be highly customizable and able to be tailored to individual carry style preferences.  We've developed a horizontal carry attachment kit which enables you to stow your Praetor within the width of your belt (up to 1.5") as an alternative to the default IWB (inside-waistband) carry style.  The kit will include adjustment spacers so you can easily tailor your Praetor sheath to the thickness of your belt.

 

 

 

Replaceable blades

Being able to quickly swap blades is an indispensable feature of every utility knife.  No more time consuming and delicate sharpening operations on dull, thick blades or worrying about chipping a full-sized knife in practical daily use.  The Praetor Pocketblade can rip and tear into any material in any condition, swap a blade and keep on going.  

Solid all-weather composite construction

The Praetor and its sheath system are engineered from high performance composites like carbon fiber which has an unmatched strength-to-weight ratio making it the perfect material for a hand-held cutting tool.  Composites will never degrade from rust or oxidation so it can handle any outdoor environment with ease. 

  • Type: Fixed Blade
  • Blade Length: ≈2.5" inches 
  • Blade Thickness: .024 inches (0.61 mm)
  • Blade Type(s):   Custom laser etched STANLEY® FATMAX® Carbide 11-800, FATMAX® 11-700 and Heavy Duty 1992® 11-921 blades, (generic blades will have varying degrees of blade fit)
  • Total Length: 5.0 inches (127 mm)
  • Frame Material: Carbon Fiber and G10 composite
  • Hardware: Black Oxide 18-8 Stainless Steel 
  • Weight: ≈1.2 oz (33 g)

 

A Cutting Tool for the Everyday

The Praetor is a working knife, designed to be at home in a workshop, in your daily carry or just in a box on your fridge for those household projects.

 

Designed For Use With Workgloves 

The large finger hole integrated into the handle makes operation of the Praetor a breeze in winter or other adverse environments where manual dexterity becomes an issue, or if your day to day work requires the use of heavy gloves.

Manufactured by the designers. Zero outsourcing. 100% control of our design. Production ready at launch.  

These are the standards all of our previous campaigns have held to and the Praetor is no exception.  I'm a maker at heart and this translates into practical and innovative designs that follow a clean and efficient manufacturing process.  I believe that manufacturability is a core design pillar of any product, no matter how small, and this translates into precise, stable production.

Our machine shop specializes in carbon fiber milling so we are fully equipped with the best tooling and processes for the job after multiple successful campaigns.

 

Production Ready

The Praetor Pocketblade has been fully funded through our recently successful kickstarter campaign and we want to bring the design to the indiegogo community.  We've produced many batches of early production units throughout our Kickstarter campaign and production is continuing in earnest.

Indiegogo backers will have their Praetor's shipped immediately after our previous campaigns units are produced.  Our current shipping timeline is an estimate based on previous production runs and we will work as hard as we can to ship earlier if possible.  

 

 

THANK YOU for pledging for a Praetor Pocketblade or even just for making it to the bottom of the page! After CNC milling, every knife is hand-finished and checked for quality before heading out the door as part of our production process. We appreciate you and rest assured that by supporting this campaign you are not only backing a great product that we believe in, but an innovative new company as well.

Being a fully equipped composite machine shop, we have made many pre-production batches of the Praetor Pocketblade to make it ready for release to ensure you aren't simply backing an idea but a fully tweaked product that is ready for full production. As with all of our previous campaigns, we manufacture our own products without outsourcing therefore are able to adapt to any problems that may arise without delay.

There are always certain risks involved in shipping in materials, but we have in place solid material suppliers we have used for over 2+ years and a reliable, tested supply chain from our previous three Kickstarter campaigns, so we are very confident in our ability to deliver this project and exceed your expectations!

- Alex & the Ronin Team -

 

Safety/Legal disclaimer: This is a tool and not a toy, so it should never be in the reach or possession of any children or minors. Tools can be dangerous and we do not accept any responsible for any harm, damage, illegal activity, injury, etc. while using this tool. You are responsible for checking your local laws for legality. You must be at least 18 years old to order. It is the sole responsibility of the buyer to obey all applicable Federal, State, and Local Laws regarding possession and use of item(s) sold herein. Consult your Federal, State, and Local Laws before ordering. By placing an order the buyer certifies that: he or she is of legal age; and that the item(s) will be used only in a lawful manner. The buyer is liable and responsible for any loss, damage or expense of any kind, arising from the use or misuse of any item sold herein.

Ronin Energetics is a Registered Trademark of Ronin Energetics Inc.
story_txt:
The PRAETOR POCKETBLADE is the result of combining the adaptability and convenience of a utility blade with the rugged durability and strength of a fixed blade knife.  The blade housing is precision milled from a solid block of carbon fiber composite giving the Praetor unparalleled strength and lightness for the most demanding and precise daily tasks.  Light as a feather and strong as titanium, we designed the Praetor to strike a perfect balance between ergonomics, durability and strength.  
Download Hi-Res Image Set
Instagram
 

 





 
Featured By

 
A Rugged & Dependable Fixed Blade
The Praetor is compact and powerful cutting tool, designed with aggressive ergonomics around the ubiquitous utility blade for precision cutting and hard use.  The vast majority of blade holders are made from cheap, low quality, mass produced plastics and aluminum, loosely securing the blade itself which leads to unsafe slippage and rattling.  
In contrast, the Praetor design tightly compresses the blade into a solid carbon fiber frame, locking it into place.  No more cheap rattling.  
We designed the Praetor to be the highest quality, most advanced utility knife on the market  using the most premium composite materials in the world.  
 

 
How Does it Work?
The Praetor magnetically locks itself into place without the need to fumble with any latches, straps, buttons or slides.  The fixed blade...evolved for the 21st century.  



 
A Unique Magnetic Mechanism
Simply twist to disengage magnetic lock
Countersunk high-grade neodymium magnets embedded in the composite frame ensure the knife cannot slip out by accident.
Automatically re-engages lock if knife is not removed
With no moving parts and the use of magnets the Praetor sheath system is able to strike a perfect balance between ease-of-access and robust security.
Free your pockets
The sheath design provides the flexibility to clip securely to either your inner belt for ultimate security or to the inside of a pocket, whichever is preferred.








Carbon Fiber Suspension Clip
Bonus with Tier II & III Reward Levels
Prevent your keys and EDC from bunching uncomfortably at the bottom of your pocket. 
A suspension clip is a a low-profile and lightweight way to carry your basic daily gear.  Being made from carbon fiber, these clips are the absolute lightest and strongest clips you'll find anywhere.
The inspiration for these clips came during the manufacturing process of the Praetor blade frames.  We realized we could be more efficient with material by milling these carbon fiber clips in the excess material along side the blade frames.






CHOOSE from SIX Tier III Knife Color Styles

Carbon Fiber
"Venom" Green
"Ronin" Orange
Olive Drab
Matte Black
Coyote Brown

 
Horizontal Carry Kit Included
The Praetor magnetic sheath system is designed to be highly customizable and able to be tailored to individual carry style preferences.  We've developed a horizontal carry attachment kit which enables you to stow your Praetor within the width of your belt (up to 1.5") as an alternative to the default IWB (inside-waistband) carry style.  The kit will include adjustment spacers so you can easily tailor your Praetor sheath to the thickness of your belt.
 


 

 

Replaceable blades
Being able to quickly swap blades is an indispensable feature of every utility knife.  No more time consuming and delicate sharpening operations on dull, thick blades or worrying about chipping a full-sized knife in practical daily use.  The Praetor Pocketblade can rip and tear into any material in any condition, swap a blade and keep on going.  
Solid all-weather composite construction
The Praetor and its sheath system are engineered from high performance composites like carbon fiber which has an unmatched strength-to-weight ratio making it the perfect material for a hand-held cutting tool.  Composites will never degrade from rust or oxidation so it can handle any outdoor environment with ease. 

Type: Fixed Blade
Blade Length: ≈2.5" inches 
Blade Thickness: .024 inches (0.61 mm)
Blade Type(s):   Custom laser etched STANLEY® FATMAX® Carbide 11-800, FATMAX® 11-700 and Heavy Duty 1992® 11-921 blades, (generic blades will have varying degrees of blade fit)
Total Length: 5.0 inches (127 mm)
Frame Material: Carbon Fiber and G10 composite
Hardware: Black Oxide 18-8 Stainless Steel 
Weight: ≈1.2 oz (33 g)





 
A Cutting Tool for the Everyday
The Praetor is a working knife, designed to be at home in a workshop, in your daily carry or just in a box on your fridge for those household projects.



 
Designed For Use With Workgloves 
The large finger hole integrated into the handle makes operation of the Praetor a breeze in winter or other adverse environments where manual dexterity becomes an issue, or if your day to day work requires the use of heavy gloves.





Manufactured by the designers. Zero outsourcing. 100% control of our design. Production ready at launch.  
These are the standards all of our previous campaigns have held to and the Praetor is no exception.  I'm a maker at heart and this translates into practical and innovative designs that follow a clean and efficient manufacturing process.  I believe that manufacturability is a core design pillar of any product, no matter how small, and this translates into precise, stable production.
Our machine shop specializes in carbon fiber milling so we are fully equipped with the best tooling and processes for the job after multiple successful campaigns.

 
Production Ready
The Praetor Pocketblade has been fully funded through our recently successful kickstarter campaign and we want to bring the design to the indiegogo community.  We've produced many batches of early production units throughout our Kickstarter campaign and production is continuing in earnest.
Indiegogo backers will have their Praetor's shipped immediately after our previous campaigns units are produced.  Our current shipping timeline is an estimate based on previous production runs and we will work as hard as we can to ship earlier if possible.  
 


 
THANK YOU for pledging for a Praetor Pocketblade or even just for making it to the bottom of the page! After CNC milling, every knife is hand-finished and checked for quality before heading out the door as part of our production process. We appreciate you and rest assured that by supporting this campaign you are not only backing a great product that we believe in, but an innovative new company as well.
Being a fully equipped composite machine shop, we have made many pre-production batches of the Praetor Pocketblade to make it ready for release to ensure you aren't simply backing an idea but a fully tweaked product that is ready for full production. As with all of our previous campaigns, we manufacture our own products without outsourcing therefore are able to adapt to any problems that may arise without delay.
There are always certain risks involved in shipping in materials, but we have in place solid material suppliers we have used for over 2+ years and a reliable, tested supply chain from our previous three Kickstarter campaigns, so we are very confident in our ability to deliver this project and exceed your expectations!
- Alex & the Ronin Team -
 
Safety/Legal disclaimer: This is a tool and not a toy, so it should never be in the reach or possession of any children or minors. Tools can be dangerous and we do not accept any responsible for any harm, damage, illegal activity, injury, etc. while using this tool. You are responsible for checking your local laws for legality. You must be at least 18 years old to order. It is the sole responsibility of the buyer to obey all applicable Federal, State, and Local Laws regarding possession and use of item(s) sold herein. Consult your Federal, State, and Local Laws before ordering. By placing an order the buyer certifies that: he or she is of legal age; and that the item(s) will be used only in a lawful manner. The buyer is liable and responsible for any loss, damage or expense of any kind, arising from the use or misuse of any item sold herein.
Ronin Energetics is a Registered Trademark of Ronin Energetics Inc.

What we really want for our wedding gift is a honeymoon to Italy. Celeste and I have been wanting to go for most of our lives and we think it'll be a romantic trip for our honeymoon.

Anything you're willing to give  is greatly appreciated.

story:
UPDATE #2:

Still on target to ship on 12/17.  They came out great, by the way.

POST CAMPAIGN UPDATE:

Wow!  This campaign really exceeded my expectations--thanks to EVERYONE who supported this project in any way. I am very grateful.
As of 12/12/12, the blue pieces have been received and are at the engraver.  The reds go there tomorrow morning and the gun-metal in the afternoon.  I will spend the weekend working on magnets and putting together orders.  On Monday I will ship the US orders via 2-day Priority Mail. If you are in Colorado, you should be receiving your perks on Tuesday.  INTERNATIONAL will take 1-3 weeks (unless you have made prior arrangements to receive your order sooner.)
Please check out the GrOpener page on Facebook and Twitter for regular updates.
Thanks again!

SHIPPING

US Domestic Shipping is included. 

International Shipping is included IF you don't need it by the Holidays.  1-3 weeks from the ship date to the delivery date through your national postal service.

All You Need is a Firm Grip

This device does not require a lot of strength, but a firm grip is necessary.  It is not a helpful tool for grandma's arthritis or for a kindergartner.  Think a firm, but not crushing, handshake.

How The GrOpener Happened

The idea for this project was born in Ghana where I was teaching art with the Peace Corps.  Every bar had these cool, hand-made openers consisting of a piece of wood with a couple of screws stuck in it.  The screws hooked under the cap and the cap was pried off as you press down on the wood...it was brilliant!  Over time, I thought about different configurations on this principle.  One handed is a natural way to configure an opener that is pressed down towards the bottle.  I developed it until the form and balance worked with the motion of the hand.

I am an editorial photographer with a background in the visual arts.  I have applied my art discipline to product design before. In 2007 I designed and launched another product, the Zoot Snoot. This is a device made from neoprene that has been popular in a niche dealing with flash photography (it is available at adorama.com, lightwaredirect.com, and zootsnoot.com).

I live where I grew up in Denver, Colorado with Jenn and our son Gerik--who generously offered his art as a backdrop in the photo and video.

The Goal & What You Get

I have already paid for the tooling and the first 200 linear feet of extrusion.  Where I need your help is in covering the cost of cutting and finishing the GrOpeners.  If I don't reach my goal of $4000, I will use what I raise to cut and finish what I can of the extrusions, so I can fulfill the orders that are made.

Contribute now, using the buttons to the right and I will send you the perks of your contribution level. 

Why is the GrOpener Important?

It is unique that this tool uses motion and force from the act of grabbing the bottle to achieve the additional result of removing the cap.  But, it is special in that it has been designed in a way that accommodates amputees, stroke victims and others who may only have full use of one hand.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, please help us spread the word and share a link to this page.

story:
Why Decode Tech Sling?

(1) Gadgets have become a daily necessity — cellphone, tablet, laptop, portable battery...

(2) Backpacks are normally big and heavy with lots of empty space that gets wasted. But, more importantly, backpacks are bulky when compared to sling bags.  

(3) Sling bags are lightweight and convenient, but most are too small to carry large-size electronics such laptops, tablets, and forget about camera or gaming gear.

(4) It’s 2018! We are in anew era of technology, but the concept of carry-bags and packs has hardly caught up. Now, here comes the solution…

Occasions

  • Daily commute
  • Occasional photographing
  • Travel
  • Biking bag, art bag

The Decode Tech Sling

Compact and slim, only slightly bigger than the dimensions of a piece of A4 paper with a light weight of 800g

You’re thinking…that’s too small. BUT, it’s capable of carrying ALL THESE THINGS！！！

The dedicated laptop compartment is designed to fit and protect MBP 13” and iPad 10” or any of the sizes below

It is highly customizable which allows you to move seamlessly from work to play

Multiple Divider

Inherited from the UNO bag line, Decode can unzip and fold into a ridiculous compact size, flatten and be packed. It can fit into your closet and luggage without taking up extra space.

Decode’s unique features also allow you to quickly access your camera from the side of the bag as easy as a snap of the fingers.

When heavy loaded, the bag’s thoughtful, detachable design enables quick release from your shoulder, so that you do not need to lift your heavy bag over your head.

Tripod Holder

Decode is equipped with two side pockets for bottle storage.

As well as a lot of other thoughtful features…

Main Features

Dual Storage Chambers

  • Dedicated laptop compartment with waterproof YKK zipper that can fit a 13” MacBook Pro or any size below and 10”iPad or tablet 
  • 15L customizable main storage compartment that can fit SLR, drone, files, clothes etc. Waterproof YKK zipper protect your electronic kits from bad rains or any other damp climates.
  • First convertible sling bag with 15L capacity and customizable storage space
  • Flexible uni-body design that allows customers to unzip and roll it up to a much more compact size

Ergonomic Shoulder Strap

  • Comfortable
  • Detachable mechanism for easy release 
  • Built-in quick access pocket for cards and earphones
  • Built-in sternum strap for biking

Other Features

  • Expandable side pockets
  • Scratch proof interior lining (for better protection of SLR and lenses)
  • Soft padded handle (for ease and comfort of hand-carrying)
  • DuPont Hypalon zipper pull with lockable mechanism (anti-unzipping, anti-theft)

Premium Materials 

  • YKK waterproof zipper and YKK RC zipper
  • Water-repellent eco-polyester
  • Waterproof coated polyester
  • Mirror grade plated hardware
  • DuPont Hypalon zipper pull with lockable mechanism
  • Scratchproof interior velvet linings
  • Flexible shock-absorption divider

Project Background

From UNO to URBANATURE, we never stop exploring viable solutions for people ages 18 to 35. UNO is the first uni-body and customized backpack in the world. With more interactive and precise consumers, we are passionate about smart solutions for everyday carrying bags and are devoted to offering customizable, convertible, interchangeable and versatile carrying systems that allow users to take full-control of the style, capacity and functionality of a bag for many different occasions. We owe a great deal of our success to NIID’s wonderful supporters, whose generous feedback has helped us to improve NIID’s design. WE make these brilliant bags!

About NIID

The inception of NIID came in 2014. While in New York City, Jason Li and Harris Haynie noticed that most of the business professionals were using backpacks that had very little style and even less functionality. After months and months of back and forth, they (along with Vinson Sieh) created the first prototypes of a pack that were designed to be both stylish and have the functions that would suit a variety of consumers. The first release of backpacks in 2015 was called Decode, an innovative pack designed specifically for business professionals. The program, enlisted through Amazon Exclusives, sold out quickly and received many positive reviews, comments and suggestions for the next line of backpacks.

GIVE AWAY WINNER:

Hooray! Estella SUE, Noah Wong, Dookie Solute. You're are the winners! Please contact us on Kickstarter message and you will get your bags for free.

story:
EZ_Duffle aims to create a revolution in how easy it should be to organize your packed items and stay on the move - whether you are commuting across town or taking a short trip.

Configure and re-configure the EZ_Duffle modules in seconds with four layouts and adapt it to your needs with three carrying options. 

Quickly and easily access items with 6 quick grab points and charge electronics while traveling or commuting with a removable Power Kit.

EZ_Duffle was built to become your one versatile bag to organize all aspects of daily and travel life. Check it out below!

 

 

 

 

SHIPPING

Please message us if you don't see your country's shipping and we will add it!

SHIPPING:

Please message us if you don't see your country's shipping and we will add it!                                               

 

 

  • Save time on packing and retrieve what you need, when you need it.
  • Never again worry about how much to pack, what to put where, and how to organize everything.

 

  • Never again worry about overly wrinkled clothes, crumpled papers, or damaged gadgets in your duffle bag.
  • Easily organize all your packed items with 22 purpose-built compartments, pockets, loops, and straps for clothes, gadgets, shoes, and everything in-between. 

 

 

 

 

Flexi-dividers module easily clips and out and is equipped with a fully micro velcro surface to attach panels for vertical and horizontal stacking of bottles, accessories. or garments.

 

 

Use the multipurpose strap to keep items like garments, shoes and laptop securely in place.

  

 

 


Twist & fold the bag and store it in its dedicated sleeve which also doubles as an extra laundry bag or a shoe sleeve. It is washable and water-resistant.

 

  • EZ_Pouch is designed to be your mini companion to help organize every little item from toiletries to electronics and cords. 

 

 

  • Quit rummaging through your bag, creating total chaos in the process.
  • Retrieve items hassle free with quick and easy-access openings and pockets. Easy in, easy out. 

 

  

 

 

 

 

  • Three ways to partition EZ_Duffle’s interior. It adapts to you.
  • Your life is diverse and versatile; it’s time that you have a bag that can keep up. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Don’t worry about your smartphone or tablet dying in the middle of a trip or just before an important meeting.
  • Charge on the go with integrated cord loops for battery, powered smart-pocket & find items in the dark with LED lighting. 
  • Stay powered. Stay strong. Stay lit.

 

 

*EZ Battery Kit Includes:

  • 1 x removable battery
  • Multiple charges with 10000mAh battery capacity 
  • Charge faster with Quick Charge 3.0 
  • Universal compatibility via usb-c cable with micro-usb/lightning adaptor 
  • Pre-installation of cable and battery with access to Smart Pocket

*The EZ Battery Kit is available as part of the No Brainer Bundle.

 

 

 

  • Stop hurting your back with inflexible & uncomfortable carry. 
  • Choose your position from three distinct carry modes: throw it over the shoulder, grab it in hand, swing it around.

 

  

 

 

 

  • Take on bad weather. Take on rough terrains. Take on adversity.

 

  

 

 

  

 

 

 

It all started in 2014 ... During a trip to France, we found ourselves in need of a bag that would accommodate our frequent travels and on-the-go lifestyles. However, to our surprise, we could not find anything that was both functional at organizing our packed items and stylish enough to use in professional settings. We heard many similar stories from friends and travelers who lead fast paced, dynamic lives, with varied needs and on-the go demands. They needed a solution that would not slow them down anymore, nor simply keep up with it, but would proactively make things easier. So, upon returning home, we vowed to invent such a bag. 

We founded Torba with one simple mission: to blend “out of the box” design with a relentless attention to detail, in order to craft functional, easy to use products that get frequent travelers and urban commuters excited about each upcoming trip. 

With many iterations, prototypes, and hard work EZ_Duffle was born! Keeping ease of use and superior organization as the top design priority, EZ_Duffle is Torba’s first product - the one bag to organize it all.

 

 

 

 

 

 

MANUFACTURING & FULFILLMENT: 

We have secured our manufacturers, shippers and fulfillment centers, all of whom are waiting for us to give them the green light! Our manufacturers are professional, precise and ethical.

Our freight forwarders move tons of product daily and are ready for our business. We have partnered up with one of the industry's leading fulfillment centers so our backers will get the EZ_Duffle in pristine condition and on time.

With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and EZ_Duffle will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.

DUTIES & TAXES: 

We cannot mark your pre-order as gift, this is illegal, so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

Some international backers will be subject to import duty and taxes. These backers will be responsible for covering all of their local duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this campaign.

As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location.

LIKENESS OF PRODUCT:

The EZ_Duffle you are seeing on this page is a final prototype and therefor is very close to the finished product! The finished product will be of even higher quality materials, so if you like what you see here then you will love what you’ll receive in person! We will notify you every step of the way of any design improvements that will be implemented into the final EZ_Duffle product.

WARRANTY:

All EZ_Duffles are covered by our Limited Lifetime warranty to cover any manufacturing defect. For the electronics, a 1-year standard, parts and labor warranty will apply.

   Electronics module easily clips in and out and is equipped with a dedicated smartphone pocket, a padded tablet compartment, a documents pocket, 2 mesh pockets for all your small items, and pen loops. Flexi-dividers module easily clips and out and is equipped with a fully micro velcro surface to attach panels for vertical and horizontal stacking of bottles, accessories. or garments. Keep your laptop secured with the multipurpose strap, and easily accessible for airport security checks. Use the multipurpose strap to keep items like garments, shoes and laptop securely in place.Let your dirty threads breathe in the vented laundry compartment and keep worn, odorous clothes separate from other packed items and ventilated from the outside. Simply unzip the exterior zip slot or close it to keep it sealed shut.  Keep your accessories tucked away with 4 middle section mesh pockets + two more on either side of the bag. The spill-proof toiletry pockets make accidental spills a thing of the past 
Organizational loops on both rear sides of the bags and the Electronics Module allow you to secure many items in place.
 Twist & fold the bag and store it in its dedicated sleeve which also doubles as an extra laundry bag or a shoe sleeve. It is washable and water-resistant. 
EZ_Pouch is designed to be your mini companion to help organize every little item from toiletries to electronics and cords.  
                                 The EZ_Pouch dimensions are 9" x 4.5" x 4"
   

Quit rummaging through your bag, creating total chaos in the process.

Retrieve items hassle free with quick and easy-access openings and pockets. Easy in, easy out. 
Full visibility and access to grab your laptop, clothes, and anything else. Quick-flap gives you instant access to the main compartment and the Spill-free toiletry pocket.  Smart pocket gives you instant access and houses the cord to charge your phone on the go. Magnetized side flaps provide grab-n-go access to EZ_Duffle's side modules and can be secured shut with the zipper closing.Large side hatches on either rear side of the bag can be opened fully to store and retrieve items from the side compartments. Side pockets provide instant access to quick grab items.  

Three ways to partition EZ_Duffle’s interior. It adapts to you.

Your life is diverse and versatile; it’s time that you have a bag that can keep up. 
Easy to clip on and off interior dividers provide for three interior layout options. Collapse or remove them.  Use both interior dividers to obtain three compartments for maximal organization on short trips or in your daily grind.Collapse or remove either of the two interior dividers to create extra space for greater flexibility. The unique twist & fold structure compacts the bag to a fraction of its size without crushing it and without having to remove the interior modules! Bring it with you, throw it in your luggage, car, closet, etc.   
Don’t worry about your smartphone or tablet dying in the middle of a trip or just before an important meeting.

Charge on the go with integrated cord loops for battery, powered smart-pocket & find items in the dark with LED lighting. 
Stay powered. Stay strong. Stay lit.
 A dedicated battery pocket and a hidden cord channel provide flexibility to install your own battery and charge up your devices on the go, or get the EZ Battery Kit* to create your optimal portable charging system. The battery pocket is made of a flexible material to fit batteries up to 3.9" width x 7.9" height (10cm X 20cm). *EZ Battery Kit Includes:
1 x removable battery

Multiple charges with 10000mAh battery capacity 

Charge faster with Quick Charge 3.0 

Universal compatibility via usb-c cable with micro-usb/lightning adaptor 

Pre-installation of cable and battery with access to Smart Pocket
*The EZ Battery Kit is available as part of the No Brainer Bundle.  Built-in LEDs are independent of the Battery Kit. Use the LEDs to light up the side and main compartments for those late nights. Activated by a button, LEDs are powered by small lithium batteries. The LED battery is included and replaceable. 

Stop hurting your back with inflexible & uncomfortable carry. 

Choose your position from three distinct carry modes: throw it over the shoulder, grab it in hand, swing it around.
Use the dedicated snap-on chest strap to quickly transform the duffle bag into a backpack for those quick moves through the airport or city. Six shoulder strap hooks offer seven strap positions, to optimize your comfort.  The shoulder strap comes padded, adjustable with nylon seatbelt webbing construction. Side grab handle is great for sliding the bag in and out of tight spaces like the car or an overhead compartment. Strong magnets keep the handles tightly connected when needed and allow for easy and quick unclipping to access the bag. Take on bad weather. Take on rough terrains. Take on adversity. Superior scratchproof and waterproof PU is used to ensure a long-lasting life to the bag and protect your belongings. Waterproof zippers are used for all outer closures.  Thick and durable PU material is used for the handles to ensure resilience even under repeated heavy loads. A waterproof and shock resistant base to protect your belongings through all your adventures. The Limited Lifetime warranty will cover any manufacturing defect. For the electronics, a 1-year standard, parts and labor warranty will apply.       
It all started in 2014 ... During a trip to France, we found ourselves in need of a bag that would accommodate our frequent travels and on-the-go lifestyles. However, to our surprise, we could not find anything that was both functional at organizing our packed items and stylish enough to use in professional settings. We heard many similar stories from friends and travelers who lead fast paced, dynamic lives, with varied needs and on-the go demands. They needed a solution that would not slow them down anymore, nor simply keep up with it, but would proactively make things easier. So, upon returning home, we vowed to invent such a bag. We founded Torba with one simple mission: to blend “out of the box” design with a relentless attention to detail, in order to craft functional, easy to use products that get frequent travelers and urban commuters excited about each upcoming trip. With many iterations, prototypes, and hard work EZ_Duffle was born! Keeping ease of use and superior organization as the top design priority, EZ_Duffle is Torba’s first product - the one bag to organize it all.Stencils, materials, grades, colours, putting it all together and visiting factories to select the BEST suppliers. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
MANUFACTURING & FULFILLMENT: 
We have secured our manufacturers, shippers and fulfillment centers, all of whom are waiting for us to give them the green light! Our manufacturers are professional, precise and ethical.
Our freight forwarders move tons of product daily and are ready for our business. We have partnered up with one of the industry's leading fulfillment centers so our backers will get the EZ_Duffle in pristine condition and on time.
With all of that being said, we must note that unforeseen complications do occasionally arise. Natural disasters or accidents are unavoidable. We’ve constructed our timelines with reasonable accommodations for unforeseen events, and EZ_Duffle will be insured throughout every step of its arrival to your doorstep.
DUTIES & TAXES: 
We cannot mark your pre-order as gift, this is illegal, so we will not be able to do this.
Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.
Some international backers will be subject to import duty and taxes. These backers will be responsible for covering all of their local duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this campaign.
As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location.
LIKENESS OF PRODUCT:
The EZ_Duffle you are seeing on this page is a final prototype and therefor is very close to the finished product! The finished product will be of even higher quality materials, so if you like what you see here then you will love what you’ll receive in person! We will notify you every step of the way of any design improvements that will be implemented into the final EZ_Duffle product.
WARRANTY:
All EZ_Duffles are covered by our Limited Lifetime warranty to cover any manufacturing defect. For the electronics, a 1-year standard, parts and labor warranty will apply.

story:
Who I am

Well, as I'm not advertising this all that widely, I'm going to assume that anyone looking at it, already has a rough idea of the answer to this... but just in case you don't, I'll sum it up in brief.  I am:

  • A professional photographic model and performance artist from England.  Very experienced in all genres from classic art-nudes, through to fashion, fetish and all things creative and artistic.
  • A nomad.  I travel everywhere.  Constantly.
  • An all round lovely person, who makes a cracking cup of tea!

This will be my second trip to Australia and I found using Indiegogo last year worked very well, so I'm going to plan this next trip in the same way!  As Australia is a rather long way, I'm hoping to get as many confirmed bookings in advance as possible to cover the costs of my flight etc.

I plan to start off in Brisbane around 22nd September, and then work my way around to other places depending on where the demand is (last year, I went to Sydney, Brisbane, Melbourne and Adelaide)!

I don't get a penny until I've reached my target for booking my flights... and if I don't reach my target, you automatically [b]get your money back[/b].

I [b]never[/b] no show. And can point you in the direction of countless models and photographers, many of whom booked me via indiegogo on last years trip, that you can talk to to vouch for my reliability and professionalism.

What We Need & What You Get

My £2200 target is a rough estimate of how much I'll need to arrange my flights, visas, and a tiny bit extra to keep me afloat whilst I'm out there (busses, food, etc.).  This amount doesn't leave me much of a margin for profit, but I love to travel, see new places, meet new people, and most importantly, create some art!

Essentially, donating here is exactly the same as just booking a model for a shoot in the normal way.  But please contact me to confirm the date and time slot before you pay on here, or I won't be able to guarantee that I'm free!

Once you've booked a shoot, I'll stay in contact with you to discuss all your concepts and ideas in advance and will do my best to bring all the clothing, hair styling, and make-up you require.

The price for these shoots include all the styles I work in, which can be seen on my website, where you can also find a lot more information about me and my work! :)

Other Ways You Can Help

This is a trip that I'll be doing on an extremely low budget, with very little profit, so any ways I can cut costs whilst I'm there are always useful... if you have a spare room / sofa I can crash on, can feed me, or offer me transportation then this is always appreciated; if you're an artist/photographer I will happily give you a discount if I take you up on this offer.

Also... tell all your artist/photographer friends ^_^
