story:
The Give’r Frontier Mittens are all-leather exterior mittens made of premium cowhide, a superior insulation system, and a 100% waterproof (not just resistant or “kinda-sorta”...we’re talking 100%!) membrane. They will keep your hands nice and cozy — even in extreme cold.

 The Frontier Mitten can also be hand-waxed for increased leather longevity and weatherproofing.

The premium grade A (best quality possible) cow leather is an essential element in the Frontier Mittens and gives them an incredible functional temperature range. 

The Frontier Mittens won’t fail you. They’ll last you a lifetime, so give’r all you got!

Cold-weather hand accessories is what we do and how we built our name. We’re straight out of Jackson Hole, Wyoming — so we know a thing or two about the cold.

Our customers soon asked us to make a heavy-duty, extreme weather mitten - this is our answer.

Our mission, as a company, is to empower you to give it your all, no matter your passion. We design innovative products to make this pursuit more accessible and enjoyable. We believe that everyone can Give’r, and the more each of us can honor our unique journeys, the greater the spread of radical positivity in our world.

The development and creation of the Frontier Mitten is the manifestation of this mission — the protection, comfort and confidence to explore and expand the frontiers of your outdoor work and play.

Cold hands, and even the fear of cold hands, is universally understood to be a negative experience. This fear often holds us back. We shy away from possibility and opportunity that exist in our own individual frontiers, outside of our comfort zones.

Our roots in the Rocky Mountain frontier country here in Jackson Hole, Wyoming, has us continually stretching our capabilities and challenging what is possible, while learning to ebb and flow with all of Mother Nature’s curve balls and extremes.

The Frontier Mitten is the best damn mittens you’ll ever get. We’re sure of it, with the last two years of testing in JH to prove it. They’re meant to add to your arsenal of cold weather gear to get your work done, get your shred in, and give’r your all.

Gloves provide the dexterity you need for fine-motor tasks and are certainly an essential piece of gear. But when temperatures drop to extremes and staying warm becomes your first priority, you can count on the Give’r Frontier Mittens.

Because the spaces between your fingers aren’t exposed to the cold as they would with gloves,  the Frontier Mittens drastically decrease the amount of heat dissipated out from your body. The minimized external surface area decreases your body’s exposure to cold and, therefore, retains more warmth in your fingers and hands.

The Frontier Mittens also keep your fingers together so they can share body warmth. This allows the inside of the mitten to work a bit like a furnace. Your fingers and hands circulate heat to each other while the mittens keep it all in, letting your body retain its optimal functional temperature with less effort.

Give’r tested the Frontier Mittens in the most extreme conditions so you don’t have to. They’ve given their seal of approval for temperatures ranging from -40°F to 400°F. So no matter the situation, these puppies have got you covered.

Forged in the valley of Jackson Hole, Wyoming, home of the iconic Teton Mountain Range, the Frontier Mittens have come face to palm with snow, rain, wind, hail, dirt, frost, mud, sleet, ice, fire and also a fair amount of time under the sun. They’ve handled granite, steel, concrete and rebar and have come out strong and unbroken. Tested to the extremes? Check.

Each level of the insulation system was thoroughly tested and selected to work together and ensure insane warmth that feels AMAZING.

When it comes to design, warmth, protection and your hands...we give a FIT!

The Frontier Mitten design ensures you get the perfect fit.  As they’re worn, your hands and fingers gradually form, shape and settle the insulation system, resulting in a mitten that molds to your hands. The outcome — an unparalleled, custom-made fit that gets better the more you wear them, just like your favorite baseball mitt growing up. 

The core of Give’r glove/mitten design since the beginning, we believe things should get better with time and use, and should last a lifetime. 

Between leather shell and insulation layering system lies the Hipora Membrane - ensuring your mittens are 100% waterproof.  This technology is proven to keep water out while remaining breathable for water vapor to escape.

The technology of the layer utilizes microscopic perforations in the membrane that are small enough to keep water in liquid form out, but large enough to allow water vapor and sweat to escape.

See it and believe it — we’ve put them to the waterproof test, so you can be confident to Give’r!

If you want, we can also bake & hand-wax your Frontier Mittens with an all-natural beeswax. This naturally “bomb-proofs” your mittens —increasing leather longevity, retaining natural moisture content and enhancing weatherproofing.

Bonus: the bombproofing ensures they’ll arrive at your doorstep looking rugged and bad ass!

 The exterior of each pair of mittens is made solely with 100% premium Grade-A cowhide leather, which runs circles around its synthetic brethren. 

Leather is far superior with grip than any other materials or hybrids. We’ve tested the Frontier Mittens when wet and cold and put them to the grind with a huge range of materials. These mittens will put an end to having plastics, metals, woods or your ski poles slip through your hands when you’re given’r!

In addition, we tested out multiple “thumb styles” to ensure you get the absolute best grip. We opted for the Keystone Style Thumb to give you maximum grip capability and comfort with fit and function.

The Frontier Mittens will outlast any pair of mittens you’ve had to date.  Durability and longevity are at the core of the design. We’ve sewn on additional leather reinforcement patches in areas that experience high abrasion - such as the palm, fingertips and thumbs.

Our team believes in making products that will last — we don’t cut corners to ensure you’ll have the Frontier Mittens for years to come and, perhaps (if you’re feeling generous), pass ‘em on to your grandchildren. Put these bad boys through hell - they'll come back ready for more.

The premium cow leather exterior enables an incredible functional temperature range. The Frontier Mitten can survive not just through extreme cold but also extreme heat.

In fact, where most synthetic mittens melt at high temperatures, the Frontier Mitten can handle the heat! They’ve been tested to temperatures up to 400°F.

From icy waters to burning coals — the Frontier Mittens have been tested so YOU can give'r with confidence.

Cow leather is well known for its long lifespan and durability. In fact, our prototypes have lasted 3x longer or more than any synthetic mitten alternatives. Complementing the insulation, as the Frontier Mittens mature, the leather shapes and forms a memory for your hands while developing a beautiful patina.

These are mittens you can pass down through generations. Break ‘em in, beat ‘em up, and let the leather tell your story.

We included an elastic cuff and leather skirt to keep warmth in and snow and ice out. The leather pull tab on the cuff makes it easy to put on and take off the mittens without damaging them.

Don’t lose these beauties off the chair lift or end up with a single mitten, the steel D-Ring is clutch for safe-keeping! Attach a leash, pair ‘em together or clip to your pack with confidence. The clip is placed strategically to prevent damage and provide maximum utility. 

You have the choice to get your Frontier Mittens hand-waxed with natural beeswax. Each mitten will be personally treated and baked by us. Give your pair a look that is as tough as the mittens themselves.

The hand-waxing enhances the leather’s durability and performancewhile increasing the outer leather layer weatherproofing. 

In essence, “bomb-proofing” these beasts so you can give’r proper!

Claim your mittens as your own! In proper western fashion, we take great pride in our workmanship, attention to detailand ability to hand brand your initials on each of your mittens.

This customization is the real deal and will make sure everyone knows these are YOUR mittens — ensuring you don’t lose ‘em or have them running off in your buddies or kids’ gear bag.

Don’t let the cold, or fear of cold, prevent you from experiencing life and doing what you love. Whether you’re skiing or boarding your favorite hill, walking your dog, relaxing on the chair lift, out on the boat with your crew, riding your sled through the “white room”, or ice fishin’ at your favorite spot, the Give’r Frontier MIttens will make sure your hands stay dry and warm, so you can give’r all you got and soak in the good stuff! 

When you select to support our campaign, you can choose the reward tier that best suits you.

Note that any tier with Frontier Mittens (as a single unit, 2-Pack, etc.) as a reward will be produced and shipped to you within the stated timeline of that tier.

The details of the sizing selection, add-ons of the wax coating and initial branding will be communicated following the completion of the campaign. 

Use the Wrist to Middle Finger Tip measurement and find the Palm Circumference intersection on the sizing table. This is your size!

If you're measuring in centimeters, use this chart! to find your size.

This Wrist to Middle Finger Tip measurement is the best indicator of your size and should guide your selection. Not all hands are the same size and if you’re deciding between sizes, we recommend sizing up.

It all began in 2011 with the design and creation of custom hats commemorating an epic annual kayaking expedition in Ontario, Canada. These hats, featuring the skyline of the Tetons and the colloquial phrase “give’r”, were the seed from which Give’r was born. This team, with help from an awesome and ever-growing community, gave life to a philosophy and lifestyle that is perfectly embodied by everything we make - especially the Frontier Mittens.

Our product line began with two t-shirts, two hats and a commitment to our customers that we’d stop at nothing to ensure they were stoked (not just satisfied) with their Give’r Gear. Our dream has come to life through 7+ years of working multiple jobs, taking challenges head-on, continuously learning, receiving a tremendous amount of help, and our belief that the world is a better place with Give’r in it.

We strongly believe in giving back through service and financial support, and have worked with dozens of local, regional, national and international non-profits since our inception. We believe in forming community by working with local businesses and connecting our customers from across the globe. We are proud members of 1% for the Planet and 1% for the Tetons, and are committed to playing an active role in making the world a better place for generations to come.

Our goal is to bring to life the Give’r that lives within us all. Straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories were at our core on day one, and we have built upon this foundation over the last 7 years. Your support enables our team to be fully dedicated to Give’r while maintaining control of our mission and the ability to take risks that may not be possible through traditional fundraising means.

We invite you to join us in continuously appreciating life and celebrating the journey. When life asks you to dance, we urge you to give’r.

Claim your mittens as your own! In proper western fashion, we take great pride in our workmanship, attention to detailand ability to hand brand your initials on each of your mittens.This customization is the real deal and will make sure everyone knows these are YOUR mittens — ensuring you don’t lose ‘em or have them running off in your buddies or kids’ gear bag.Don’t let the cold, or fear of cold, prevent you from experiencing life and doing what you love. Whether you’re skiing or boarding your favorite hill, walking your dog, relaxing on the chair lift, out on the boat with your crew, riding your sled through the “white room”, or ice fishin’ at your favorite spot, the Give’r Frontier MIttens will make sure your hands stay dry and warm, so you can give’r all you got and soak in the good stuff! When you select to support our campaign, you can choose the reward tier that best suits you.Note that any tier with Frontier Mittens (as a single unit, 2-Pack, etc.) as a reward will be produced and shipped to you within the stated timeline of that tier.The details of the sizing selection, add-ons of the wax coating and initial branding will be communicated following the completion of the campaign. We have been working on the Frontier Mitten concept for years, with an intense focus on prototype testing & iteration these last 18 months. We’ve been working with all supply chain partners for 4+ years, and they’re as stoked as we are. We have put a lot of thought into these beauties and what is needed to execute on the production, shipment, and game plan to get into backers’ hands ASAP with winter knocking on the door.  We have run the spreadsheets, readied our waxing and branding muscles, and ensured that all is in place to GIVE’R once our goal is reached!Use the Wrist to Middle Finger Tip measurement and find the Palm Circumference intersection on the sizing table. This is your size!If you're measuring in centimeters, use this chart! to find your size.This Wrist to Middle Finger Tip measurement is the best indicator of your size and should guide your selection. Not all hands are the same size and if you’re deciding between sizes, we recommend sizing up.It all began in 2011 with the design and creation of custom hats commemorating an epic annual kayaking expedition in Ontario, Canada. These hats, featuring the skyline of the Tetons and the colloquial phrase “give’r”, were the seed from which Give’r was born. This team, with help from an awesome and ever-growing community, gave life to a philosophy and lifestyle that is perfectly embodied by everything we make - especially the Frontier Mittens.Our product line began with two t-shirts, two hats and a commitment to our customers that we’d stop at nothing to ensure they were stoked (not just satisfied) with their Give’r Gear. Our dream has come to life through 7+ years of working multiple jobs, taking challenges head-on, continuously learning, receiving a tremendous amount of help, and our belief that the world is a better place with Give’r in it.We strongly believe in giving back through service and financial support, and have worked with dozens of local, regional, national and international non-profits since our inception. We believe in forming community by working with local businesses and connecting our customers from across the globe. We are proud members of 1% for the Planet and 1% for the Tetons, and are committed to playing an active role in making the world a better place for generations to come.Our goal is to bring to life the Give’r that lives within us all. Straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories were at our core on day one, and we have built upon this foundation over the last 7 years. Your support enables our team to be fully dedicated to Give’r while maintaining control of our mission and the ability to take risks that may not be possible through traditional fundraising means.We invite you to join us in continuously appreciating life and celebrating the journey. When life asks you to dance, we urge you to give’r.

story:
Trinity is a true 'go getter' and loves life experiences!  She doesn't let the fact that she is in a wheelchair stop her either!  

Help Trinity realize one of her many dreams!  Your contributions will help fund a hot air balloon ride for Trinity.

story:
Hi, I'm Chena. Now let me show you who Allan is!

I met Allan in Vancouver, Canada. I was studying photography, he was a bike courier. And, because life is amazing, we ended up living in the same house. 

Allan to the far right and me with the orange shirt with our homies at 1607's kitchen.

We lived a year together, time in which he shared his bike riding passion with me. It would go like this:

-Hey Chena, let's go for a bike ride.

-But it's midnight...

-Follow me!

-Ok.

Eventually he introduced me to the Bike Rides Society, where every Thursday at eight, a bunch of crazy cool people would meet and ride for two hours around the city, every time stopping at a mistery destination.

One day, we were floating in circles riding spongy tubes at the public pool, and the idea came to me...ALLAN! COME AND LIVE WITH ME IN MEXICO! I convinced him that he absolutely had to add some guacamole in his life. So he did. 

But he did it the Allan way, riding his bike from Van to Tijuana, were he wish he had seen the donkey show, but not really. He then flew to Mexico City, bike in a box, four T-shirts in his backpack, where I waited for him for our 2nd round to begin: Allan and Chena in Aztecalandia! Wahoo.

Me, being a car driver, and knowing how crazy surreal my city is, I asked Little Baby Jesus to protect Allan while riding through this concrete jungle. But he was ok, even in the Pizzacat Alleycat he participated at the first week or so after he arrived to Mexico. Look at this madness:


Pretty soon he found a job being a bike courier at Los Loosers, vegan food delivered on a bike.  Allan ended up knowing my city in ways that I've never done, and I think I never will...at the end he even guided me around haha.  


Amazing for someone whose only word in Spanish was quesadilla! :)

Here's another one of Allan working for Los Loosers (subtitles available!):


After trying all the types of tacos available, flying through the city 

and cooking for us the Scottish national dish, haggis,

...it was time for him to go and juice his Canadian work visa! Again, he was not just gonna fly and cry emotionally in the plane reading my goodbye letter. He was gonna ride home from NY to Vancouver!

You can check his Instagram feed: allanshawphoto, for some amazing pictures and incredible stories. 

Here's a video he sent to me last week:


Allan started his adventure on the 4th of August 2014.  Im writing this on the 30th of September, and he will be back to the loving arms of Mother Canada, as he says, this week!

I asked him, in average, how long does it take to cross the States riding a bike like he did. In average, he says, it's about 3 months, and he's doing it in less than 7 weeks!

And,

after all that epicness, 

his bike finally broke. 


Pics from Allan's IG
With almost zero pesos or dollars in his pockets, sunburnt and tired, but ravishingly happy, we think Allan deserves a new bike. 

It's not only the incredible feat he's about to accomplish, crossing from ocean to ocean by himself most of the time, but how commited he is to his passion. 

You can see in his Instagram stories how excited he is about life, and how he enjoyed every moment of it. And that is something we want to see in people more often!

We think he's a true inspiration, and I would be delighted to know he can continue his adventures as long as those strong legs of his can go!

Pic from Allan's IG.



What we can do


His current crappy bike he bought for 100 bucks a year ago, and he has already put together around 12,000 miles with it. 

It's time for a very happy change!

This campaign is to collect money to buy a super cool super fabulous super chido bike to give to Allan when he ends his journey and returns to Vancouver. I can imagine the size of his smile! And his little happy dance as well.

I asked him what his golden dream bike would be:

Mr Pink from All-City bikes. I don't know much about it, only that it's super fast! For those of you who know, these are the specs:


This bike is $1,899 dls (told you it was super cool) at the Counterbalance Bicycles shop in Seattle, Washington (it's the closest dealer to Vancouver, so Allan would be going down to Seattle to pick it up). 

"This is the frame that won the 2013 Gravel World Championships and has been campaigned in all manner of crits, road races, fondos and gravel events. " 

So, I'm asking for $2,000 dls. to cover for the rates Indiegogo keeps for the funds raised. Of course, feel free to donate as little or as much as your heart desires! Good vibes are welcome too. 

In the case we don't get all the money, I'm absolutely sure Allan would use however much we collect to buy at least some new bike shoes! (last time I saw him I could see his toes as well). 


    Risks & Challenges

    Indiegogo asks me to write risks & challenges...but really, the only obstacle I can imagine for Allan getting that bike is if he suddenly went crazy and decided instead he wants to run forever like Forrest Gump. 
    Allan won 44th place at the CMWC MEXICO and the 17th place at the NACCC MINNEAPOLIS. That talent is goint nowhere!
    I called the bike shop today and this nice guy told me the bikes are still going to be there by the end of the month... so, nope, no real risks or challenges. 


      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you don't have money money, pesos pesos, then you can help a lot by spreading the word like butter over bread. You can share the link or use the Indiegogo sharing tools!
      Go Allan!!

story:
Fripito will be your favorite travel guide app for iOS and Android!


Do you love to travel? With Fripito you can keep your guide always handy but travel light! Travel differently and return with great photos! 

Fripito will be the best travel app for your smartphone or tablet and will help you find interesting places in many destinations including tips on how to prepare and organize the trip of your dreams, what to pack with you, how to find a place to stay and how to get there. On top of that Fripito will help you to take the perfect picture to go with your beautiful memories, regardless of the camera you use.

Win LYTRO CAMERA or iPad Air in our contest! More on our Updates page!


How will Fripito work?

Fripito will be a virtual travel photo guide app, an entire bookstore worth of information right in your pocket. In it you will find many travel guides all around the world recommended by avid and experienced travelers and photographers. All guides will be focused to discover beautiful landscapes and interesting places including many practical tips. Each guide will be build on amazing photos with tips on where to go for the unique atmosphere, best light and the best views, but also on how to set-up your camera, what lens or accessories to use. 

Fripito application will be available for iPhone and iPad in AppStore late the spring 2014 and for Android smartphones in Google Play few months later. The application will be FREE to download and the price of photo guides will range from $ 3 up to $ 15.

Each guide will bring you:

  • 100+ professional photos of unique places including exact location, photo setting and tips
  • tips how to get there, what is the best season, recommended photo equipment etc.
  • interactive map of location
  • online mode for actual information and offline services for comfort traveling


How was the idea born?

“For many years now, I have been organizing for my clients interested in traveling and photography inspiring and original expeditions focused on discovering exotic countries through the viewfinders of their cameras. Together, we have visited six continents and places as diverse as the major US national parks, South Africa, Iceland, Peru, New Zealand or China. From every trip, I bring not only amazing memories, but also beautiful photographs. I love sharing my experience, but I cannot possibly take everyone with me on an expedition. And I got an IDEA! I decided to create an app to share all those beautiful places I have visited on this planet along with tips on how to photograph them. I named the app Fripito,” said Jan, professional photographer and founder of Fripito.


How will we use the funds?

The funds we raise with your help will be used for strengthening our team of travelers and photographers working on the travel and photo guides (30 %), translating the guides into other languages (50 %) and for promoting the project to create a sufficiently large community of users (20 %). 

Why Indiegogo campaign and why donating is a great idea?

Fripito is an original idea and we have spent the last three months living and breathing only for this project. The app is now undergoing the finishing touches and we have over a dozen guides ready including Iceland, Namibian safari, Yosemite or Peru. We have reached out and got on board dozens of like-minded travelers and photographers, Fripito enthusiasts who will help expand the guide selection, but in order to ensure new guides are added regularly we need to hire more travelers and photographers and translators. This is what we will use the majority of the raised funds for. A small portion of the funding will be used for promoting the app to the target group. In addition to funding you can also promote the app by spreading the word to your friends on Facebook or Twitter. Let’s all enjoy traveling and take great photographs and help preserve the great memories of all the amazing places around the world.

You are an avid amateur traveler and photographer

If you are a passionate amateur photographer in need of an occasional advice to perfect your technique, support Fripito and use it to find just the advice and tips you need to make your pictures perfect.  


Perks

To thank you for your help we have prepared somer perks that you will find in the right column on this page. If you wish to know more details about our perks (photos, seminars, portfolio reviews, workshop in Prague etc.) check our Fripito website.

Press, online magazines, blogs

(articles about Fripito)


The Freshpreneur.com



Mass media - press and TV

      idnes.cz

 TV channel Prima Cool 


Other online media

Appliste.cz

Fototipy


Digiarena.cz

Interview with Jan Brezina, Founder of Fripito

SuperApple

  Blog of Brano Rac in Slovakia

story:
What is X2 Power Strap?

The Concept of X2 was conceived in 2016 September.   Immediately, we know it has outstanding features that are not seen in the current market.  Through market research and prototype testing, we found X2 can only be described with one word – “SUPERB”.  It is very easy to use and achieves tie down force with such efficiency that surprised our team.  It was decided then that X2 will be the priority product to be launched.

You may experience like this...

 

X2 Power Strap is a good solution for oversized items...

or...

 

Design – Simply the best

X2 has a very simple design yet is actually fuses excellent features that are not obvious to the first impression.  This simplicity actually fits company motto – “Simply the best”.   Its mechanics is a 2-ring construction that induces the mechanical advantage.  Inversely, the securing requirement is proportionally reduced.  Thus, allowed the hook and loops to be used as the securing feature that is common and simple to apply.  This leads to further simplification and ease in tension force installation. During our testing, we have proven this strap has 2 times the mechanical advantage which matched our design intent.  Therefore, we named it X2.

 

Special Features

The time required to install X2 is measured in SECONDS but not minutes.  We are particularly proud of this because X2 can be re-installed with less time and the tension force is repeatable every time and any time.  As a final touch, we added a second hook and loop flap to ensure X2 will never become loose during transportation.   With this redundancy design, we ensure positive tie-down security.

X2 has been meticulously designed to include features such as force magnification, ergonomic efficiency, user friendly and double security.  These features will excel X2 to become “THE” reinforcing product for travel industry in 2017.

Material Construction

X2 Power Strap uses high grade durable material.   We even pay attention to details such as the sewing pattern and number of stitches.   This is to ensure the sewing strength matches where it is needed.   The strap is constructed out of high density woven webbing that has 2-tone color to achieve strength and attractiveness that is rarely seen in the market.  Its hard oxide coated steel buckles will give exceptional long durability. 

Luggage Damage Report

According to ABC News in 2016, there are nearly 2 million luggage bags either lost or damaged during air travel.  We believe X2 will reduce this statistics by reinforcing the luggage for the travelers.   Furthermore, with the increasing frequency of security inspection, the ability of X2 to be easily removed, re-installed and maintaining its original tension has out-performed and out-classed any competitor in the market.

****************************************************************************

Let’s see what our backers say about our previous product -“Loopout”…

****************************************************************************

“Received and everything is just top notch. The finishing is perfect, the quality of every items involved in the product is beyond what I expected. I will follow your brands very carefully in the future ;-) thanks a lot for this campaign, and for my pledges.”  - Bert W.

“Thank you sooo much Kenneth! The product is top quality work and I’m so excited to use it for our trip in July!  You are definitely a professional entrepreneur who fulfills his promises.  Continue to work hard!. Great product… it works great! Five Stars.” - Michael L.

“Got mine as well.  Super happy with the colors and quality.  Excellent work Kenneth…looking forward to the next thing.” – Daniel W.

“I received my Loopout and have already taken it on a 5-day trip. It worked out great! My Loopout and I have another trip planned together later this month. I hope we'll be making wonderful travel memories together for many years to come!” - Ron

“…I am very happy. It is the perfect solution for the problems I have handling suitcase, carry on and purse.” - Norma M.

“Good my Loopout today in Toronto. Excellent quality and make. Thanks for coming through. Already backed your new Kickstarter!” - Jurgen P.

“…I love it! Thank you for an incredible product!...Best of luck with Loopout and your future projects! - Stephen J.

“I like them so much that I've placed an additional order for friends and coworkers to enjoy.” - Jeff M.

“4 products received today in Paris :-) so very happy, good quality, good packaging, a lot of secure usage information! so good and simply…Backer for you next product, good luck and be sure you will have a lot of customers!”  - Alex D.

“I received mine the day prior to a business trip.  Awesome!!! I absolutely loved it.  In the past I’ve had issues with my laptop backpack sliding off the wheeled carry-on, but not this trip!  I got inquiries/comments from my jealous co-workers.  Now, I’m really looking forward to the Power Strap X2!” - Oliver B.

“I received in Japan.  Much earlier than your estimation!  I’ll use it this weekend in travel.  Being excited to use!” - Wada K.

“Perfect shape and functionality! Thank you very much!”  - Juan. J R 

"Thanks! It looks great and works great!"  - Kevin C.                                                                                        

“…Quality seems great and I look forward to using it in my upcoming travels!”             -Nate G.

“…very nice product. Glad I supported you!” - Edgar H.

“I really like it. Great job. I also supported your new project.” - Ronny S.

“…I'm very happy with it :) Thanks!” - Ricarda H.

“Received it, and happily using it :)” - V D B.

“Thanks for the great campaign!  All the best!” - Imran J.

“It's great. Wanted another one...” - James H.

“It looks good, the quality looks very good also…Thank you for this product."                  -Farah H.

“I am happy with the product.  Thank you!” - Matthew L.

“I am happy with it !” - Jorg L.

“…a solid product for the purpose.” - Jari H.

“Looks really good and looking forward to using it.” - Andrew G.

“Great product.  Looking forward to future projects." - Arthur K.

“Looks great, and seems to function well with a practice trial.” - Dipan P.

“Looks great…Nice job! "- Ronald S.

“Thank you it’s the best!” - Jamie F.

“Thank you…they are looking great!” - Dennis

“It looks great, thanks!” - Eric Y.

“I’ve received it…I like the product!” - Eric S.

“They just arrived and they look great! Can’t wait to use them on my next trip.”               - Mitchell T.

“It is great!” - Ty F.

“looks really good and looking forward to using it…” - Andrew G.

“What a nice product.  Thanks!” - Eric T.

“…can’t wait to use!  I will check out your other products as well!” - Chana B.

“It looks like it’s made using very high-quality materials.  Thank you!” - Kyle B.

“…Quick delivery and great product. Arrived just in time for an upcoming travel. Very happy about them…thank you again for a great product.” - Patrick A.

“I received the Loopouts today.  Thank you.  They look great.  I hope they go well in open market for you – it would be nice to hear about the scale-up.” - Tom F.

“Received yesterday, good quality, will be trying it out in end July to Japan Hokkaido, Malaysia & South America.  Thank you!” – Robin C.

*******

Thank you for all your support!!!  - Loopout Team

You may also have experience like this, 

and how Loopout helps...
story_txt:
What is X2 Power Strap?The Concept of X2 was conceived in 2016 September.   Immediately, we know it has outstanding features that are not seen in the current market.  Through market research and prototype testing, we found X2 can only be described with one word – “SUPERB”.  It is very easy to use and achieves tie down force with such efficiency that surprised our team.  It was decided then that X2 will be the priority product to be launched.You may experience like this...

 
X2 Power Strap is a good solution for oversized items...

or...

 Design – Simply the bestX2 has a very simple design yet is actually fuses excellent features that are not obvious to the first impression.  This simplicity actually fits company motto – “Simply the best”.   Its mechanics is a 2-ring construction that induces the mechanical advantage.  Inversely, the securing requirement is proportionally reduced.  Thus, allowed the hook and loops to be used as the securing feature that is common and simple to apply.  This leads to further simplification and ease in tension force installation. During our testing, we have proven this strap has 2 times the mechanical advantage which matched our design intent.  Therefore, we named it X2.

 
Special FeaturesThe time required to install X2 is measured in SECONDS but not minutes.  We are particularly proud of this because X2 can be re-installed with less time and the tension force is repeatable every time and any time.  As a final touch, we added a second hook and loop flap to ensure X2 will never become loose during transportation.   With this redundancy design, we ensure positive tie-down security.X2 has been meticulously designed to include features such as force magnification, ergonomic efficiency, user friendly and double security.  These features will excel X2 to become “THE” reinforcing product for travel industry in 2017.Material ConstructionX2 Power Strap uses high grade durable material.   We even pay attention to details such as the sewing pattern and number of stitches.   This is to ensure the sewing strength matches where it is needed.   The strap is constructed out of high density woven webbing that has 2-tone color to achieve strength and attractiveness that is rarely seen in the market.  Its hard oxide coated steel buckles will give exceptional long durability. Luggage Damage ReportAccording to ABC News in 2016, there are nearly 2 million luggage bags either lost or damaged during air travel.  We believe X2 will reduce this statistics by reinforcing the luggage for the travelers.   Furthermore, with the increasing frequency of security inspection, the ability of X2 to be easily removed, re-installed and maintaining its original tension has out-performed and out-classed any competitor in the market.****************************************************************************Let’s see what our backers say about our previous product -“Loopout”…****************************************************************************“Received and everything is just top notch. The finishing is perfect, the quality of every items involved in the product is beyond what I expected. I will follow your brands very carefully in the future ;-) thanks a lot for this campaign, and for my pledges.”  - Bert W.“Thank you sooo much Kenneth! The product is top quality work and I’m so excited to use it for our trip in July!  You are definitely a professional entrepreneur who fulfills his promises.  Continue to work hard!. Great product… it works great! Five Stars.” - Michael L.“Got mine as well.  Super happy with the colors and quality.  Excellent work Kenneth…looking forward to the next thing.” – Daniel W.“I received my Loopout and have already taken it on a 5-day trip. It worked out great! My Loopout and I have another trip planned together later this month. I hope we'll be making wonderful travel memories together for many years to come!” - Ron“…I am very happy. It is the perfect solution for the problems I have handling suitcase, carry on and purse.” - Norma M.“Good my Loopout today in Toronto. Excellent quality and make. Thanks for coming through. Already backed your new Kickstarter!” - Jurgen P.“…I love it! Thank you for an incredible product!...Best of luck with Loopout and your future projects! - Stephen J.“I like them so much that I've placed an additional order for friends and coworkers to enjoy.” - Jeff M.“4 products received today in Paris :-) so very happy, good quality, good packaging, a lot of secure usage information! so good and simply…Backer for you next product, good luck and be sure you will have a lot of customers!”  - Alex D.“I received mine the day prior to a business trip.  Awesome!!! I absolutely loved it.  In the past I’ve had issues with my laptop backpack sliding off the wheeled carry-on, but not this trip!  I got inquiries/comments from my jealous co-workers.  Now, I’m really looking forward to the Power Strap X2!” - Oliver B.“I received in Japan.  Much earlier than your estimation!  I’ll use it this weekend in travel.  Being excited to use!” - Wada K.“Perfect shape and functionality! Thank you very much!”  - Juan. J R "Thanks! It looks great and works great!"  - Kevin C.                                                                                         “…Quality seems great and I look forward to using it in my upcoming travels!”             -Nate G.“…very nice product. Glad I supported you!” - Edgar H.“I really like it. Great job. I also supported your new project.” - Ronny S.“…I'm very happy with it :) Thanks!” - Ricarda H.“Received it, and happily using it :)” - V D B.“Thanks for the great campaign!  All the best!” - Imran J.“It's great. Wanted another one...” - James H.“It looks good, the quality looks very good also…Thank you for this product."                  -Farah H.“I am happy with the product.  Thank you!” - Matthew L.“I am happy with it !” - Jorg L.“…a solid product for the purpose.” - Jari H.“Looks really good and looking forward to using it.” - Andrew G.“Great product.  Looking forward to future projects." - Arthur K.“Looks great, and seems to function well with a practice trial.” - Dipan P.“Looks great…Nice job! "- Ronald S.“Thank you it’s the best!” - Jamie F.“Thank you…they are looking great!” - Dennis“It looks great, thanks!” - Eric Y.“I’ve received it…I like the product!” - Eric S.“They just arrived and they look great! Can’t wait to use them on my next trip.”               - Mitchell T.“It is great!” - Ty F.“looks really good and looking forward to using it…” - Andrew G.“What a nice product.  Thanks!” - Eric T.“…can’t wait to use!  I will check out your other products as well!” - Chana B.“It looks like it’s made using very high-quality materials.  Thank you!” - Kyle B.“…Quick delivery and great product. Arrived just in time for an upcoming travel. Very happy about them…thank you again for a great product.” - Patrick A.“I received the Loopouts today.  Thank you.  They look great.  I hope they go well in open market for you – it would be nice to hear about the scale-up.” - Tom F.“Received yesterday, good quality, will be trying it out in end July to Japan Hokkaido, Malaysia & South America.  Thank you!” – Robin C.*******Thank you for all your support!!!  - Loopout TeamYou may also have experience like this, and how Loopout helps...

story:
There are about million different kinds of travel adapters in the market with inconsistent quality and many different problems. They are often too bulky, don’t fit properly, fall out of the socket, take up too much space, block the socket beside them, unreliable, poor quality with no guarantee, not convertible, or only converts plugs but not voltages etc.

By listening to customers, integrating the market needs and creating insight into the market situation, we have designed this smallest universal adapter - Evo. We focus on innovations and guarantee its diversity, rationality and security. Driven to provide everyday travelers with the perfect travel adapter in the highest quality. Evo is designed and engineered for ease of use, portable and cost-effectiveness in mind. We collaborate and maintain a long-term partnership with AT&T and Phillip etc, hence we are highly confident in the field of security and design.

 

 

Use fireproof and environmental protection PC94V0 material to make sure safety using. This material is heat resistance but also durable and light.

 

This ultra-thin universal adapter can fit easily in a pocket, bag or backpack. You can use Evo at any time in anywhere no matter whether you are traveling around the world, in the hotel, in the office or at home.

 

 

With many years of experience in the production of electronic appliances, we are very familiar with different types of adapters in various countries. We have been thoughtfully designed from the ground up to include details that aid in daily journeys. And finally come up with this prototype - the lightest, smallest and user-friendly universal travel adapter — Evo — Compact but Powerful!

 

 

For many, having many electronic devices is a critical part of having a great travel experience and an integral part of daily life. Travel around the world and lighten the load with our smallest clever Universal Travel Adapter Evo, which is perfect for all your travel essentials. Its ultra slim, compact, lightweight, portable duel port design allows you to fast charge 2 devices (lightning, MicroUSB or Type-C) at one time easily. Also compatible to accommodate power supply sources in more than 150 countries which works perfectly with any plug standards.

 

Evo is made of an excellent fire-resistant, overheat and cold resistant material PC94V0. And its multiple safety protection systems are designed with safety shutters, surge protection, over-heated, over-current, over-voltage, output short-circuit, over-load protection provide ultimate protection of connected electronic devices and guarantee the safety of usage.

Over thousand and million times of test, Evo has passed CE and FCC compliance testing. Certifying Evo assures our customers that we meet strict guidelines for compatibility, and standards compliance for product safety, energy efficiency, and environment-friendly. We are committed to maintaining the best quality of our products.

 

 

 

Support Countries List

Albania, Algeria, Andorra, Angola, Argentina, Aruba, Australia, Austria, Azerbaijan, Azores, Bahamas, Bahrain, Bangladesh, Barbados, Belarus, Belgium. Belize, Benin, Bermuda, Bhutan, Bolivia, Bonaire, Bosnia & Herzegovina, Botswana, Brazil, Brunei, Bulgaria, Burkina Faso, Burundi, Cambodia, Cameroon, Canada, Canary Islands, Cape Verde, the Cayman islands, Chad, Chile, China, Colombia,DR Congo, the cook islands, costa Rica, Rory island, Croatia. Cuba, Curacao, Cyprus, Czech republic, Denmark, Djibouti, Dominican republic, East Timor, Ecuador, Egypt, el Salvador, equatorial guinea, Estonia, Ethiopia, Faroe islands, Falkland islands, foreign institutional investors, Finland, France, French Guiana. Gabon, Gambia, Georgia, Germany, Ghana, Gibraltar, Greece, Greenland, Grenada, Guadeloupe, Guatemala, Haiti. Honduras. Hong Kong, Hungary, Iceland, India, Indonesia, Iran, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Jamaica, Japan, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Kenya, Kuwait, Kyrgyzstan, Latvia, Lebanon, Libya, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg. Macau, Macedonia, Madagascar, Madeira, Malawi, Malaysia, Maldives, Mali, Malta, Marshall islands, Martinique, Mauritania, Mauritius, Mexico, Mongolia, Montenegro, Montserrat, Morocco, Mozambique. Myanmar, Netherlands, new Caledonia, New Zealand, Nicaragua, Nigeria, Norway, Oman, Palau, panama, Papua New Guinea, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Romania, Russia, Rwanda, Saint Barthelemy, Saint Kitts and Nevis, saint Lucia. Saint Helena, saint Helena, saint Vincent and the grenadines, Samoa, SAN Marino, Saudi Arabia, Scotland, Senegal, Serbia, Seychelles, Sierra Leone, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, Solomon islands, Somalia, South Korea, Spain. Sri Lanka, Sudan, Suriname, Sweden. Switzerland, Syria, Tahiti, Taiwan. Tajikistan, Tanzania, Thailand. Trinidad and Tobago. Tunisia, Turkey, Turkmenistan, Turks and the Caicos Islands, Uganda, Ukraine, United Arab Emirates. United Kingdom, United States of America, Uruguay, Uzbekistan, Vanuatu, Venezuela, Vietnam, Yemen, Zambia, Zimbabwe

story:
The ultimate solution for short or long trips. The roll-on design adjusts to your toiletry needs. 

 

We have got all your travels covered with a TSA compliant bag for airport security checks. The clear bag lets you pack even more toiletries for your expeditions and easily fits in Toilo.

 

No more messy make-outs in toiletry bag. Stay fresh and hygienic with separate pockets for not only toothbrush and toothpaste but for face-wash, razor, moisturizer and hair-comb too.

Modular design lets you pack all toiletries in a super-organized way

No Space Wasted is our motto. The bag is designed to roll up to a cylindrical structure that takes minimum space possible. Minimalist design, maximum toiletries.

 The most functional, modular and stylish toiletry bag of all times

 on a tree, or a hook, or on a finger, everything works.

 No more sweaty travels or workouts. Always ready for adventure. 

Seven mesh pockets: to carry toothbrush, toothpaste, razor, face wash, moisturizer, hair comb, perfume all separate and well organized. Its super adjustable for other items like sunscreen, shower gel as can be seen in the image above. The mesh is of premium quality, the same as used in ergonomic chairs and cars. This section can be easily rolled to fold the bag in super-compact structure.

Deep pocket: to carry all other essentials like lip balm, floss, medicine, massage oils, lipstick, face cream, condoms etc. This pocket is spacious and designed in a way that you can use it on the go without the need to open the complete bag.

Secure passport pocket: A pocket to carry your documents or any other flat items. Made of waterproof exterior, your documents will stay clean and dry no matter what the weather is outside.

Elastic Strap: to carry items on the go like face wipes, towel, small water bottle or simply use it to hold toilo when required.

story:
Meet Quiver: The world’s first ‘Multi-Bag’ for the active 

As Seen on

Download Media Kit

What exactly is a ‘Multi-Bag’? To be honest with you, ‘Multi-Bag’ may not be the sexiest-sounding category but we felt it’s the most apt description for what Quiver is.

We wanted Quiver to be:

Multi-functional

Multi-purpose

Multi-condition

If you like the video, BACK US 

Share this campaign with your friends

 

The Quiver series is a multi-functional bag designed for the active. 

The concept behind Quiver was to design a bag that anyone could carry around for their various activities – catered towards sports or for your travels. We saw that most people had to carry a shoe bag and fit their change of clothes in their ‘work bag’ when they are going for their workout, yoga or sports.

This often leads to bulging bags where you had to fit everything – toiletries, clothes, shoes and water bottles etc – into either one massive, cumbersome bag or multiple “uni-function” bags.

We wanted to create a product that will carry all your ‘barang barang’ (a Singaporean term for personal belongings) when you engage in various activities. Designed to have the same portability as a shoe bag but with far greater functionality, Quiver will not only make you look good, but also feel good carrying it! 

 If you like the name Quiver, BACK US

Quiver caters not just to the active but also encourages the adoption of an active lifestyle!

Just for fun, we’ve designed what we thought would be the typical groups of people who would carry Quiver. 

 If you are one of the above, BACK US

You must be wondering, what makes Quiver the multi-bag it is?

 

*Note: The colour of the inner lining of the strap will be the same colour as the inner lining of the bag.​

Benchmark for Versatility

Quiver is designed for ultimate versatility. It comes with a twin compartment that instantly organises your sporting and travel essentials – shoes/sports equipment in one, clothes and toiletries in the other. 

Have the option to carry using the detachable strap or handle, whichever is more comfortable for you.

Hang It or Sling It

Swivel Clasp Release

The ultra-smooth swivel clasp offers peak level convenience and comfort. It auto-rotates a full 180º to conform precisely to your size and body movement, adjusting constantly so you don't have to. 

To unclip your Quiver bag, simply slide the one touch release to have it uncouple instantly!

Music Pouch

Your favorite tunes and important phone calls are always close at hand with our internal Music Pouch. Swipe away without worry as the Music Pouch protects your device from wet hands, sweat, and moisture.

 Easy Access Pockets

Some essentials just have to be kept a zip away. We designed a quick access compartment right at the front to enable easy access to your phone, wallet, keys and everything else you need on a daily basis. The depth of this quick access compartment was meticulously tested time and time again to achieve a perfect depth and store your pocket-sized items. Quiver includes a convenient side water bottle pouch, capable of holding bottles up to 500ml sizes.

Quick Access Pouch

Front-facing card slot

Side Water Bottle Pouch

Everything-Resistant

Dirt-Resistant

Water-Resistant

 

Capacity: 10.2l 

If you like the functions, BACK US 

 Green

Black

Pink

Orange


If you like the colours, BACK US

*Note: The colour of the inner lining of the strap will be the same colour as the inner lining of the bag.​

Reviews of Quiver 

 

Add On

It’s inevitable that exercise and sports become messy sometimes. Be it the occasional mud bath for your shoes, or the odor that comes with an intense workout. The waterproof Nock Pouch is tightly sealed at the mouth so that when you put your smelly workout clothes in, the odor and sweat remains sealed in it.

Place everything inside the Nock Pouch to keep your Quiver clean & dry. Remove and wash* and you're good as new!

 *Up to 500 washes


If you want more options, BACK US

 If you love being rewarded, BACK US

  If you love the infographic, BACK US

BOW is an innovative product company focused on creating sturdy and stylish products for the active. Our tagline, #bowforbold came about as we had to make some bold decisions when we decided to set up this company. We want to encourage people to step out of their comfort zones and be bold in living their lives.

Get to know more about us by connecting with us in the links below!

Website: bowforbold.com
Facebook: facebook.com/bowforbold
Instagram: instagram.com/bowforbold

If you love who we are, BACK US

 *We do apologise for the multiple calls to "BACK US" but we had to be really shameless about it. Although, we would really love it if you could simply, BACK US! ;)

story:
How much of my stuff fits in there?

 

We're Gravel - We’re passionate about designing travel products that become trusty companions. Why the name Gravel? You know that sound when your tires leave the pavement for a dirt road? That's where the adventure begins, that's Gravel. 

Dirt roads have led us to some our favorite places in the world - hot springs, mountain trails, and beautiful scenic routes. To us, Gravel is the means to take us somewhere amazing.


Introducing The Explorer PLUS (aka The Expeditioner)

What Is The Explorer PLUS Toiletry Bag?

Man that's a great question, thanks for asking. Toiletry bags - it’s probably something you don’t think about all the time but it’s something that you need every single time you travel. We’ve set out to design the best toiletry bag on the planet.

This bag will carry it all while staying compact. Pack in an electric razor, electric toothbrush, loads of liquids, etc...easy peasy. See how we did it below!


Wait, how is it possible to fit all that
stuff?
 


Gravel On The Internets


 


How to back this campaign:

1. Find the section "Select a Perk" or click on "View Perks"
2. Pick your perk level & checkout

 


 

Chris met Lance at a crowdfunding launch party in Utah, USA and Chris shared his idea for a new way to carry toiletries while traveling. The problem we saw was that many travelers were packing their toiletries into ziplock bags, giant “catch all” bags, and sometimes foregoing a toiletry bag all together. After many late nights researching & designing they launched “The Best Toiletry Bag For Traveling”  - making an organized, compact, & easier way to travel light.

Goodness gracious...we raised over $200k in crowdfunding and Gravel has now shipped thousands of our bags to 65+ countries around the world. We’re blown away and humbled. Backers like you brought Gravel to life. This time around, with your help, we’re making our best products even better.

We're here for our second Indiegogo campaign. After launching our first product we received a lot of awesome feedback and found there was a huge need for a toiletry bag that would more comfortably fit electric toothbrushes, electric razors, larger liquids, & bulkier items - all while staying compact & organized.

We packed up our bags and moved from the USA to Vietnam for a few months to live next to our manufacturer so that we could speed up the development process. We are SO EXCITED about this new bag!


What makes this the best toiletry bag?

Here's The Problem:

Current toiletry bags on the market often have no organization options & feature just one or maybe two compartments. Since when did Ziplock become the #1 provider of toiletry bags?!

Spilling your shampoo all over everything is the worst and mixing all of your toiletries together is way gross. One of our least favorite thoughts is picturing our nail clippers rubbing up against our toothbrush. Why should your toothbrush be in the same pocket as your toenail clippers? We thought there had to be a much better way.

Here's The Solution:

The Explorer PLUS was designed with 8 separate pockets to keep you organized and pack a ton of stuff for extended trips. Carry bulkier items like an electric razor, electric toothbrushes, and large liquid containers while still staying compact. We used only premium materials so it cleans easily, and it just feels fantastic in your hands.


Electric Razor/Taller Items Pocket - A mesh pocket with a curved zipper for easy access. It easily fits electric razors, hair combs and taller items! This pocket is large to add versatility so you can pack this as you’d like...it’s cozy in here. Ladies, if you are blessed to not have a beard and don’t have an electric razor then you can easily fit mascara, tampons, and other stuff. (10” Length x 4.5” Wide)

Water Resistant Toothbrush & Toothpaste Pocket - This pocket is solely for your toothbrush to keep your toothbrush from gathering debris & from rubbing up against anything but your pearly whites. Easily fits an electric toothbrush and travel sized toothpaste OR a full sized toothpaste & regular toothbrush. If you have an electric toothbrush and use lots of toothpaste there’s plenty of room for a full size in other pockets.


Pro Tip! We’ve also found this pocket is VERY useful as a very convenient toothbrush holder while traveling. While hanging your open toiletry bag, leave this pocket partially open to let your toothbrush air dry and prevent it from falling on that gross hotel floor. (10” Length x 1.5” Wide)


Deep & Tall Pocket - A mesh pocket to fit your deodorant, comb, & all sorts of other essentials that might be longer. (10” Length x 3” Wide)

Two Deep Mesh Pockets - Pack these how you’d like! We were able to easily fit items like beard oil, q-tips, mustache wax, flossers, and finger nail clippers. (5” Length x 3” Wide)


DEEP Water Resistant Pocket - Store your liquids here to ensure that you don’t arrive to your destination with a shampoo explosion all over everything. Fit items like pomade, shampoo, 3 oz + travel liquid containers, cologne/perfume, etc...this pocket is SPACIOUS. (10” Length x 6” Wide)

TSA Removable & Water Resistant Pouch (included) - We included a premium clear, removable, & water resistant pouch for an added layer of protection from shampoo explosions. Quickly pull out the pouch and lay it next to your stuff for easy passage through airport security. Use the swivel hook attached to hang it up in the shower.

Secret Small Pocket - Well I guess this pocket isn’t a secret anymore is it? This pocket is inside & flush against the Electric Razor/Taller Items Pocket. It can store rings or other small items that you want to keep from sliding around in one of the bigger pockets. Condoms fit real great. (3” Length x 3.5” Wide)

Large Outer Pocket w/Soft Fleece Lining - This pocket spans the length of the back of the pack and has a soft fleece lining to protect valuables. Store your phone, watch, passport, cords, etc. (9” Length x 6” Wide)


Stowaway Adjustable Strap with Aluminum G-Hook - It’s just convenient to hang your toiletry bag. We built a special pocket on the back of the toiletry bag with a stowaway strap with what’s called a g-hook. The g-hook keeps a low profile and allows you to hook this bag onto anything.

It’s stowaway pocket sits behind the large outer pocket to maximize storage space and stay hidden. Now your toiletry bag can hang anywhere or lay flat. (Strap is 16” Long. Pocket is 3.75” Tall x 6” Wide


TSA Guideline Approved Waterproof Pouch (Included)

Traveling with liquids can be a pain. Shampoo explosions & scanning all your stuff with airport security is the worst. Quickly pull out the pouch and lay it next to your stuff for easy passage through airport security.

We’ve talked with TSA and are proud to say this bag meets TSA's guidelines for a clear scannable liquids bag.

It also comes with a hanging swivel hook so you can bring it into the shower with ya.

Detailed Specs


Wow congrats for making it this far down the page. This either means you like us a lot.....or you just want some more information. Just so you know, the feeling is mutual.....here's some specs to help you understand the Explorer PLUS on a deeper level.
 


Premium Materials, Durability, & Weight

We used premium materials and didn't cut any corners.

  • Outer Shell - The bag's outer shell is made from Tarpaulin PVC (Non Toxic & the same material used in many dry bags and our first bag, the Explorer SLIM). This bag will take a beating, wash easily, and stay light to reduce weight in your pack.
  • Mesh - We used a Poly & PVC mesh to keep it very washable and durable.
  • Toothbrush Pocket + Lower Waterproof Pocket Lining - TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) which is waterproof to keep these pockets sealed off from the rest of the bag.
  • Inside Lining - Poly & TPE (Thermoplastic Elastomer).
  • Weight - 12.43 ounces

When will it all ship?

Lifetime Warranty

We are so confident in our product's build that we have added a lifetime warranty - plain and simple. If the bag doesn't hold up for what it was designed for (toiletry carry) then let us know and we've got you covered.


The Explorer SLIM

When you need to pack a ton but need to pack a little lighter - the Explorer SLIM toiletry bag is 2x smaller. After launching "The Best Premium Toiletry Bag For Traveling" last year our amazing backers gave us the feedback needed to make the bag better. 

Updates to the Explorer SLIM since last year:

  • .4" Length Added
  • .4" Width Added
  • Premium Zipper Pulls
  • Aluminum G-Hook + Seatbelt Webbing (to hang easier + stay more low profile)


Do you have our first toiletry bag, The Explorer SLIM?

If you already have the Explorer PLUS we don't recommend getting this updated version here because you've already got a great bag! We’re highlighting the Explorer PLUS on this campaign because it's a completely new bag design & its use case is for carrying more & longer trips - so you can own both. The Explorer PLUS is great for traveling & packing light while still packing a lot (primarily by packing travel sized items). For reference, last year's Explorer SLIM is 2.2x smaller than this year's Explorer PLUS.

We listened to out backers and made a minor change to sizing but don't want to change it's purpose of being slim, lighter, and a more compact. 

If you don't have the Explorer SLIM and are interested in getting one - we have a pledge level called "Combo Pack (1 Explorer SLIM + 1 Explorer PLUS)". If you want to keep your pledge level for the best price (say you got an early bird) then just add $44 to your total pledge amount (see FAQ above for how to add more than one bag to your pledge). You will be asked to pay the cost of shipping after the campaign ends.

 

We only used premium products and offer a lifetime warranty. We will repair or replace any bags that somehow don't hold up to do what the bag was designed to be used for. We do not offer refunds or returns on bags that were received as a Indiegogo perk.

We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Indiegogo is a way for us to launch our brand. As you've read, Indiegogo isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone involved.


Gravel Team
story_txt:
How much of my stuff fits in there? We're Gravel - We’re passionate about designing travel products that become trusty companions. Why the name Gravel? You know that sound when your tires leave the pavement for a dirt road? That's where the adventure begins, that's Gravel. Dirt roads have led us to some our favorite places in the world - hot springs, mountain trails, and beautiful scenic routes. To us, Gravel is the means to take us somewhere amazing.
Introducing The Explorer PLUS (aka The Expeditioner)What Is The Explorer PLUS Toiletry Bag?Man that's a great question, thanks for asking. Toiletry bags - it’s probably something you don’t think about all the time but it’s something that you need every single time you travel. We’ve set out to design the best toiletry bag on the planet.This bag will carry it all while staying compact. Pack in an electric razor, electric toothbrush, loads of liquids, etc...easy peasy. See how we did it below!
Wait, how is it possible to fit all thatstuff?  
Gravel On The Internets 
How to back this campaign:1. Find the section "Select a Perk" or click on "View Perks"2. Pick your perk level & checkout   Our StoryChris met Lance at a crowdfunding launch party in Utah, USA and Chris shared his idea for a new way to carry toiletries while traveling. The problem we saw was that many travelers were packing their toiletries into ziplock bags, giant “catch all” bags, and sometimes foregoing a toiletry bag all together. After many late nights researching & designing they launched “The Best Toiletry Bag For Traveling”  - making an organized, compact, & easier way to travel light.Goodness gracious...we raised over $200k in crowdfunding and Gravel has now shipped thousands of our bags to 65+ countries around the world. We’re blown away and humbled. Backers like you brought Gravel to life. This time around, with your help, we’re making our best products even better.We're here for our second Indiegogo campaign. After launching our first product we received a lot of awesome feedback and found there was a huge need for a toiletry bag that would more comfortably fit electric toothbrushes, electric razors, larger liquids, & bulkier items - all while staying compact & organized.We packed up our bags and moved from the USA to Vietnam for a few months to live next to our manufacturer so that we could speed up the development process. story:
The pirates of Santa Bernarda took over the Rivolé

The crew of the Pirate ship Santa Bernarda is doing sea excursion tours very successfully in the Algarve since 1992.First with the ‘Leaozinho’ excursion boat and since 2001 with the sailing ship 'Santa Bernarda' well known as the Pirate ship of the Algarve.


The Pirate ship Santa Bernarda

Then in 2015 after careful consideration we decided to take over the restaurant and excursion ship named “Rivolé”, which has not undertaken excursions since 2014.
Our plan is to change the Rivolé into a  comfortable and safe passenger ship on the Algarve coast, with an total investment of 640,000.00€

The Rivolé 2015 when we bought her.

About the Rivolé

The home port of the passenger ship “RIVOLÉ” is Portimão.  
All licenses for restaurant operation and driving licenses for the coastal region of the Algarve and the open sea are valid.
Due to its particularly robust design for offshore excursions, the “Rivolé” is exceptionally safe for passenger shipping on the Algarve coast of Portugal.
The “Rivolé” has two passenger decks that extend over the entire length of the vessel and provide space for a maximum of 220 passengers.
On the main deck is the kitchen, the restaurant and barrier-free sanitary facilities.
On the upper and sun deck is the navigation bridge, a bar as well as benches and tables for 120 people.

 

What We Need

The Rivolé is at present under Restoration, to bring the ship to the newest state of the art, safety, comfort, communication and update its environmental compatibility.

  • All ready invested capital, purchase of the ship and repairs:                           150.000,00 €
  • Crowdfunding goal to reach:                                                                                       140.000,00 €
  • EU support program, “Algarve 2020”, as loan:                                                     350.000,00 €
  • By December 2017 will have been invested.                                                          690.000,00 €

 

Our goals:

  • Barrier-free excursion boat.
  • Modernisation of the technical infrastructure on board.
  • Improve safety and comfort on board.
  • Reduction of Co2 production per passenger.
  • Restaurant with traditional Portuguese cuisine.
  • Cultural program on board - with live music, fado, traditional Portuguese entertainment music and regular changing art exhibitions.
  • Creation of 12 full time jobs.
  • Continuous documentation of our trips with webcam visible on: www.rivole.com.
  • Increasing the attractiveness of the river port in Portimão.

After restoration the Rivolé will be a traditional wooden ship

What you get

Rivolé – Comfortable and cozy along the Algarve coast!

At our Algarve Cave Excursions Program we show you the most beautiful beaches and caves along the Algarve coast. Comfortable seats can be found on the covered middle deck, or on the top and sun deck where you can enjoy a wonderful view. At the beginning of the trip, you will receive all information on safety on board in English. Our bar on the sun deck offers you food, drinks and nice souvenirs. The “Rivolé” complies with all EU safety and insurance regulations. Modernly equipped sanitary facilities, such as changing rooms and barrier-free toilets are at your disposal.

All perks are transferable and tradable and can be sold with 20% return on top of the acquisition price. The seller must inform us about any transfer or sale and provide us with the buyer's details.

We guarantee rebuy of perks for their acquisition price latest in 5 years, after a previous 2-month notice.

The tickets you get over this campaign are valid until 31.12.2029
Save your place now for your next visit in Portugal

Our Tour Program

Tour 1: Cave visit

Portimão, Carvoeiro, Praia da Marinha, Portimão​​

In the morning, the sea is particularly quiet, ideal conditions for an unforgettable visit to the caves. Our journey begins in the historical river port of Rio Arade in Portimão. We follow the Rio Arade downstream past the fishing village of Ferragudo and two medieval castles to the Atlantic. From here we take course south-east, past the lighthouse of Ferragudo, the beach of Caneiros, the Roman tower and the smugglers cave. Along the Carvoeiro cliff with the rock formations of Algar Seco, the Praia Vale de Centianes to the Alfanzina lighthouse, along the beaches of Carvalho,  Benagil, Praia da Marinha and Armação de Pêra, there are the most and the largest and deepest caves of the Algarve. With our cave boats, equipped with engines and life vests, you will explore at least 8 of these fascinating rock caves. Through narrow or wide entrances, you enter dark and colourful gleaming dome like vaults.​

Tour 2A: Caves of Carvoeiro

Portimão, Carvoeiro, Praia da Marinha, Portimão​​

Our journey begins in Portimão with a course to the south-east. We drive along the coast as described in Tour 1 to the lighthouse of Alfanzina. Here we anchor and you will change over to our cave boats to start the excursion of the caves. After the cave excursions we move on direction Praia da Marinha where we anchor again and you have the opportunity to have a refreshing dip in the Atlantic. From here we return along near the wonderful cliffs, hidden beaches and the mysterious caves of the Algarve coast, back to the port of Portimão.​

 

Tour 2B: Caves of Lagos

Portimão, Alvor, Lagos, Portimão​​

Our journey begins in the port of Portimão into the Atlantic, we head west, along the Praia da Rocha, Praia do Vau, Praia de Alvor, Meia Praia all the way to Lagos, where Vasco da Gama started his discoveries.
If the sea is quite we’ll anchor. Here you take a dip in the clear water and visit the caves of Ponta da Piedade. After this brake we drive back through the bay of Lagos to the home port of the Rivolé. On this tour there is a good possibility that dolphins follow us.​

 

Tour 3: Day Trip​

Portimão, Lagos, Alvor, Portimão​​

Experience a day full of adventure. We leave the Rio Arade and follow the coast in direction of Carvoeiro passing the lighthouse Alfanzina on our way to Benagil. Here we anchor the Rivolé, you descend to the dinghies and we’ll visit some of the most beautiful caves in the Algarve. Coming back from visit of the caves, a traditional Portuguese BBQ of high and fresh quality awaits you on board. Consisting of grilled sardines, chicken piri-piri, meat skewers, with wood oven bread, herb potatoes mixed salad, wine, water and mixed fruit for dessert. Chilling, swimming and sunbathing on the deck round off the stay before we light the anchor again.

The  Team

The Rivolé Team: (LTR) Captain Nico, CEO and Captain, Hermann, Office Uwe

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is to finish all the restoration and  transformation in time but we are confident to start in middle of January 2018 with the first excursions and  the opening of our on board restaurant. If something goes wrong with our timeline we will inform you directly and be aware that all rewarded tickets are valid until 31.12.2029 and if you can't use your tickets for whatever reason we will refund your pledges with out any questions after this date.

For more Information please check out our Website at rivole.com

Our journey begins in the port of Portimão into the Atlantic, we head west, along the Praia da Rocha, Praia do Vau, Praia de Alvor, Meia Praia all the way to Lagos, where Vasco da Gama started his discoveries.If the sea is quite we’ll anchor. Here you take a dip in the clear water and visit the caves of Ponta da Piedade. After this brake we drive back through the bay of Lagos to the home port of the Rivolé. On this tour there is a good possibility that dolphins follow us.​

 
Tour 3: Day Trip​
Portimão, Lagos, Alvor, Portimão​​
Experience a day full of adventure. We leave the Rio Arade and follow the coast in direction of Carvoeiro passing the lighthouse Alfanzina on our way to Benagil. Here we anchor the Rivolé, you descend to the dinghies and we’ll visit some of the most beautiful caves in the Algarve. Coming back from visit of the caves, a traditional Portuguese BBQ of high and fresh quality awaits you on board. Consisting of grilled sardines, chicken piri-piri, meat skewers, with wood oven bread, herb potatoes mixed salad, wine, water and mixed fruit for dessert. Chilling, swimming and sunbathing on the deck round off the stay before we light the anchor again.
The  Team

The Rivolé Team: (LTR) Captain Nico, CEO and Captain, Hermann, Office Uwe
Risks & Challenges
Our biggest challenge is to finish all the restoration and  transformation in time but we are confident to start in middle of January 2018 with the first excursions and  the opening of our on board restaurant. If something goes wrong with our timeline we will inform you directly and be aware that all rewarded tickets are valid until 31.12.2029 and if you can't use your tickets for whatever reason we will refund your pledges with out any questions after this date.
For more Information please check out our Website at rivole.com

story:
Ergens tussen 5 en 9 januari is de buitenboordmotor gejat van de Ragbak. En wel met brute kracht, want de achterkant van de boot is beschadigd, waardoor hij nu ook een nieuwe motor niet goed kan vasthouden.


Wil de Ragbak weer kunnen varen dit jaar, moeten er 2 dingen gebeuren:

  • Er moet reparatiewerk en nieuw laswerk aan de achterkant worden gevoerd, die zorgt dat een volgende motor er niet even gauw weer af kan worden geraust.
    Kosten: ± € 450.
     
  • Er moet een nieuwe buitenboordmotor komen (9.9PK, 4 takt), met een nieuw slot erop.
    Kosten: ± € 1500.


Geef de Ragbak een nieuw leven en doneer! 

Ik ga natuurlijk zoveel mogelijk zelf financieren, zoals ik over de jaren altijd heb gedaan. Maar alle beetjes helpen! Gelukkig kun je voor je bijdrage allemaal leuke rewards krijgen.

 

 

Veelgestelde vragen


1: Wat is er precies gebeurd?
Ze hebben de motor gejat! Ik keek naar buiten (waar de boot ligt) en kon op afstand al zien dat de motor er niet meer op zat. Ben een kijkje gaan nemen om de schade op te nemen.

2: Wie?
Ze! Vervelende, nare mensen.

3: Heb je aangifte gedaan?
Aangifte heb ik gedaan, maar de pliesie heeft geen tijd voor dit soort dingen. Een makker van me wiens boot om de hoek lag, zijn motor is ook gejat.

4: Zat je motor niet goed vast dan?
Ik dacht van wel. Er zat een cilinderslot op die de schroefdraden die de motor vasthouden, afschermt om doorgezaagd te worden. Echter het is ze gelukt dat ding er gewoon af te trekken, vermoedelijk zonder die schroefdaden door te slijpen. Ook de staalkabel waarmee 'ie vastzat, is doorgeknipt. Gekste vind ik zelf trouwens, dat hij is gejat ookal zat de motorkap er niet op. Die heb ik nog thuis. Gewoonlijk kun je een motor zonder kap namelijk niet verkopen. Daarom zie je vaak Albert Heijn tassen over de motor zitten.

5: Hoe ga je dit nu voorkomen dan?
Door de spiegel (het stukje achterkant van de boot waarop je een buitenboordmotor vastzet) te laten versterken met een stalen stang of wat de reparateur ook adviseert. Zodat gewoon sjorren niet lukt. Bovendien ga ik kijken of ik hem in de winter in de berging van de buren mag zetten.

6: Waar baseer je die € 450 op?
Op een offerte aanvraag die ik heb gedaan bij de Oranjemarine. Ik wacht nog op andere offertes.

7: Waar baseer je die € 1500 op?
Op Marktplaats onderzoek. Ik heb een motor op het oog die op het moment niet voor minder dan €1700 weggaat. Maar da's wel een erg goeie.

8: Hoeveel ga je zelf inleggen?
Zoveel als nodig is. Dus zonodig de hele rataplan. Ik moet wel ook nog €384 dit jaar betalen aan gemeentelijk liggeld. Zucht.

9: Kun je niet volstaan met iets goedkopers?
Sowieso moet het een viertakt worden. Want tweetakt mag vanaf dit jaar niet meer. Dit gaat ook de prijzen omhoog drijven op Marktplaats, want nu gaat iedereen er één nodig hebben. Ik zou voor een 5pk kunnen gaan ipv een 9.9pk, maar dan versta ik je goeie en slimme grappen niet als je bij me op de boot zit.

10: Kun je niet net zo goed een andere boot kopen?
Dat valt helaas vies tegen. Boten met een beetje ruimte - vooral zo ruim als de Ragbak - daarvoor moet je behoorlijk in de buidel tasten. Vooral in Amsterdam (ik heb de Ragbak uit Weesp gehaald). Bovendien heeft de Ragbak andere voordelen. Namelijk dat dit de eerste onderhoudsklus in jaren is. Er hoeft in de regel nooit wat aan te gebeuren. Vandaar de naam. Ragbak.

11: Wordt het niet eens tijd voor een elektrische motor? Met je babbels over geen auto rijden enzo?
Neen. Helaas zijn elektrische buitenboordmotoren, behalve onbetaalbaar, ook nog niet heel sterk. En doordat de accu's zoveel ruimte innemen, kun je met een behapbare accu ook niet heel ver komen. Die trip naar Pampus is dan bijvoorbeeld niet haalbaar. Met een beetje betaalbare elektrische kun je zelfs niet veilig het IJ op.

12: Wat als de doelstelling van de fundraiser niet wordt behaald?
Dat maakt niet uit. Wat er binnenkomt, kan ik ophalen. Ik kijk op basis van wat er ge'pledge'd wordt, wat mijn mogelijkheden zijn.

13A: Hoe kut is dit?
Best kut.

13B: Vind je zelf het ook kut?
Ja. Maar er zijn ergere dingen. Het is een kwestie van euries.
